K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:1b-1: bam po nyi shu gnyis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:1b-3: smyug ma'i lo ma gro bzhin dang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:1b-6: rtse mo rnyed pa spu gu can //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:1b-9: zhes gsungs nas de dag smyug lo'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2a-5: de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2a-8: de dag srad bu'i mchil lham 'chang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2a-9: de nyid nyes dmigs su gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2a-12: dge slong dag dreg gis btab ste de dag shu ba byung bas ko ba'i mchil lham rlan par gyur pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2a-13: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-0: @2b bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-1: dreg gis thebs pa gang yin pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-2: srad bu'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-3: gang gi tshe gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung ba de'i tshe de'i rkang mthil la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spu sor bzhi tsam yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-4: drug sde dag gis mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-5: mthong nas kyang de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-7: re zhig mar sar gyi gong bu 'dra ba 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-8: gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas ci zhig byed ces smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-10: des thos nas nga rgyal skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i drung du song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis gcig tu brtson pa'i bstan pa la ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par gsungs pa gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-15: tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:2b-17: de bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du song nas 'chag sa bcas so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3a-4: de ji srid 'chag sa'i mgo gcig nas gcig shos su song gi bar du de'i 'chag sa'i mgo gcig na yang khva dag khrag 'thung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3a-8: dus dus su chu bor rgyu ba spyod do zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du rgyu zhing gshegs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3a-11: tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i gtsug lag khang gang na ba der gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i 'chag sa gzigs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3a-15: mkhyen bzhin du rmed de; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis che dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-0: gro bzhin @3b skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-3: rjes su gnang ste gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas rim pa gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-5: rim gsum pa ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-6: gal te rdol bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-7: lhan pas btab ste bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-9: son nas tshe dang ldan pa gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-10: tshe dang ldan pa shes par gyis shig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-13: rim gsum pa ma yin no zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-20: ston pa'i bka' mi gcog na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-21: gal te bdag gis bcangs na gzhi des bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag; ae ma'o 'gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa rab tu byung nas ltogs pa zhig rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-22: gang yang yul tsam pa thun mong ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-23: glang po che bdun gyi tshogs spangs te rab tu byung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-24: deng mchil lham theg gi ba tsam la chags pa lta zhes gleng bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-26: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ltos te dge 'dun thams cad la rjes su gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-27: bdag gis de bzhin du bcang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-28: zhes pa'i skabs de; bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyas par gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:3b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:4a-0: gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la ltos nas dge 'dun thams cad @4a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:4a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na rgan zhugs mchil lham can gzhan zhig 'chag par byed pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:4b-19: gnas mal bsrung ba'i phyir rim gcig pa'i mchil lham bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:4b-22: gal te rdol bar gyur na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:4b-26: bsod snyoms pa gzhan zhig la khyim bdag cig dad par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:4b-28: de mchil lham med pa khyim bdag des mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:4b-30: 'phags pa la mchil lham ma mchis sam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5a-16: rim pa mang po can gyi mchil lham zhig byin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5a-27: bdag la rim pa mang po can 'di lta bu grub ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5a-28: rim gcig par bgyis la bcang bar bgyi'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5b-0: mchil lham rim @5b pa mang po can khyim pa'i dman ma yin phan chad pa bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5b-1: tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus te zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5b-23: don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur cig ces byas nas blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5b-24: phyogs kun tu 'phags pa dag ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5b-28: ji nas kyang 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar bag yod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:5b-29: bsod snyoms pa zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-6: de dag mthu chung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-8: nyi ma la bskam par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-9: de dag gis grib ma la bskams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-12: grib ma la bskam par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-13: de dag gis gting nas dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-16: ma bsdus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-20: de dag gis sus bsdu ba ma shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-26: dge slong nyid kyis bsdu bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-27: dge slong gis bsdus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-32: so sor phye nas longs spyad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-35: na ba dag la rjes su gnang ba gang yin pa de thams cad mi na ba'i gnas skabs na spyod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-40: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gar yang som nyi za bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:15b-41: de'i ming nam gru som nyi can nam gru som nyi can zhes bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-2: chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-3: de rim gyis bu ram byed pa'i grong du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-5: 'bras phye dang; bu ram 'bru bar byed pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-8: bu ram 'bras phye dang ma sbru zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-10: spyi bar bgyid pa gzhan 'ga' mkhyen nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-11: kho bos spyi ba gzhan yang mi shes mod kyi; bdag cag dus ma yin par longs spyod dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-13: dus su'am dus ma yin par gsol yang rung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-17: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-18: dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rnyed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-20: de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-21: nye gnas dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-23: dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-28: de de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-29: de rnams la dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-31: dge 'dun gyi bca' pa bu ram zhig rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-34: mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-36: de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-38: dge 'dun ril las kyang phal po ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-39: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16a-41: zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-0: mi @16b rnyed pas 'byung khungs yongs su dag pas longs spyad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-4: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-6: lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-7: rim gyis srang zhig tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-8: des spos tshong zhig phye la reg nas bu ram la reg par byed pa mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-10: phye la reg nas bu ram la reg par ma byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-11: dus ma yin par yang bdag cag gis longs spyad dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-14: bdag la yang dang yang du sug chab gtong ba su zhig mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-15: dus gzhan zhig na; dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-18: nye gnas dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-20: dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram dag rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-21: ci ste mi gsol; des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-24: de rnams kyis kyang longs ma spyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-25: de rnams la dge slong dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-27: dge 'dun gyi bca' ba bu ram zhig rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-30: mkhan po'i zhal nas 'di zas dang 'dres so zhes gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-31: de dag gis kyang longs ma spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-33: dge 'dun ril las kyang phal ches longs ma spyad pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-34: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:16b-36: zas kyis zas kyi bya ba mi byed pa mi rnyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-1: dag pas longs spyad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rlung nad kyis thebs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-6: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-7: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-8: bdag rang gi blos rim gro ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-9: lan mang du byas mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-10: lan 'ga' yang sman pa la ma dris kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-11: ma la da ni sman pa la dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-13: de sman pa'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-15: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-19: skyur khu'i nang du lan tshva stsal la gsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-24: de lan tshva btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-25: tshe dang ldan pa po linda'i bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-26: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-27: nga la lan tshva rva gang 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang bar byin gyis brlabs pa zhig yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-28: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-31: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus thos nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-32: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-33: kho bo 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-34: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dus su rung ba dang 'dres pa longs spyad par mi dbang ngo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-36: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17a-40: dus su rung ba gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-0: thun tshod du rung ba gang yin pa @17b dang; zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-1: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-2: gal te dus su rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-3: gal te byin gyis kyang ma brlabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-4: dus su rung pa dang 'dres pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-7: thun tshod du rung pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-8: zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-9: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-10: gal te thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-11: gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-12: thun tshod du rung ba dang 'dres pas thun tshod du spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-13: thun tshod las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-14: zhag bdun pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-15: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-16: zhag bdun pa dang 'dres par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-17: zhag bdun pa dang 'dres pas zhag bdun du spyad par bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-18: zhag bdun las 'das par spyad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-19: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-20: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyad par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-24: sde chen sha dang gzhang 'brum dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-25: rlung nad can dang gang po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-26: mes byin dang ni be'i ra to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-27: sprin chen bya rog rnams yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-29: w'a ra n'a sir byon nas w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nang na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-30: w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:17b-31: longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-0: de chung ma dang bcas te @18a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-2: dge ba'i bsam pa can yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-3: des bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi zhes bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-4: w'a ra n'a sir byon nas w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-6: thos nas kyang yang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-7: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim du lan mang du spyan drangs te zhal zas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-9: yo byad thams cad kyis ma bstabs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-10: ma la bdag gis da bcom ldan 'das la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-12: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas; bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-14: khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-15: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-16: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-17: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-18: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-21: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-22: de nas khyim bdag sde chen /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par bstod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-24: rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18a-25: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-0: bcom @18b ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-2: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-6: snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-8: bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag sde chen la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-10: de nas khyim bdag sde chen bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-12: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu khyim bdag sde chen gyis zla ba gsum du na bza' dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-16: snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-17: yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur kho na byas nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-18: khyim bdag sde chen gyi kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-21: dge slong rnams la lta bar byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-24: sdug bsngal ba'i nad pa gzhan zhig yod pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-25: sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-26: de nas khyim bdag sde chen dge slong de gang na ba der song ste son nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-27: rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te dris ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:18b-32: de nas khyim bdag sde chen rang gi khyim du song ste chung ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-0: slob dpon che ge mo zhes bya ba la @19a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-1: sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-3: des bu mo zhig la rin bskur nas tshong 'dus su btang ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-4: de'i nyin mo rgyal po'i sras bltams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-5: de dril sgrog tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-6: sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-7: gang gis srog bcad na chad pas gcod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-8: de nas rin gyis kyang tshong 'dus su sha ma rnyed nas de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-9: khyim bdag sde chen la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-10: khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-11: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-12: gal te dge slong zhig sman med pas shi bar gyur na ma legs so zhes de snyam du dpyad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-13: gri rnon po blangs te khyim du zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-14: brla'i sha las bcad de bu mo la byin nas bu sha 'di khu bar byos la 'phags pa che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-15: des de khyer nas dge slong gis longs spyad pa las sos par gyur to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-17: bam po nyi shu rtsa gsum pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-18: dge slong des 'di ltar bdag la khyim bdag gi chung ma 'dis rang gis shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-19: bdag dad pas byin pa longs spyad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-22: ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-23: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19a-24: mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-1: de brtson 'grus brtsam par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-5: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-6: mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-9: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid du zil gyis mnan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-10: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-11: khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-12: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-13: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa'i sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-14: ste'u dang tsandan du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-15: rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-18: so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-21: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-23: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-25: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-31: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-33: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-34: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-35: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:19b-36: khyim bdag sde chen gyi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-0: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim @20a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-1: bdag sde chen la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-3: khyim bdag gi chung ma sde chen ma mi snang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-5: bcom ldan 'das spyod lam rdo mi thogs pas phugs na mchis so; ;sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-6: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-7: gang gis na rma de mdog 'dra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-9: ba spu 'dra bar 'gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-10: de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis chung ma dad pa skyes te sgor byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spungs nyams su myong bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-15: des tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-16: sgrim mi dgos par 'khor ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-17: lus ni shin tu rnyed par sla'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-18: bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-19: sbyin gnas shin tu rnyed par dka'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-20: de nas khyim bdag sde chen gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar gshegs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-21: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-22: rnam grangs su mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-23: rang gi lag gis bstabs shing tshim par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20a-25: stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos @20b mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-2: khyim bdag sde chen la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-3: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-4: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-5: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-6: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-9: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-11: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-13: sha rnams kyi nang na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-15: mi'i sha tha chad yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-17: dge slong gis mi sha bza' bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-18: dge slong gis mi'i sha zos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-21: ngas dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi kun tu spyod pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-22: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi sha 'brim par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-23: 'di ci'i sha zhes dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-24: gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gnas brtan gyis ma spobs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-25: gnas brtan gnyis pas dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:20b-26: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-0: dge slong thams cad the tshom skyes nas the @21a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-4: khyim bdag sde chen gyi mchis brang gis rang gi shas dge slong 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyis la; dge slong 'dis kyang sde chen ma la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-7: da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-8: ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-10: 'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-11: shin tu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-14: w'a ra n'a si'i grong na khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-15: de'i chung ma sde chen ma zhes bya'o; ;ji tsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-16: bram ze tshogs 'don du bcug pa gzhan zhig bram ze'i bu lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-17: de la khyim bdag sde chen dad pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-18: des de 'khor dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-19: khyim bdag sde chen gyis bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pa la bkur sti kho na byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-20: khyim bdag de'i kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-22: nad pa rnams la lta bar byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-24: bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig na ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-26: nad tshabs che bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21a-27: de la sman pas sha khu 'thungs shig ces bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-0: de nas khyim bdag @21b sde chen bram ze'i khye'u gang na ba der song ste son nas phyag byas te dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-2: khyod la sman pas ci bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-5: de nas khyim bdag sde chen khyim du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-7: bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba la sha khu 'thungs shig ces sman pas bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-9: des bu mo zhig la rin bskur te tshong 'dus su btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-10: de nyid kyi nyin mo rgyal po'i bu btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-11: des dril sgrog tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-12: sus kyang srog gcad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-13: gang gis srog bcad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-14: de chad pas gcod par bcad do zhes bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-15: de nas tshong 'dus su rin gyis kyang sha ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-16: de nas bu mo des de ltar gyur pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-17: khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma la rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-18: khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung mas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-19: bram ze 'khor dang bcas pa 'di la bdag cag gis yo byad thams cad bstabs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-20: gal te bram ze'i khye'u zhig sman med pas dus byas par gyur na ma legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-21: zhes de snyam du dpyad nas gri rnon po blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-22: khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas brla'i sha las bcad de bu mo la byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-25: bram ze'i khye'u che ge mo zhes bya ba'i drung du khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-26: des khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u des longs spyad nas sos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-28: 'di ltar bdag la khyim bdag gi chung ma des rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:21b-30: bdag dad pas byin pa yongs su longs spyad nas bdag glos phab ste 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-0: @22a *// ma la bdag gis ma thob pa thob par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-1: ma rtogs pa rtogs par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-2: mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bdag gis 'bad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-4: de nas de zhi ba'i phyogs su song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-5: mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-8: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag sde chen zhes bya ba'i chung ma gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-9: khyim bdag sde chen gyi chung ma 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-12: de'i tshe yang 'dis dge slong de la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-13: 'dis kyang de la brten nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-14: da ltar yang 'dis dge slong 'di la rang gi shas bsnyen bkur byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-15: dge slong 'dis kyang 'di la brten nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22a-28: las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal par bya ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-16: khyed cag kyang glang po che'i sha gsol lam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-24: dge slong gzhan dag cig bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de dag gis mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-26: ae ma drug sde dag lhung bzed kyi snod khengs na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-33: mu ge'i dus byung ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-34: gal te gzhan ma rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-36: kho bo cag ltogs te 'chi'am zhes pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-37: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:22b-42: khyed la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-1: pa gzhan dag kyang yod pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-3: des na bdag gi glang po che tsho rgu kha btag go zhes sems par mi 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-5: de lta bas na; dge slong dag gis glang po che'i sha longs spyad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-8: glang po che'i sha ji lta ba bzhin rta'i sha yang de dang 'dra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul tsam pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-10: drang srong gar ga'i rdzing 'gram na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-11: yul tsam pa'i klu dad pa bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-12: dge ba'i bsam pa can de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-14: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-15: gnas snang bar lus chen por byas te lus btang nas 'dug cing 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa dag la cung zad kyang gnod pa'am skrag par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-16: mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-21: lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-22: klu'i sha la dum bu dum bur bcad nas longs spyod par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-26: chos gos dag thogs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23a-29: khyim bdag gi chung mas smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-3: phru ba 'di'i nang na 'tshod cing 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-8: khyed cag kyang klu'i sha gsol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-10: 'tsho ba khyed cag la rag las pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-11: gal te khyed cag za na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-12: kho bo cag la yang byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-14: 'phags pa rnams kyang longs spyod do zhes phal mo che spyad par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-15: de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma 'di snyam du sems te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-19: bdag gis 'di'i phyir 'di kho na bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-21: de nas tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-22: mtshan mo 'das nas kha dog 'phags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-23: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-25: de'i tshe na tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma'i kha dog gi mthus drang srong gar ga'i rdzing gi nye 'khor thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-26: tsam pa'i klu'i chung ma phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-28: bdag gi sdum thab dad pa bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-29: dge ba'i bsam pa can de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-30: tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-31: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas blangs nas lus btang ste mchis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:23b-32: 'jig rten na sems can dag gnas pa la gnod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:24a-2: mu ge'i dus byung bas las la mi lta ba'i mi phyugs rdzi rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:24a-7: lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis klu'i sha dum bu dum bur bkum nas 'tshal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:24a-8: 'phags pa dag gis gzigs nas 'phags pa rnams kyis kyang gsol bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:24a-9: 'phags pa rnams kyis gsol la de dag gis kyang phal cher bkum zhing 'tshal bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:24a-10: bdag gi sdum thab kyis yun ji srid cig sdug bsngal brnag 'tshal /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:28b-12: zhes de rnams sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur pas dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-5: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-6: gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-8: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-9: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-10: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams byul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-11: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-13: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las rnams lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-15: ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-16: mdun logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-17: dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-18: zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-19: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-20: zhabs kyi rting par nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-21: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-22: zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-23: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-24: zhabs kyi pus mor nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-25: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-26: phyag g-yon pa'i mthil du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29a-27: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-4: zhal gyi nang du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-5: rang byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-8: dbu'i gtsug tu nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-9: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil du nub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-11: kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-12: tshogs rnams zhal gyi nang nas byung gyur la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-13: ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-14: de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-15: yang tshigs su bcad pa dag gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-16: rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-17: sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-18: rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-19: rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-20: de slad bstan pa nyid slob dus mkhyen nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-21: rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-22: nyan par 'tshal ba'i nyan pa po rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-23: the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-24: dam pa bzang po dag gis bsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-25: tshva chu ri bo lta bur brtan pa'i mgon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-26: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:29b-27: brtan pa ci slad 'jum pa ston mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-9: rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi ston te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-11: sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu nyams shing chud zos par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos bkur ba'i gdung rgyud nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-14: spyod pa skyon mi mnga' ba la bran mo'i bu zhes smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-15: de deng nas zhag bdun na khrag dron du skyugs te; dus byed par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-16: lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-20: rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byed du ma gzhug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-21: gzhang 'brum yang gcad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-23: rnam pa gnyis kyis bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-26: dge slong gis gzhang 'brum gcod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-27: rgyun shes kyi bu 'dra ba la bsnyen bkur byed du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-29: dge slong de rgyun shes kyi bus ji ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-30: de nas blon po dag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30a-33: bcom ldan 'das la yang bran mo'i bu zhes tshig tu smras la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-0: dge slong de @30b yang ji ltar gnod pa de nyid kyis dus las 'das pa de lta de ltar bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-1: de nas rgyal po che thang du khros nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-3: ngas sman pa'i rgyal po rgyun shes kyi bu yongs su btang zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-5: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-7: gum lags pa de dgum ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-8: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis zhag bdun na khrag drod du skyugs nas dus byed par 'gyur te; lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-11: gal te de ltar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-13: de dag gis de spyugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-14: yul gnas bcas zhes bya bar phyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-15: yul gnas bcas na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-17: gang gi phyir khyod khams gsum gyi mgon po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-18: bran mo'i bu zhes tshig tu smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-19: khyod 'dir gnas su ga la rung zhes mang du spyos nas bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-20: de de nas w'a ra n'a sir song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-21: de nas kyang bskrad nas yangs pa can du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-22: de nas kyang bskrad nas yul tsam par song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-23: de nas kyang bskrad nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-24: de nas kyang bskrad nas shing drung zhig na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-25: de nas kyang shing la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis bskrad nas 'bab chu dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dag gi 'gram zhig tu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-26: der yang skabs ma rnyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:30b-29: re zhig wa dag gis kyang skabs rnyed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-1: shing drung dang mtsho dang mtshe'u dag na yang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-5: khrag dron po skyugs nas dus las 'das pa de lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-6: dus las 'das ma thag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag gsungs pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-9: kha nas sta re tshig byung ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-10: nyes par smra ba smra tshig des //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-11: bdag nyid la ni gcod par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-12: gang zhig smad 'os skye po bsngags byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-13: bsngags 'os skye bo rnam par smod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-14: de ni kha yi nyes pa gang gis na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-15: bde ba 'thob mi 'gyur ba'i nyes pa gsog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-16: 'dir ni rgyan pos rang gi nor yal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-17: 'di ni phung ba cung zad tsam yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-18: bde gshegs rnams la yid kyis gdug bsam pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-19: gang yin de ni phung ba chen po yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-20: 'phags la smod byed lus dang ngag gi las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-21: sdig to byas nas chu bur rdol rnams su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-22: lo 'bum dag dang chu bur can du lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-23: bzhi khri tshig stong gang yin dmyal der 'gro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-25: grong rdal mtshams ma bcad pa gzhan zhig tu dgongs btab nas bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems @31b te; bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-1: rim gro lan mang du byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-2: sman pa la lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-3: ma la bdag gis da ni sman pa la dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-5: de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-6: bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i snyun gyis thebs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-10: gru gsum cha ba mar mang pos stsal ba sgrol la gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rang nyid kyis byas te btsos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-15: mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-21: bdag gi glo ba la bsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-22: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis rang gi blos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-23: rim gro lan mang du bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-24: sman pa la lan 'ga' yang ma dris kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-25: ma la bdag gis da ni sman pa la dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-27: bdag gis sman pa la smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-28: de'i mchid nas gru gsum chab mar mang pos stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-32: de nas bdag gis bgyis te; bsgral ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:31b-39: bdag gis mtshams kyi nang du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-0: @32a *// mtshams kyi nang du btsos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-1: mtshams kyi nang du bzhag kyang zhag lon pa longs spyad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-2: mtshams kyi nang du btsos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-3: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu zhag lon pa yang longs spyad par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-4: mtshams kyi phyi rol tu btsos la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-13: dge slong gis btsos pa thams cad kyi thams cad du longs spyad par mi bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-21: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-22: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-23: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32a-24: rnam grangs du mar zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32b-0: de nas khyim bdag de stan las langs @32b te; bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:32b-1: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:33a-9: des chu snod blangs te chus btab nas ji srid tshos pa de srid du btsos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:33a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:33a-12: mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:33b-33: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34a-30: des sman pa'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34a-31: jo bo khyod kyis khyim bdag 'byor pa mkhyen tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34a-34: de 'di 'dra ba'i bro nad cig gis thebs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34a-35: de chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-0: chung ma dang @34b bu dag gis kyang yal bar bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-3: de la su zhig rim gro byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-4: de'i rim gro bdag gis bgyi mod kyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-12: rim gro byas te de sos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-14: bdag gi chung ma dang bus kyang yal bar bor te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-23: bus kyang yal bar bor ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-24: kho bo cung zad cig gson pa de thams cad ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-37: gal te rje'i sras khyod dang lhan cig 'grogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-40: des gal gyis chu bar shes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-41: bu mo gang gi tshe rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:34b-43: rung zhing zla mtshan dang ldan par gyur nas des de la sbran to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-2: de gnyis lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-4: gang gi nyi ma la sems can zhugs par gyur pa'i nyin de kho na nas bzung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-5: khyim bdag 'byor ba'i nor thams cad dang las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-6: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-14: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-15: de btsas nas lhag par khyim bdag 'byor pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-16: las kyi mtha' thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-18: zhes de'i ming gang po zhes btags so; ;zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-19: khye'u gang po ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-20: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-21: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-22: de chen por gyur pa de'i che yi ge dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35a-28: gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-0: @35b brtag pa brgyad po gzhi brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-2: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-4: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-7: gzhon nu ma brtag pa la shin tu byang zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-8: brtag pa gzhan yang byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-9: klog pa la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-10: spyod pa gsal bar gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-12: de dag chung ma la lhag par chags pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-15: lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-16: bu rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-18: khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad nas sems khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-22: ji srid gser 'bum ma rnyed pa de srid du khyim ma phub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-23: khyed cag 'tsho nam yal bar bor nas chung ma la lhag par chags pas 'jo sgeg lhur len cing 'khod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-24: nga shi nas khyim mya ngan gyis gang bar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-25: ji ltar sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-27: rin po che'i rna rgyan thogs pa phral nas shing gi rna rgyan zhig btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-28: bdag gis ji srid gser 'bum ma grub pa de srid du rin po che'i rna rgyan gdags par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:35b-31: rgya skegs kyi rna rgyan no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-0: 'byor dga' zhes bya ba gang yin pa de @36a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-3: rgya skegs kyi rna rgyan can /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-6: rgya mtsho chen por dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-9: bdag kyang rgya mtsho chen por mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-11: bu khyod bus pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-13: tshong khang gi bya ba dag byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-15: de nyid du 'dug go ;de rnams kyis kyang gru bo che grub nas lhags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-16: lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-18: bdag cag gi zong 'di rtsir gsol /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-20: gang pos kyang de nyid du chos dang mthun par bsgyur ba gser 'bum lhag cig rnyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-21: gang bos kyang pha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-23: bdag gi tshong khang nas bsgyur ba'i rdzas kyang rtsir gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-26: khyod la ci zhig rtsir yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-31: brtsis nas gang po yang rigs par bsgrubs pa bzhi po nyid ma gtogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-34: dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-36: bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa zhig lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-37: 'dis 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du gser 'bum snyed cig grub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36a-39: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-0: khyim bdag 'byor pa nad kyis btab par @36b gyur nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-1: bdag shi ba dang 'di dag 'bye bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-4: des de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-6: shing skam po dag lta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-7: de rnams kyis shing dag sta gon dag byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-10: de rnams kyis me bus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-12: mgal ba re re nas phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-13: de rnams kyis mgal ba re re nas phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-14: me de shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-20: des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-21: mgal ba tshogs pas me 'bar ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-22: spun tshogs pa yang de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-23: mgal ba phral na shi 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-24: mi rnams kyang ni de dang 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-26: nga shi nas khyed cag gis bud med kyi tshig mnyan par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-27: bud med kyis ni bza' dag 'byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-28: sngar ma rnams ni ngag gis 'byed ngan la smras pas gsang tshig 'phel //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-32: 'byor len de nyid na 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-34: bu khyod kyis ji ltar gyur kyang gang po gtang bar mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-36: bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-38: bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-39: mthon po rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-40: phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste; ;gson pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-42: dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-43: de rnams kyis de ras sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:36b-46: dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-0: @37a *// bkur sti cher byas nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-1: de nas mya ngan sangs pa byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-2: gang gi tshe bdag cag gi pha gson pa de'i tshe ni srog de la rag las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-4: gal te de 'tsho nam yal bar bor te 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-6: nye du rnams kyis kyang dpyas par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-7: ma la bdag cag zod thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-10: gal te de lta na bdag kyang mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-12: khyod 'di nyid du 'dug la tshong khang gi bya ba dag byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-13: kho bo cag kho na 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis zong khyer te yul gzhan du dong ngo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-15: bam po nyi shu bzhi pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-16: gang po la ni dgos pa thams cad gtad nas de nyid na gnas so; ;chos nyid kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-17: phyug pa'i khyim bdag na nyin re zhing 'god pa 'bog pa yin pas de dag gi chung mas bran mo dag mngags te 'god pa nod du btang ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-21: gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-22: de dag gis skabs ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-24: de dag langs te dong par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-25: de dag la nyin par gyi 'god pa phog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-26: bu mo de dag ring zhig lon te 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37a-28: bu mo khyed cag ring zhig cis thogs zhes spyos pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-1: gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bur gzi brjid 'bar zhing bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-2: gang gi tshe de dag langs te mchis pa de'i tshe phog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-4: gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-5: 'byor len gyi chung mas bran mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-6: ring mo zhig tu ci'i phyir thogs des skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-9: khyod kyis dus shes par byos la song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-10: des dus shes par byas nas song ba dang myur du thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-12: ring du thogs par gyur nas de dag gis de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-16: de dag kyang de dang lhan cig 'dong bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-17: gang po yang tshong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-20: gzhan yang rjes su 'tsho ba rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-21: de dag kyang dong nas des de la nyin par gyi 'god pa phog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-22: de dag gis kyang myur du thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-23: de dag gi jo mo dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-24: myur du 'khor ba 'di la rgyu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-26: jo mo thu mo snyun mi mnga' bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-27: gang gi tshe de'i bran mo mchis pa de'i tshe phog lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-28: bdag cag de dang 'grogs te mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-29: de dag mi bzod pa skyes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:37b-30: gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dag dbang phyug la dbang byed pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38a-4: 'byor dga' rnams lhan cig tu dga' zhing mthun rgya mtsho chen po nas gru bo che grub ste 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38a-5: 'byor len gyis chung ma la dris pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38a-11: gzhan dag la khyim thab dag gis smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38a-13: gang dag gi khyim na bran mo'i bu dbang phyug la dbang bgyis pa de dag la yong yang de ltar 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38a-16: mdza' bshes kyi dbyen du 'gyur ro snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38a-17: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38a-33: ka shi ka'i ras yug stsal la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:38b-10: mna' ma dag gis mthong nas smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:39a-2: 'on te tshong khang na yod pa dang yul gzhan na yod pa blangs na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:39a-20: gzu bo mi lnga ci dgos kyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:40a-0: bud med kyi gos kyi mthar ma sha @40a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:52a-26: de dag rgyal po'i drung du dong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:52b-1: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te zhal zas gsol bar 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:52b-2: lhas bdag cag la bstang du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:52b-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po khang steng du 'dzegs nas rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su kha bltas te /
