K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57a-25: de nas de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57a-26: bcom ldan la sems mngon par dad pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57a-28: drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57a-30: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57a-31: de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57a-32: de thos nas de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs @57b su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-2: bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-3: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag cag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-7: de dag la dge slong tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-8: tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod la skra dang kha spu byi ba dang snam sbyar gyon par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-10: lag na lhung bzed dang bya ma bum thogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-11: skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-12: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-13: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-14: skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-15: mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-16: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bka' bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-17: de dag gis 'bad pa dang bcas pas brtson 'grus brtsams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-18: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-19: mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-20: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-21: de dag la 'doms par byed pa'i drang srong gang yin pa des gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:57b-23: bdag gi cha byad 'dis skye bo'i tshogs chen po bslus pa de dag je dad pa skyes par bgyis la slad kyis rab tu dbyung bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-1: nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-2: sngon gyi dge slong rnams kyis zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas de nyid rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' la gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-3: rim gyis gtun ri la byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-4: de'i tshe gtun ri la drang srong shing gos can zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-5: drang srong des bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba nas kun nas mdzes pa rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-6: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-7: mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-8: de dad pa skyes nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-9: ma la bdag ri las babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-10: bcom ldan 'das blta zhing 'gror ni bcom ldan 'das gdul ba la gzigs pas 'das par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-11: ma la bdag nyid mchong bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-13: de ri las bdag nyid mchongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-15: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-20: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-21: de thos nas shing gos can gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-1: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-2: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-4: dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-6: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-7: ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-10: nga'i dge slong dad pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-13: dge slong shing gos can no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-15: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer slo ma lta bur gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-17: gal te sgo gcig nas zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-18: gzhan dag gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-19: ma la nga rdzu 'phrul kho nas 'jug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-21: de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las grong khyer slo ma lta bu'i dbus su gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-22: de nas slo ma lta bu'i bdag po rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-23: tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-24: shing gi rna cha can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-25: rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-26: zha nye'i rna cha can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:58b-27: rgyal po'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zham ring byas shing tsandan gyi phreng ba'i @59a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-1: khang bzang gang na ba der gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-2: byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-3: skye bo'i tshogs chen po des bcom ldan 'das ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-4: tsandan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzang zhig la thug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-6: gal te tsandan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzang zhig par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-7: sbyin bdag rnams kyi bsod nams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-8: ma la ngas 'di shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-11: de ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur bar shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-12: de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-14: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-15: de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag rtogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-17: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-19: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-21: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-27: rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59a-29: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-0: kha cig gis @59b ni; rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-3: 'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-5: dge 'dun la bab par bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-6: de nas shing gi rna cha can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-7: rgya skegs kyi rna cha can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-8: zha nye'i rna cha can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-9: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-10: bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas gdan bshams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-11: nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-12: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-14: gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-15: bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-16: de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-17: goo ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-18: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer slo ma lta bu na chos 'chad kyi dong nas mnyan par bya'o snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-19: de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang grong khyer slo ma lta bur chu bo lnga brgya phab nas chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-22: klu'i rgyal po nag po dang ge ta ma 'di gnyis gal te grong khyer slo ma lta bur 'ongs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-23: yul phung par byed par 'gyur ro snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:59b-25: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod snyoms @60a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-13: bcom ldan 'das dge bskos su dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-14: bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' las gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-15: bcom ldan 'das dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-16: klu'i rgyal po nag po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-17: go'u ta ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-19: grong khyer slo ma lta bu la soms la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-20: yul phung par ma bya zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-23: bdag cag gang srog chags grog sbur la yang gnod pa mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i dad pas mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-24: slo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-26: klu'i rgyal po nag po dang go'u ta ma la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-27: de thos nas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol ba'i mdzad pa brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-29: klu re re nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60a-31: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis chu'i btung ba gsol lo snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-0: @60b gal te gcig gi chu gsol na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-1: des na gzhan dag gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-5: gang na chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chus lhung bzed khongs la khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-8: zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gang du chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de nas cus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-10: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-11: bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i chu phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-13: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-18: bsrings bskyed de nu mas bsnun /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-19: 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu dga' ba byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-21: phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-22: gcig shos la ni pha bzhag nas lo brgya tshang bar khur du thogs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:60b-23: sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-0: de lta bu'i dbang phyug la bdag por bcug kyang bus @61a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-1: pha ma la de tsam gyis phan thogs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-4: pha ma dad pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-6: so sor 'god par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-7: tshul khrims 'chal ba tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-8: ser sna can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-9: shes rab 'chal ba shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-13: bus pha dang ma la phan thogs pa dang lan lon pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-16: ma la lan ci yang ma lon gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-17: ma la bdag gis bdag gi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-18: bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-21: de sus gdul ba yin par brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis yin par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-24: bdag lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-25: ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don 'di gsol lo snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-26: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61a-31: bu la shin tu dga' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-0: bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du skyes @61b te; de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'dul bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-8: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi rtse mo la gom pa por zhing gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-9: zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-11: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-12: mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-14: yun ring po zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-16: yun ring mo ring mo zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-17: de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-23: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-26: des na kho bo'i ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-29: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-30: de dang mthun par 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:61b-31: de thos nas bu mo bzang mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-2: des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-3: zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi rnams su rab tu bzhag ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-5: nyes pa mang por ldan pas mi bzad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-6: ngan song lam ni khyod kyi mthus bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-7: mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-8: mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-9: khyod la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-10: nyes dang bral bas dag pa deng 'dir thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-11: 'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi thob nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-12: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol bdag gis brgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-13: 'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-14: skye rga 'chi dang na dang rnam bral ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-15: srid pa stong du rnyed par rab dka' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-16: thub pa khyod mthong deng 'dir 'bras bur bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-22: dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-23: dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-24: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyabs su mchi bar mngon par spro lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-25: bcom ldan 'das mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs cig tu deng bsod snyoms sbyor zhing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62a-28: bu mo bzang po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-0: de nas bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig @62b ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-2: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-3: gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-4: bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-5: rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-7: rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-9: phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-10: stan dma' ba zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bting nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-12: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos blangs te 'khru bar byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-22: rgyal byed kyi tshal soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-27: de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid kyis gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-30: mo'u 'gal gyi bu yid mgyogs yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-32: sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-33: bdag gi glo bar ma chud do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:62b-34: gal te bdag gis glo bar chud par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-0: bdag gi lus til gyi phye ma ltar bgyis kyang bla na @63a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-1: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-3: shing tshig pa bzhin cir bgyir yang ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-4: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-5: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-7: tshe dang ldan pa gang pos las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-8: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-10: longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-12: des bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-13: dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-16: gang po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-18: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-19: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-20: gang pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-22: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-23: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-26: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-28: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-31: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63a-32: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-0: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs @63b dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-1: rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-4: sngon byung ba bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-5: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-6: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-7: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-8: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-9: de grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-10: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-11: chos bzhin gyis dge 'dun gyi zhal ta pa byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-12: re zhig cig na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge bskos bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-13: des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-14: rlung langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-16: re zhig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar du gzhag go snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-17: ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta pa des mthong nas; de kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-18: bran mo'i bu gang zhig dge bskos byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-19: dgra bcom pa des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-21: 'di kun nas dkris pa yin pas re zhig bzhag la phyis go bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-23: gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:63b-24: khyod kyis kho bo su yin shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-1: dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-3: gal te de lta yin mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-5: rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-7: 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-9: 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-10: khyod kyis ngag rtsub po'i las phyung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-11: nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-12: des na las de srab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-15: des nyes pa las nyes par bshags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-16: sems can dmyal bar skye zhing bran mo'i bur 'gyur ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-17: de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes par tshe rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-18: da ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-19: gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-22: longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-23: gang yang de na bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-25: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-26: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-27: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-28: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64a-31: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gcig tu gnag pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-0: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin @64b pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-6: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-8: las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsam par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-10: khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-12: dge slong dag yi rang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-16: de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-17: klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-19: dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag tu 'bab la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-22: mtshe'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-23: lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-24: lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-25: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-26: de gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-27: nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong ngo; ;de nas klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-28: ri bo 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-29: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-31: ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:64b-32: bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-0: ma la bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das @65a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-3: de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-8: de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-9: de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-10: chos dang dge 'dun la'ang skyabs su dong nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-11: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-12: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-13: de gnyis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-15: bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-16: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-17: lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-19: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-20: bdag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-23: khyed rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65a-25: de gnyis kyis bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-0: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis @65b rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-2: klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-3: ri bo'i kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-4: gal te nub mo bcom ldan 'das bltar 'gro na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-5: lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-7: khyim bdag gi cha byad kyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-8: de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas shing nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-9: rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun du spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-10: de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das blta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-12: ldang bar mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen gtong bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-13: des mi gnang chen zhig mngags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-15: nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-16: de song ba las ji tsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-17: khyim bdag gnyis shig mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-19: lha'i yul na gnas pas ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-20: des rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-21: lha khyim bdag gnyis shig mchis pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-22: lha'i yul nyid na gnas pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-23: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-24: de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-26: snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-27: klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-28: ri bos rgyal po gzugs can snying po mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:65b-29: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-1: po gzugs can snying po mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-3: re zhig rgyal po la bsti stang bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-7: chos la bsti stang byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-11: chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar byed do; ;tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-12: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-13: ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-14: da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-15: mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad pa; ;bzhud dang bzhugs dang 'byon 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-16: thams cad dam chos bla mar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-19: bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa yis; ;sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-20: dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-21: de gnyis kyis ldang ba ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-22: de nas rgyal po mi bzod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-26: zhe sdang dang ni 'khrug pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-27: ma dad pa yi sems kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-28: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-29: dam chos shes par mi nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-30: gang gis khros dang bag med pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-31: sems ni dul bar byas pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66a-32: 'di la mnar sems spangs pa des //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-0: legs par gsungs @66b pa shes par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-6: de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-7: khyim bdag 'di gnyis gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ba de'i tshe khyed gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces sgos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-8: de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-9: blon po bdag gis bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-11: khyed cag gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug cig ces gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-16: yun ring po zhig nas bsam pa gang yin pa de ni tshegs chung dus grub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-18: de nas 'od pa'i chu chen po nas phyung nas grog mo chung ngu'i nang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-19: grog mo chung du nas grog mo chen por ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-20: grog mo chen po nas chu bran du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-21: chu bran nas chu chen por ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-22: chu chen po nas rgya mtsho chen por te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-23: gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-24: de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod shin tu 'phel bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-25: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-26: rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:66b-29: mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-2: lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma bab pas lo nyes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-3: mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-5: rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang grog mkhar gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-7: dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-11: lhas kyang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pa nyid kyis lo tog legs par rgyas par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-13: dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-16: mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-19: lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-20: mu ge nyam nga ba dgon pa slong mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-21: klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-23: bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis khyer ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-24: sbrul khas sdigs kyis bzung ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-25: des 'jigs nas bros par ma gyur grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-29: thams cad gzigs pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-30: ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-32: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-1: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-6: bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis kyang ma khyer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-7: sbrul khas sdigs kyis kyang ma bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-8: des 'jigs pas kyang ma bros mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-9: rgyal po khyod nyid kyis yul nas bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-11: bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar yang mi dran na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-12: de gnyis yul nas bskrad pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-15: rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas bskrad pa dran nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-19: klu'i rgyal po ri po dang grog mkhar yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-22: rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-23: bdag gi yul ma rung bar gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-25: de gnyis la bzod pa byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-27: de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-30: bcu bzhi la khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-31: nga'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-33: khyod kyis bzod pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-36: bdag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:67b-37: rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-0: 'on kyang lag pa rkyongs la klu'i dbang po bzod par @68a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-2: zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-3: rgyal pos de gnyis 'ongs pa la 'bad de sdod cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-5: de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-6: de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-8: rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyangs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-9: klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod par gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-12: gal te bzod par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-14: rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag gis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-15: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pas de nyid kyi tshe bdag cag gi lus dang longs spyod skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-16: gal te da che bzhin du 'dir 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-17: yul ma ga dha ru yang mi shong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-18: 'o na yul ma ga dha ma rung bar 'gyur mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-21: khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzang gnyis brtsigs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-22: zla ba drug cing dus mchod kyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-23: kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-24: dus mchod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-25: rgyal pos de bzhin du byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-26: de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang bzhag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-27: dus mchod kyang rang nyid nyams su myong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-28: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-29: de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68a-30: klu gdug pa dag gis glags rnyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-0: @68b de dag gis ser ba dbab par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-2: bram ze ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-3: des de bab cing bab pa dag bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-4: de la yul ma ga dha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis dbang thang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-6: bram ze mes byin zhes bya ba ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhig yod pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-8: yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-9: de na rgyal po sde mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-10: de'i yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-11: de na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-14: rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-15: bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chang ba de'i gnas su zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-17: ser ba chen po 'bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des gcad par ma nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-19: nang du zhugs par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-20: bram ze mes byin gyis dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-22: ci'i slad du mkhan po 'di phyir byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-23: nang du zhugs par mdzad des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-25: ser ba chen po bab pa gcad par ma nus par bas mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-28: de chu nyung zhig la bzlas te gtor bas tshal pa brgyar gyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-29: rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas rngan pa thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-30: bram ze de'i khyim du dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:68b-32: rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo'i tshogs mngon par dga' bar gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-3: khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i slad du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-8: de dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-10: de bzhin du gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-12: des ser ba de dus tha gi tsam zhig gi bar du sngags kyis bgags te mi 'bab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-13: rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-14: khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-16: bdag cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis ser ba mi 'bab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-17: ci'i phyir de la dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-18: bram ze des sngags brtul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang phyir yang ser ba 'bab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-19: de rnams bram ze de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-21: bram ze'i khye'u de gar mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-23: khyed cag gis de la bkur sti ma byas pas de song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-28: de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-29: rgyal po sde mchog la rgyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-30: tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-31: lha khyod kyi yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-32: mod la mthu skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sman mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69a-34: lha'i skal ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-2: klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-3: gtum po yin pas des khyod brlag par mi byed grang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-5: re zhig bdag la sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-6: gal te klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis dzambu'i gling 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-7: bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-8: 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin gang bar gyur kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-9: bdag gi ba spu gcig kyang bskyod par rngo mi thogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-10: klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-11: 'on kyang lha'i mi dgum pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-16: des de'i gnas ston par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-17: de nas rgyal pos mi de la bos te bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-19: bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-21: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas bram ze de khrid de chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-23: mi ring ba zhig tu bsdad nas de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-25: tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag sbrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-28: klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-30: des der mod la mthu bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du sbrags nas des de thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-31: yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal pa byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-32: rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-33: bram ze de nyid kyi khyim du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:69b-34: de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-0: de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags @70a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-1: nas; bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-4: khyed cag gis bkur sti ma byas pas kho bo mi 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-5: de rnams kyis de gzhag par gal gyis 'chu bar brtsams te gsol ba btab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-6: khas blangs nas de dag gis 'tsho ba'i ris bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-9: rgyud pa dang mi mthun pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-10: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-11: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-16: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na; khye'u zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-17: des de'i ming ri bo can zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-21: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na bu mo zhig btsas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-23: ser ba zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-29: yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing ci las med yun ring rab tu sngags kyis bgag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-30: zhes des yun ring por sngags kyis bgag pa byas te bzhag pas ser ba mi 'bab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-31: rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-32: bdag kho na'i bsod nams kyi mthus ser ba mi 'bab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70a-33: ci'i phyir dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-0: bram ze de phrag dog gis zil gyis non pas bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin @70b du ma bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-1: bde ba la chags pas kha ton yang ma byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-2: sman yang skam du ma bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-3: des sngags kyi tshig rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-6: ma bskams pas rul bar gyur to; ;de rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la snying na ches nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-7: de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-8: dka' thub kyi tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-10: gang gis gang bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-11: gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-12: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-17: g-yang sa nas bdag nyid mchongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-19: bdag rang gi ske la thag pa thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-20: shing gi yal ga las 'phyang du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-21: ces thams cad kyis 'chi ba'i thabs bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-24: de rim gyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-25: des dge slong zhig mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-27: gang gis gang bsam pa dang gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta 'ga' mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-29: bcom ldan 'das las rab tu phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-31: der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-32: bsam gtan dang gdon pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:70b-33: gal te re zhig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-0: des na de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal @71a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-1: gyi mthar phyin pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-2: 'on te sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin dus byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-4: gang don du gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro; ;'phags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-5: de ni rngo mi thogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-6: gzhan yang cung zad ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-7: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-8: de yang rngo mi thogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:71a-10: bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-11: gal te kho bos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-12: bsnyen bkur ji 'dra ba byas pa de kho na 'dra bar yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-13: de lta na kho bos rjes su gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-15: yangs pa can rnams la rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-18: rgyal po mi gcig pur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-20: bdag cag tshogs su gyur pas ci ste mi bya zhes de dag gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-22: bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang ches khyad par 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-24: zhes spring ngo; ;de nas mda' bo ches don de dag rgyal po la rig par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-25: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-26: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:80b-29: lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-0: @81a *// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-2: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-5: snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par spro lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-6: bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas gnang bar mi 'gyur lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-8: bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-10: lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-11: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-12: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-13: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-14: gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-17: gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81a-20: klu'i rgyal po sog ma med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-0: @81b 'di; yun ring mo zhig nas bdag cag la sha 'khon ma mchis par ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-4: gnod pa ma mchis par ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-5: gnod pa bgyid par gyur te; lo tog gang dag skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzon par bgyid lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-6: bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste klu'i rgyal po sog ma med legs par gdul bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-8: lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-10: lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la yon bsngo ba mdzad nas gshegs te gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-11: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-13: byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-17: me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-18: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-19: chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-21: skye bo'i tshogs drang po yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-22: zhes gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:81b-23: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-0: rgyal po'i khab nas chu bo gangg'a'i bar gyi lam dang grong khyer @82a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-1: dag che thang du stor du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-4: gyo mo thams cad bsal nas tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-5: dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi pog phor dag bshams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-6: dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po dpyangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-7: bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang dag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-8: yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-9: chu bo gangg'a nas yangs pa can gyi bar du de bas lhag par khyad par du 'phags par lam dang grong khyer dag stor du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-13: n'a landa gang na ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-16: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-18: yul ma ga dha'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-20: n'a landa na aa mra'i tshal dgag dbye can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-21: de'i tshe n'a landa na kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-25: btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lon pa zhig gnas pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-27: khyim bdag rnams pa kur sti byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82a-32: de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa'i sngon gyi grogs po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-0: snag gi gnyen @82b mtshams su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-2: gal te bdag gis kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-6: gang yang bdag gi tshig mi snyan pa de srid pas ma la bdag de'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-7: yid kyi dri ba 'dzin du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-10: kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas kun tu 'dam bu'i tshong pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-12: kho bo las yid kyi dri ba longs la kun chub par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-13: ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-14: ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-17: drang srong gang zhig khyod kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pas sems rangs par byed pa de'i thad du khyod tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-18: ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to; ;de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-19: lha de las yid kyi dri ba bzung ste kun chub par byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-20: 'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyi drung du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:82b-21: yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-0: ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma @83a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-3: de'i yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-5: lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-6: de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-9: bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-11: lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-12: de kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-13: smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-14: mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-15: ka ta'i bu nog can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-16: gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-17: gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i mdun du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-18: ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gyis kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-19: bdag gis yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-21: lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-22: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-23: de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83a-25: gang la yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pa mi thob pa de 'dra ba'i rab tu byung bas bdag la ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-0: bdag gi nye du rnams la @83b longs spyod rgya cher yod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-1: ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa la yang longs spyod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-7: dge sbyong go'u ta ma gang na ba der 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-8: snyam nas de chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-11: dge sbyong dang bram ze rgan rabs gang yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-12: 'od srung rdzogs byed nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gong ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-13: de rnams kyis re zhig yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus pa rnams kyang mi shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-15: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-17: gsar du rab tu byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsam ste slar ldog par 'dod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-20: sngon gyi kun tu rgyu rnying pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-23: spyod pa'i slob dpon dag las bdag gis dge slong gzhon nu la brnyas par mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-24: dge slong gzhon nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-25: dge slong gzhon nu yang de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-27: mthu che bar gyur pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-28: zhes thos so snyam du bsam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-29: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid kyi zhu ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:83b-31: ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis kun tu rgyu 'dam @84a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-1: bu'i tshong pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-2: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-3: mdza' bo gzhan la rnam par smod byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-4: de ni bdag tu zad do zhes smra la; ;las kyang sla rgu 'dam zhing byed pa da //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-5: bdag gi bshes ma yin par shes par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-6: gang zhig bden pa ma yin tshig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-7: mdza' bo dag la smra byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-8: smra la las su mi byed pa'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-9: mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs shes te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-11: mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par shes par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-12: ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-13: gang zhig rtag tu bdag med dbye ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-14: bsam pas glags lta de ni mdza' min gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-15: gang zhig 'dir ni snying dang 'dra gyur par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-16: gzhan gyis mi phyed de ni mdza' bo yin; ;de lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-17: bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-19: skyes bu gces pa mthar 'byin cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-20: 'bras bu lta bar byed pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-21: rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-22: rab bsngags 'dren pa'i zhi ba bsgom //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-23: de don du gnyer bar bsgom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-24: ji ltar nad med 'thob ce na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-25: rab tu dben pa'i ro dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-26: nye bar zhi ba'i ro shes nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-27: chos la dga' ba'i ro 'thung ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-28: nad med sdig pa med par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84a-31: de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-0: dge sbyong go'u ta @84b ma'i thugs kyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-1: bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-2: snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-4: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-5: bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i spyan sngar bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-6: kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshang pa legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-7: de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa des zhes bya ba nas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-8: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-11: dmar bu can gyi grong du 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-14: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can na nub mo nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:84b-19: khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ma shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-4: nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-5: ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-6: nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-8: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ma shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-9: ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-10: ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-13: ngas sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-15: sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-16: srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-20: bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-21: ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-22: nga dang khyed cag kho na yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:85a-23: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag /
