K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-12: mchod pas kyang ni mchod par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-13: de nas lto nas byung ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-14: bu la ma bzhin 'di la brtse //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-15: lha rnams brtse bas skyes bus ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-16: bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-20: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-21: de nas ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-22: der rgyus lhag gang yin pa de thams cad sbyin par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di snyam du sems te sems las mngon par 'du byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90a-23: bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo gang nas phyir gshegs pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-0: bdag @90b gis go'u ta ma'i sgo zhes gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-1: chu bo gangg'a'i 'jug ngogs gang nas brgal ba de yang go'u ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-4: dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag gshegs nas byang phyogs su rgyu ste chu bo gangg'a gang na bar gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-5: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-7: ma la bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar bya'o snyam du bsam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-8: rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-9: yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-10: lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rang nyid lhag par spro bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-11: ci'i phyir bdag cag gis spro bar mi bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-12: de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-14: re zhig mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la lhag par spro bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-15: bdag cag klu rnams ni; rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-16: ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:90b-17: de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-0: @91a *// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-1: re zhig mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la lhag par spro bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-2: mngon sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-3: de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-4: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-5: lha dang mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la spro bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-6: bdag cag gis ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-7: de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-10: 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-14: re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na bdag gdugs 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-15: snyam pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-17: lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-18: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91a-19: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin @91b las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-2: bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-3: lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-7: sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan na las byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-8: tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-10: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-14: mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-17: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-18: legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-19: rgyal po de la bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-20: rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-21: bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid de 'khyam par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-22: btsun mo rnams kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-23: rgyal po 'di'i kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-24: sras btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid nas 'khyam par mdzad pas bdag cag bu yod bzhin du bu med pa dang 'dra'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-27: gal te bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-28: des rgyal po la gdags par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-31: btsun mo gzhan zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-32: de de dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:91b-33: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-9: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-12: btsun mo de dag thams cad khye'u de la bu'i sdug pa skyes so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-14: bam po nyi shu bdun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-15: de nas dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-16: rgyal po legs mthong chen po shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling nas rin po che sna bdun gyis sna drangs shing khams kyi rgyal phran stong gis yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-17: bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-18: gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong bas lhag par spa zhing 'ongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-19: gzhon nu khang bzang gi steng na 'dug pa des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-22: mchi ba pha bi su lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-24: khyod kyi yab rgyal po legs mthong chen po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-29: rgyal po de'i sras stong du gcig gis ma chang ba zhig yod pa de dag thams cad kyi phu bo gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-32: thams cad kyi nu bo yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92a-35: gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal por mi 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-0: bdag dad pa yang dag pa @92b kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-1: btsun mo de dag thams cad kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-3: khyod la bdag cag gi bu'i sdug pa nyams su myong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-6: gdon ma 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-7: de dag gis de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-10: dam zhig bcas nas gnang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-11: gang yang khyod kyi yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-12: de khyod kyis bdag cag la smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-14: de de dag gis gnang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-15: de mtha' gcig tu song ste mkhan po dang slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsva bdun gyi chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-16: rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-17: bdag gis ma de rnams la khas blangs pa smra dgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-18: song la sngon gyi dam bcas pa mthar dbyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-20: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-21: ngag gis chos mi ston gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-23: des de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-26: glog 'byin pa dag gi cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-28: rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-29: de dag shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-31: khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:92b-35: bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-0: @93a *// bdag cag kyang bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-1: khyod 'di nyid du skyed mos tshal du bzhugs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-2: bdag cag gis rgyun du bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-3: rang sangs rgyas des khas blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-4: de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-5: rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-7: bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-8: ma la bdag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-10: de nas de ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-13: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag kyang bstan nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-14: de nas de dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-15: spungs nas bsregs te me'i phung po de 'o mas bsad nas rus pa de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-16: gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste skyed mos tshal de nyid du rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-20: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93a-24: de nas dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-0: rgyal po legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas @93b sos ka'i dus la bab pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-1: me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-8: shang shang te'u skad 'byin pa'i tshal gseb tu skyed mos tshal gyi gzhir song nas de skyed mos tshal du 'khyams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-9: dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-10: des skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mi la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-19: de nas des btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-20: de dag gis rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-25: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-28: bu rgyal srid la mngon par dga' na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-29: de kho bo la ma gsol ba bzang po ma yin pa zhig byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-30: gal te gsol bar gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-31: kho bo de kho na la rgyal srid dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-32: 'on kyang ngas bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang gdugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-35: zhes de nas de bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:93b-40: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs mthong gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-2: gang yang ngas de na bu la byams pas rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten la gdugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-5: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-6: ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-7: las de kho na'i lhag mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-8: da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-9: lha dang mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-10: dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-12: ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu ma rtogs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-14: ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-16: nga'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-17: ngas nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod du rnam par smin par bsngos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-18: gal te mu tig bre gang gis 'bras bre gang khugs kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-19: 'on kyang nga'i nyan thos rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-20: bsod snyoms kyis phongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-23: las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-24: gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsam par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-26: khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-27: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-29: dge slong de dag yi rang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-0: yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras @94b gru zam 'jugs su bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-1: yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam btsugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-4: rna ma par ltung ba'i lus can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-5: ma la bdag cag gis gdengs ka'i zam pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-6: bcom ldan 'das chu bo gangg'a las bsgral bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-7: snyam nas de rnams kyis gdengs ka'i zam pa btsugs so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-10: gang zhig lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las chu bo gangg'a brgal bar spro ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-12: gang zhig yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis gru zam btsugs pa las spro ba gang yin pa de yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-14: nga yang dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gangg'a brgal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-16: lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga dha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las brgal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-18: yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyi gru zam las so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las brgal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-20: de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:94b-21: kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran bor te rgya mtsho brgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-0: skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo @95a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan bram ze brgal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-3: dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha' na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-4: gal te kun na chu yod khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-5: sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-7: sa phyogs gzhan zhig na mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa phyogs shig gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-8: gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-10: khyod rgyal po sgra chen gyi lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-11: sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-12: thams cad gser las byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-13: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-15: bsod nams dag byas nas chu bo gangg'a'i nang du bor ba gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-18: de lta ba de'i dus la bab lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-20: de'i tshod la bab lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang mchod sdong de bsgrengs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-22: dge slong rnams lta bar 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-27: bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95a-28: 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag gis sa la reg par mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-0: bcom ldan 'das ci'i @95b phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-1: mchod sdong gzigs par bzhed par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-2: de nas de dag gis bsgrengs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-3: dge slong rnams kyis mchod sdong lta bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-4: tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-5: 'dod pa chung ba yin pas mtha' gcig tu song nas phyag dar khrod pa dag 'tshem mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-14: dge slong rnams mchod sdong la lta ba bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-15: tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-16: 'dod pa chung bas mtha' gcig tu mchis nas phyag dar khrod pa 'tshem pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-18: re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-19: 'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-20: gal te re zhig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du lags na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-22: 'dod chags bral ba zhig mchis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-23: 'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-27: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-28: sngon bsten pa'i phyir yang yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-31: sngon byung ba rgyal po rab sgrog ces bya ba zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:95b-32: de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang grogs por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-1: med nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-2: nor rdzas mang po zhig bsags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-4: bdag shi na rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-6: de nas brgya byin gyis mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-8: khyod ci'i phyir lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-12: nor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-14: bdag shi na rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad par 'gyur bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-17: khyod sems khong du chud par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-18: gal te lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos byung bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-19: de khyod kyi bur bsko bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-20: chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'chi 'pho'i chos 'byung ba la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-22: gos ma rnying pa rnams rnying par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-23: me tog gi phreng ba ma rnying pa dag rnying par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-24: lus las dri mi zhim pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-25: mchan khung gnyis nas rdul 'dzag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-26: rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-28: lha'i bu zhig la snga ltas lnga byung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-29: de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-31: rgyal po rab sgrog gi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96a-35: bag med pa'i gnas yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-1: nyes pa mang po byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-2: chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-5: grogs po khyod la ngas dran par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-8: dga' ba mang pos bag med pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-11: 'on kyang kho bos khyod la dran par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-12: de nas rgyal po rab sgrog gi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-13: gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams blangs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-14: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te zhes bya ba nas sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-15: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing tshogs nas ming 'dogs par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-17: gnyen rnams kyis smras pa; gang gi nyi ma kho na la khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-19: khye'u'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-20: zhes de'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-21: khye'u sgra chen ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-23: klog pa la mkhas shing shes nyen can du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-24: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:96b-25: de rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-0: sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan @97a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-1: nas gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-2: las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-3: glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-20: sgra drag par phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-22: mi tshor bar phog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-25: de rnams la shin tu byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-27: re zhig pha ji tsam gson gyi bar du bu'i ming mi grags pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-29: rgyal po rab sgrog shi nas sgra chen rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-30: des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-31: de nas brgya byin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-33: kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrog gi bur bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-34: chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97a-35: sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-0: des tha gi tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du @97b bcug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-1: lan gnyis su yang brgya byin gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-3: kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrog gi bur bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-4: chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-5: sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-8: bdag cag rgyal po rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-9: dga' ba mang pos bag med pas skad cig tu brjed par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-10: bdag la khyod kyis mtshan ma zhig zhog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-11: bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-13: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las thams cad pa la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-15: song la khyod kyis rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-16: lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-17: sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-18: thams cad gser las byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-19: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-20: de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-21: lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-22: sbom du 'dom drug cu yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-23: thams cad gser las byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-24: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:97b-25: de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis mchod sbyin gyi khang ba rtsig tu bcug nas rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mchod sdong gi zhal ta bar bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-0: de nas mchod sdong la 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi thams cad lta bar spro bas lhags @98a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-2: zan zos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las sgrub par mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-3: de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin ming du par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-4: blon po rnams kyis dpya nyung du phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-5: rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-7: ci'i phyir dpya nyung zad cig dbul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-9: 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs mchis nas 'tshal ma 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la lta zhing mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-10: rang gi las grub par mi bgyid pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-11: zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-12: dpya thang bzhin mi 'du lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-14: mchod sbyin gyi khang pa drol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-15: de rnams kyis de dral na yang de bzhin du skye bo'i tshogs de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-16: rang gi las sgrub par mi byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-17: zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas de bzhin rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-18: rgyal pos dris pa; shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-19: mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-20: ci phyir da dung dpya nyung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-21: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-23: skye bo'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-24: rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyid pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98a-25: zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas des na dpya nyung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-0: de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis @98b sbyin pa dag byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-1: bsod nams dag byas nas mchod sdong de chu bo gangg'a'i nang du bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-4: rgyal po rab sgrog gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-5: dge slong legs ldan 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-8: mchod sdong 'di gang du zhig par 'gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-11: ma 'ongs pa na mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-12: mi tshe lo brgyad khri ba rnams kyi rgyal po dung zhes bya ba yang dag par sdom pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-13: 'khor los bsgyur ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-14: chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-15: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-16: de'i rin po che sna bdun ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-20: glang po rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-22: nor bu rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-23: bud med rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-24: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-26: blon po rin po che nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-30: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-31: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-32: de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par ba sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid 'tshe ba med cing mtshon gyis 'debs pa med la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:98b-33: chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-0: rgyal po dung gi mdun na 'don bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe zhes @99a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-3: tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-4: de byams pa chad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-5: bu byams pa zhes bya ba zhig btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-7: bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-8: des bram ze'i khye'u de rnams byams pa la gtad nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-9: bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khri po rnams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-10: bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-11: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis gter chen po bzhi po; ka lingka nas dmar ser te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-12: mi thi la nas skya bo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-14: w'a ra n'a si'i grong na dung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-15: mchod sdong 'di yang khyer nas rgyal po dung la dbul bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-16: rgyal po dung gis kyang bram ze tshangs pa'i che la sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-17: bram ze tshangs pa'i tshes kyang bram ze'i khye'u byams pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-18: bram ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de rnams la'o; ;de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mchod sdong de dum bu dum bur bcad nas 'gyed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-19: de nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99a-20: mchod sdong de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas de nyid kyis skyo ba skyes nas nags su 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99b-0: gang gi nyi ma kho na la lags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la byams pa tshad med pa'i yang lag gis rgyas par byas nas bla na med @99b pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99b-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99b-4: gang gi nyi ma kho na la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99b-5: bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba de kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin po che sna bdun nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:99b-6: rgyal po dung yang khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri'i 'khor dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-1: bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-2: bdag rigs pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-3: ci nas kyang bdag zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-5: de nas sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dri ma med pa g-yo ba thogs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-7: do shal gyis lus brgyan nas de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-11: man d'a ra ba'i me tog gis thu ba bkang nas; shin tu 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-12: de'i nub mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-13: bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-15: de'i tshe sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrog gi 'dug gnas thams cad gsal bar gyur to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-17: bam po nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110a-22: de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-0: ne tso byed pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho @110b ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-1: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-4: bdag la mas ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-8: gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-11: snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-13: bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-23: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-25: rus pa'i ri bo las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-27: ngan song gi sgo rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-29: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-31: thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-39: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:110b-41: dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:111a-3: zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:111a-4: dpa' bo g-yul ngor rgyal ba lta bu dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:111a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:111a-11: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:111a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:111a-13: yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi aa mra'i tshal na bzhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-0: gzhan dag @133b dbang sgyur gang yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-1: gnas kyang de dang 'dra ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-2: 'di nas mi thi lar song la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-3: dge ba mang po rnams bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-4: bsod nams byas shing 'byor byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-5: mtho ris su ni 'gro bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba gang gis dge ba'i lam nges pa de la zhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-8: gang dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa la brten nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong mi thi la'i lha chen po'i aa mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad par gyur pa byung ba gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-9: gzhan yin pa snyam du sems na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-10: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-13: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-14: nga nyid kyis dge ba'i lam nges pa de srol btod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-15: dge ba'i las nges pa srol dod pa la brten nas lha chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis mi thi la 'di nyid na lha chen po'i aa mra'i tshal 'di nyid du rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-18: de'i tshe nga 'dod chags dang bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-20: gti mug dang bcas par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:133b-29: 'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol lo zhes gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-0: nga nyid 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @134a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-2: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-3: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-4: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-7: gti mug dang bral bas skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-15: 'khrug pa las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su grol lo zhes gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-17: de ltar na yang ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa srol gtod pa de la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-18: skye ba'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-27: 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-28: ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-29: dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa de la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can nas sems can 'khrug pa'i chos can gyi bar dag 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba de gang yin zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-31: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-33: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-34: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134a-36: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-1: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-2: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-3: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-5: ngas dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-6: dge ba'i lam nges pa la zhugs pa de la brten nas sems can skye ba'i chos can nas gong ma bzhin du 'khrug pa'i chos nyid las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i bar yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-8: khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes bsab par bya yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-9: rgyun chad par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-10: skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-12: gang la la de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyun du byung ba'i dge ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu'i rjes mi 'tshob pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-13: de rnams kyi rgyun gcod pa yin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-14: de de rnams kyi skyes bu tha shal du gyur ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-17: ci nas kyang khyod kyis de lta bu'i nyan thos bzang po rgyun du byung ba'i lam nges pa srol dod pa de lta bu de'i rjes su sobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-18: rgyun chad par ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-19: skyes bu tha shal du gyur par ma byed cig ces smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-22: lus 'phags gang na ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-24: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags su byon nas lus 'phags kyi phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:134b-26: zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan yin no zhes bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-0: @135a *// skad cig bzhugs nas zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-1: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-3: sa la gang na bar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-5: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-6: bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-7: sa lar byon nas sa la'i bram ze'i grong na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-9: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-10: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-11: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'dis la'i bram ze'i grong na 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-13: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-14: ma la bdag gis sa la'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-15: khyim bdag rnams ji ltar dge sbyong go'u ta mas lhung bzed bkrus te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-16: bkrus pa de kho na bzhin bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed par phyir ldog pa de lta de ltar byin gyis pa brlab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-18: de nas bdud sdig can gyis sa la'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lhung bzed bkrus te sa lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135a-19: bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed par slar byon pa de lta de ltar byin gyis brlabs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-0: @135b de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di skad ces kyang smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-3: bsod snyoms kham 'ga' yang ma rnyed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-9: rnam par dkrug pa'i las byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-10: snyam du thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-11: de bzhin gshegs la khyad bsad pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-12: khyod kyis bsod nams min mang bsags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-13: sangs rgyas rnams ni brgal dka' bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-14: sdig can ji ga mi shes sam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-16: de'i phyir na slar yang sa lar bsod snyoms la bzhud cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-17: ci nas kyang bsod snyoms rnyed pa de ltar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-19: nga la ci yang mi bdog pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-20: skye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-21: 'od gsal lha rnams ji lta bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-22: dga' ba yin ni zas bza' 'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-23: nga la ci yang mi bdog pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-24: kye ma shin tu bder 'tsho ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-25: 'jig tshogs lta la mi brten pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-26: dga' ba yin ni zas bza' 'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-27: de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-28: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems kyi bdag gi bsam pa shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-32: 'gyod pas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan sa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:135b-35: khron pa can gang na par 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-0: @136a *// bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das khron pa can du byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-2: khron pa can na bud med gzhan zhig 'phyang thag dang chu snod khyer te khron pa'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-3: skyes pa gzhan zhig de la chags pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i sems kyis rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-4: de yang lhag par de la chags pas de gnyis phan tshun du 'tham zhing khron par dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-5: de'i bu khye'u chung ngu ma zhig de dang lhan cig phyi bzhin 'brang zhing song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-6: de nas de skyes pa la rtog cing chu snod btang ngo snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-7: khye'u chung de'i mgul na thag pas btags te btang ba las shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-8: de sngon ma thos pa'i tshigs su bcad pa thos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-9: 'dod pa khyod rtsa ngas shes te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-10: rtog pa las ni 'dod pa skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-11: khyod la rtog pa ma byas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-12: de nas nga la mi 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyang lam de nas gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-16: tshigs su bcad pa 'di zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-18: 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-19: 'di so so'i skye bo'i lag tu 'ongs pas mi snang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136a-23: ngas ji ltar sems 'di myur du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-1: de nas bud med de bu'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-6: rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-7: de thos pas bud med des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-8: bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-15: snga ma 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-16: dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-18: rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-20: bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bcom ldan 'das la brten nas ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-21: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-26: lha dang mi rnams su ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-30: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-32: rus pa'i ri bo las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:136b-34: thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-0: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun @137a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-1: du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-9: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-10: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-13: nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-14: phyogs 'di nyid du drang srong ngan spong gi bus gdan dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu la spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-15: phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-17: nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-18: rga ba la sogs pas yid byung ste; phyogs 'di nyid du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rngon pa'i cha byad du byas pa la ka shi ka'i ras phran byin nas gos ngur smrig blangs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-19: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis ngur smrig blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-20: da dung du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-21: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ka shi ka'i ras phran sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzhag nas ka shi ka'i dus mchod chen po btsugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137a-22: da dung du yang de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag bya ba byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-0: phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis @137b bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-2: nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-3: phyogs 'dir ral gri autpa la sngon po 'dra bas dbu skra bregs nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phangs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-4: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis dbu skra blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-5: da dung du yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-6: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang dbu skra sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du khyer te bzhag nas gtsug phud kyi dus mchod chen po btsugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-7: da dung du yang de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bya ba byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-8: phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-10: phyogs 'dir rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan 'dun pas khrid nas slar btang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-11: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis bsngags ldan slar btang ba zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-12: da dung ngu yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul gnag lhas can du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-16: gnag lhas can 'dir rigs kyi bu 'dun pa btsas nas 'di nyid du chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das sdig can du byon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:137b-18: sdig can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das sdig can du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:138a-0: thos nas kyang rgan rabs rgan rabs @138a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:138a-2: gzhon nu gang yin pa de dag gis lam bzang por byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:138a-5: de nas gzhon nu rnams kyis lam bzang por bya bar brtsams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:138a-6: de rnams kyi pha bong zhig mthong nas de rnams kyis de dor bar brtsams pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-7: de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems dang ba bskyed nas mnyan yod nas byung ste shing drung zhig tu nyal ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-8: mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis tshong dpon du dbang bskur nas de mthong ba'i chos kho nas longs spyod mngon par 'phel bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-10: chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-11: zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-12: 'thob 'gyur grib ma yol bar mi 'gyur bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-13: zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-14: gdu bu can du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-15: gdu bu can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-16: sa can du byon nas sa can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-17: seng+ge can gyi grong du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-18: sengge can gyi grong du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-19: grong gsar du byon nas grong gsar du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:187b-20: grong khyer can du byon nas grong khyer can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-0: rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas @188a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-1: de'i tshe kun tu rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-2: ma ga dha bzang mo'i rdzing gi 'gram na gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-3: de mtshan mo mchil bas nya gshor cing gshor cing za bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-4: de nam nangs nas ni khri'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas smra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-5: chos kyi chos mchog gis 'tshe srog chags dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-6: 'ga' la yang 'tshe mi byed dge sbyong 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-7: zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-8: dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-10: de'i drung du gshegs te bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-11: tshigs bcad de ni ji lta bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-12: gal te khyod kyang de 'dra na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-13: khyod kyang dam par brtsir rung na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-14: spong ba khyod ni de mi 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-15: re zhig nye bar zhi zhing dul ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-16: srog chags 'ga' la'ang 'tshe ba ma byed par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-17: zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-18: dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-19: gang la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-20: nyes par byas pa yod pa ma yin la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-21: gang zhig gnas gsum dag gis bsdams gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-22: dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-23: de nas kun tu rgyu khri'u brtsegs kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-24: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i thugs kyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-26: snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-0: de dang @188b mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-1: thos pas kun tu rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-2: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-3: dge slong dag gis de khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-4: dge slong zhig gis khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag ste chos nyan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-5: de bden pa'i snod du gyur kyang bden pa ma mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-6: ci'i phyir dge slong 'dis bden pa ma mthong snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-7: ma gus pas yin par gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-9: nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-10: dge slong dag khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag nas 'dug pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-13: dge slong gis khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas n+ya gro dhar byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-17: de nas snga dro sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-18: na bza' chos gos dang lhung bzed bsnams te n+ya gro dhar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-19: ser skya'i gzhi'i bram ze'i bu me zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-20: n+ya gro dhar bag mar btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-21: bram ze'i gu mos bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:188b-22: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-0: @189a *// sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-1: 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-2: gshegs pa na rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-3: mthong ma thag tu de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyal srid kyang spangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-9: bang mdzod kyi 'byor pa rnams kyang spangs nas rab tu byung ba de yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-10: de da ltar bsod snyoms la rgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-11: gal te bdag las bsod snyoms kyi zan bzhes na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-12: de la bdag gis dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i sems mkhyen nas lhung bzed zed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-16: gal te khyod kyis yongs su gtang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-18: de nas de lhag par dad pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-20: snyam du rig nas dad pa drag pos bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-22: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba nas mdzod spur nub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-23: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-24: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189a-27: rkyen ma mchis par ni zhes bya ba nas 'dzum pa mdzad ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-1: khyod kyis bram ze'i bu mo gang zhig dad pa skyes nas nga la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba de mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-5: bram ze'i bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-6: bskal pa bcu gsum du log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-7: lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-10: bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la rang sangs rgyas shin tu legs smon zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-11: kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-14: de'i khyo me tog dang yam bsreg shing gi phyir dgon par song ba des bdag gi chung mas dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-16: de rang byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-18: thos nas kyang mi bzod pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-19: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-21: bdag gi sdum par byon tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-24: shes ldan go'u ta ma la bdag gi mchis brang gis bsod snyoms bshos shig phul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-25: khyod kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan skad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:189b-30: khyod 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-1: snyoms bshos tsam gyi slad du ji ltar shes bzhin gyi rdzun gyi tshig gsungs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-3: zhes bgyi ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-5: de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-6: khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-7: bram ze ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-8: khyod kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos mthong ba 'ga' yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-11: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gzhan lta zhog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-12: n+ya gro dha 'di nyid du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shig mthong ba de re zhig gson cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-14: n+ya gro dha 'di'i shar phyogs na n+ya gro dha'i shing chen po zhig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-15: de'i ming gis grong 'di n+ya gro dha zhes bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-16: de'i 'og na shing rta lnga brgya ma reg cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-17: phan tshun ma thug par mchi lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-19: n+ya gro dha de'i sa bon tshad ji tsam zhig yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-21: re zhig zhing rnang tsam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-29: ka pid tha'i 'bras bu tsam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-33: ye yungs kar gyi bzhi cha tsam mchis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-35: sa bon de tsam gyis 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam zhig skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190a-36: zhes bya ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-1: bdag gis mngon sum du gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-3: re zhig zhing snag che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-5: dog sa tshva rgo ma mchis pa'i phyogs su sa bon gsar ba grung po ma nyams par mchis pa la dus dus su lhas char phab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-6: des na shing n+ya gro dha chen po 'dir 'khrungs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-8: bram ze khyod yis ji lta bur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-9: zhing dang sa bon mngon sum ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-10: de bzhin las kyi rnam smin yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-12: ji ltar bram ze khyod kyis sa bon ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-13: chung dang shin tu shing chen de mthong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-14: bram ze ngas kyang sa bon chung ngu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-15: phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ljags brkyangs pas dbu skra la thub pa'i bar zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad g-yogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-17: bram ze de la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-20: gang gi zhal nas ljags byung bas zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad g-yogs par byed pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-21: ji ga 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal srid stong gi phyir yang shes bzhin du rdzun gyi tshig gsung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-25: nga yi lngags ni sgyu med bden pas bskyed pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-26: ji ga mi bden pa ni gsung bar 'gyur srid dam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-27: bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa de bzhin pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:190b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhes rtogs par bya ba'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-5: rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-6: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-11: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-14: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-15: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-16: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-21: kim pi la dang sbrul gdug dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-22: ma thu la dang yul 'khor skyong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-23: glang chen grong dang grong khyer che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-24: srug na dang ni bram ze'i grong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-25: grong khyer nag po ro hi ta //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-26: gsing ma can dang de bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-27: dga' ba 'phel bas tshogs su ni; byas te yang dag brjed pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191a-28: bcom ldan 'das kim pi lar byon nas kim pi la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la bka' @191b stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-2: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te sgom pa khyod la bshad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-3: de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-4: zhes de skad bka' stsal pa na; tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la cang mi smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-5: lan gnyis su yang de bzhin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-6: lan gsum du yang de bzhin brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-8: tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-9: khyod la ston pa gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-12: tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-15: bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab lags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-22: 'di la dge slong gang yang grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:191b-23: grol rdal zhes bya ba dang /
