K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-14: shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-18: ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-21: bdag sgra ngan rgyas pa'i 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-24: bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs spyod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-25: 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-27: ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-29: shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-31: de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-32: khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:210b-33: rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-0: khyod 'di na sgra ngan rgyas pa @211a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-4: bang mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-5: shar phyogs nas mi yid gcugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-7: 'jig rten la mi slu ba zhig 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-10: bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir mchi ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-11: de na bdag gis ljongs 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-14: lo legs pa; skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dag cig mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-16: ljongs de dag 'di lta bu'i dpung dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-18: 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-19: bzhon pa dang choms nas rnal du dgod par rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-21: rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-22: khyod yul der dra ma drangs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-23: drangs nas bcom ste rnal du dgod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-26: gal te bdag gis ljongs de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-29: 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dra ma drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-30: dra ma drangs nas choms pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-31: bcom nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-32: ljongs de dag tu dra ma drangs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-33: dra ma drangs nas bcom la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-35: bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-37: bam po sum cu lnga pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-2: ngoms mi shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-3: zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-6: rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-10: khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-11: bdag kyang rangs te bzod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-12: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-13: gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-14: 'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-15: de dag chags dang bcas pas gsog byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-16: nor rnams rnyed nas gtong bar mi byed la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-17: phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-18: mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-19: thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-20: rgya mtsho tshun chad kyis kyang mi chog ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-21: chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-22: mi dbang de bzhin mi gzhan mang po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-23: yongs su gzung la ngoms pa yod min pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-24: chog mi shes pas rang gi lus por te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-25: sred dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-26: srog ni ther zug ma yin tshe thung ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-27: rga bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-28: 'chi ba la ni nor rjes 'brang mi 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-29: nye du ma yin grogs min bu ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-30: spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-31: snying du sdug pa'i tshogs ni 'dus nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-32: kye ma kye hud 'di ni lhar gyur ces //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:211b-33: skra bshig mchi ma can gyi gdong gis ngu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-1: kyis dkris te phyung nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-2: me 'bar nas ni de nas sreg par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-3: rang gi las kyis sems can de khrid nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-4: de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas 'phrog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-5: 'di ni skye ba na yang gcig pu skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-6: 'chi ba na yang gcig pu 'chir 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-7: gcig pus sdug bsngal nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-8: skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-9: phyug po'am yang na bkren ba'am brtan po'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-10: bus pa de bzhin gnyis kas reg myong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-11: brtan po de yis nam yang g-yogs mi 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-12: bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g-yo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-13: blo chung mi mkhas rjes su slob byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-14: de nas las rnams gsum po byed 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-15: mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-16: 'khon dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-17: shes rab nor rnams kun gyi mchog tu gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-18: de yis bdag nyid shes pas bdag nyid rig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-19: srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma rtogs pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-20: blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-21: phran tshegs thabs sam yang na chos min pa'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-22: mthu yis gzhan dag las ni gang 'phrog pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-23: nyes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-24: nying tor brgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-25: ji ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs bzung nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-26: sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-27: de bzhin skye rgu nyes byed 'di dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-28: 'jig rten pha rol rang gi las kyis bcom //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212a-29: shing las shing thog bzhin du mi rnams ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-0: @212b gzhon dang bar ma rgan po rnams kyang ltung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-1: 'dod pa sna tshogs stug cing yid 'ong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-2: rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'joms //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-4: 'dod pa yod na 'khon dang 'jigs pa skye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-5: de ltas rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-6: dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-7: de nas rgyal po chen po ko'u rab bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-8: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la mngon par dga' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-9: yi rang nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-10: bcom ldan 'das glang po che'i grong rdal du byon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-12: bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-13: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-15: 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-16: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang pa de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-17: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-18: gser gyi mdog can mig tu sdug pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-19: dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-20: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lha yi lha //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-21: srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-23: chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas mdzod spur nub par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:212b-24: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-1: 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba byas nas zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-2: kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-3: zhes bya ba nas kun dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-6: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-9: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-11: khyod kyis bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa gang yin pa mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-13: 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal ba nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-14: 'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-17: bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-18: rang sangs rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-19: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-21: bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-25: de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213a-26: ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nga la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-0: ngas grong mchog @213b lnga byin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-1: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-4: w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-9: skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba la rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-10: de lhag par snyan dngags la dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-11: w'a ra n'a si na bram ze snyan dngags mkhan gzhan zhig yod pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-14: grang ba'i dus la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-15: rgyal po de'i spyan sngar song la rjes su mthun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-16: gal te na grang ba'i skyabs cung zad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-17: de song ba las ji tsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-18: rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-21: bdag gis rgyal po la bstod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-22: 'on te glang po che dam pa la snyam pa las de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-23: glang po che dam pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-24: 'jig rten thams cad kyis sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-25: rgyal po la ni khyad par du yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-26: re zhig glang po che dam pa mngon par bstod bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-28: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-29: sa srung bu yi lus kyi sha tshugs ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-30: mtshan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni phun sum tshogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-31: mdog dang tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs legs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-32: glang chen dbang po bkra shis rab tu bsngags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-33: de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:213b-34: kho bo'i glang chen sdug cing yid 'ong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-2: de la khyod kyis bstod pa'i tshig smras kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-3: khyod la grong gi mchog ni lnga sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-5: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-9: de na yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-10: ngas 'di la grong mchog lnga byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-11: da ltar yang nga la 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-12: ngas yang 'dir rang byang chub tu lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-13: grong khyer chen por gshegs nas grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-14: yul srug nar gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-15: yul srug na na bram ze dbang po zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-18: thos pas rgyags par gyur nas bdag dang 'dra ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-19: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-20: zhes sgrog cing rnam par sgrog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te chos 'chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-22: bram ze dbang po zhes bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-23: dge sbyong go'u ta ma yul srug nar byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-26: dge sbyong go'u ta ma gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-28: blta na sdug pa zhes thos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-30: bdag las lhag par gzugs bzang ba yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214a-32: snyam nas de byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-0: ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i @214b mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-1: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-3: 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-4: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-5: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-6: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-7: bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-12: bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-13: ji tsam na ma mthong nas de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze dbang po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-18: gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te bltas kyang 'on kyang ches nyon mongs su zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-22: khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor mi mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-25: 'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad mthong bar 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-26: khyod kyis khyim na me'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-27: tsandan sa mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdong nyid yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-28: de phyung la gzhol cig dang de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum las 'khrungs pa'i sku'i tshad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-30: bram ze dbang pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-31: de yang ngo mtshar zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:214b-32: bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-0: de rings pa rings par song nas me'i @215a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-1: sbyin sreg byed pa'i thab kyi 'og tu brko bar brtsams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-2: de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-3: de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-4: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-5: gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-8: de dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-9: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-13: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-14: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-15: des bden pa mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-21: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-22: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-23: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215a-24: de nas bram ze dbang po stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-0: bcom ldan 'das la @215b 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-1: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-2: bdag gis tsandan sa mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-6: de nas des sa phyogs dben pa skabs yod pa zhig tu rim gro chen pos mchod sdong de bsgrengs nas dus mchod chen po bshams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-7: bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan dag gis kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-9: ces bya bar rig nas rtsva ku sha btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-10: bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-11: dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-12: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-17: skye bo dam pa rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-18: yi rang par mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-19: mu stegs can rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-21: bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-22: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bram ze'i grong du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-24: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-26: thos nas kyang rings pa rings par bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du dong ste lhags nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:215b-32: kho bo cag gis khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-1: mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-4: bdag cag gi rgud pa gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-6: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang spu gri'i ser ba 'bebs shing 'ong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-7: bu dang bcas pa du ma bu med par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-10: gang gi tshe kho nar bzhugs shing grogs bgyi ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhud pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-12: bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-15: gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma gsod na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-19: zhes de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang gzhu thogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-21: go bgos te byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-22: lam gyi dbus na sh'akya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-27: khyed cag gi dgra su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-30: gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-31: byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-34: de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-37: chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-38: rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216a-40: des ri brag tu zhugs nas me btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-0: ri brag kun tshig @216b nas ca co dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-1: ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-2: de rnams kyis thos nas sdangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-4: bdag cag dang dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-5: thag ring po kho na yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-6: ri brag 'dir ni phung po chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brag bsregs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-9: zhes de rnams kyis gsad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-10: gsad par ma nus pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-14: ri brag rnams zhugs kyis tshig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-15: dgum par rngo ma thogs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho nar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-20: lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de zhi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-21: de rnams mngon par dad par gyur nas gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-23: ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-24: khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-26: bag la nyal dang khams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-27: rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-28: thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-29: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:216b-30: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-2: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-4: sh'akya rgan po 'dis nye du la chags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-5: bsod nams ma lags pa mang du bsags te ri brag bsregs pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-8: da ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-9: ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-10: bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te ri brag bsregs pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-11: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-14: ri brag cig na spre'u lnga brgya'i tshogs gnas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-15: lo tog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gzan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-16: ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-18: spre'u rnams kyis lo tog la gnod pa byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-19: de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-22: de rnams ji ltar gsad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-23: ri brag gi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-24: shing tin tu ka gcig pu zhig bzhag la nye 'khor rnams tsher mas bskor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-25: de la bza' ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'dzeg par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-27: der de rnams gsad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-28: de nas de rnams kyis ri brag gi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-29: shing tin tu ka gcig pu bzhag nas nyen kor rnams tsher ma'i ra bas bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217a-30: srung ma pa'i mi bzhag nas bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-0: khyed kyis @217b gang gi tshe spre'u rnams tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbron cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-1: de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang spre'u rnams kyis sde dpon la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-3: shing tin tu ka smin cing mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-5: de nas sde dpon 'khor lnga brgya dang shing tin tu ka de la 'dzegs te shing tin tu ka la bza' bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-6: de nas srung ma'i mis ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-8: shing tin tu ka la spre'u thams cad 'dzegs nas za bar byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-9: khyed cag gi bya ba'am byed pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-11: de nas ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lag na mda' gzhu dang dgra sta thogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-12: khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas shing tin tu ka gcad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-13: de nas spre'u de rnams bred de mchong brgal zhing shing ka phan tshun rgyu bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-15: sems las chung ngus za bar byed pa dang spre'u de rnams kyis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-18: sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga ba thob cing mchis te phan tshun du rgyu lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-19: khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung ngur bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-20: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-21: bya ba mang po'i mi rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-22: bya ba min pa'ang de dang 'dra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-23: shing gi 'phro ni mang yod pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:217b-24: sems las bskyungs te bza' bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-0: de nas yang sde dpon gyi phru gu zhig ri brag de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa @218a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-2: sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-3: ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-4: de sems khong du chud pa mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-6: ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-8: da ltar ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du gsod du dong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-9: ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-10: ci'i phyir khyod kyis pha rol gnon pa ma byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-12: ji ltar pha rol gnon par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-14: zhes des de bkrol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-15: de nas des ri brag der me btang ste ri brag kun tshig pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-17: ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sdangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-21: thag ring po kho na yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-22: phung po chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brag bsregs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-25: zhes de rnams me gsad pa'i phyir rgyugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-26: spre'u rnams kyang shing tin tu ka las babs nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-29: spre'u'i phru gu gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-30: sh'akya rgan po 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-31: de na yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brag bsregs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-32: da ltar yang 'dis nye du la chags pas ri brag bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218a-33: nag po'i grong khyer du gshegs nas nag po'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-0: ro hi ta @218b kar byon nas ro hi ta ka na gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-1: de'i tshe gnod sbyin glang chen stobs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-2: gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-3: gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-4: bcom ldan 'das bskyed par byon nas ro hi ta ka na bdag gi gnas kho na na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-7: bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-11: chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-12: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-13: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-14: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-15: de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-16: bcom ldan 'das do mod bdag gi gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-18: de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:218b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-2: zhugs ling lnga brgya bshams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-4: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-7: de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-8: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song nas de'i ne'u zla kha che yul gyi gnod sbyin sgra sgrog ces bya ba de la des bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-9: kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-10: byang phyogs kyi 'bras bu rnams skur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-11: ces des pho nya btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-12: de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gtsug lag khang chag chag dang phyag dar byas nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas khang skyong gis gand'i brdungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-13: gnod sbyin sgra sgrog gis rgun 'brum gyis skon pa bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-14: gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-15: de dag gis gtsug lag khang gi dbus su phung por spungs te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-16: dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu 'di dag ci'i yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219a-17: ji ltar brtag par bya ba mi shes nas de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:219b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @219b pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-6: khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-12: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon nas dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-13: dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-14: des klu gdug pa hu lu du btul nas thabs bshams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-15: de las skyil mo krung shong ba'i sa blangs nas kha che'i yul kun tu bstan pa 'jog par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-16: nga'i lhag mthong dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal gyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-17: kha che'i yul mchog tu 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-21: grong rdal drug cu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-23: yul gnyis 'grogs su drang srong dang gnod sbyin nyams pa 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-24: yul kan thar gnod sbyin mo 'khor dang bcas pa btul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224a-25: 'bras kyi grong khyer du byon nas 'bras kyi grong khyer du rgyal po sde mchog gi ma bden pa rnams la rab tu bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-0: yul dbang ldan du byon te dbang ldan na rdza mkhan gzhan @224b zhig yod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-2: snod rnams bskams nas 'khor lo las 'gogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-4: rdza mkhan gyi cha byad nyid du mngon par sprul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-5: de dang lhan cig gtam bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-6: khyod kyis snod ci 'dra ba dag cig 'khor lo las 'bebs par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-10: khyod dang bdag mnyam lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-15: so btang ba 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-20: shel gyi rang bzhin du yang byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-21: de mngon par dad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdza mkhan gyi cha byad mi snang bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-23: rang bzhin gyi cha byad du zhugs nas de 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas te bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-24: gsing ma can du gshegs nas gsing ma can du gnod sbyin chen po 'khor dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-25: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-26: brtsegs skyong du klu ba lang skyong dang dgar ba gnyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-27: dga' 'phel du gshegs nas dga' 'phel du rgyal po srid pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-28: gtum byed kyi bu bdun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:224b-29: gnod sbyin sa 'tsho bden pa dag la rab tu bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-0: de na mtsho chen po yod pa gang yin pa de na 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis klu'i skye gnas su skyes te lo bcu gnyis 'das @225a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-1: shing steng du byung ste 'khrug pas 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos ma bshad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-3: des na bdag cag rnam par lhung ba klu'i skye gnas su skyes kyi; ci nas kyang bdag cag gis de'i bstan pa zhig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-6: klu 'gro mgyogs dang nab so ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-9: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas nga'i bstan pa thal bar brlag par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-11: bcom ldan 'das klu 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-13: tshig bzhi pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba yod pa bshad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-16: bdag cag dam pa'i chos 'tshal bar bgyid pa su zhig mchis snyam du rig nas de nyid du slar zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-17: de gnyis 'di snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos bshad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-19: bdag cag gis rnam par ma shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs der sku'i gzugs brnyan btang nas 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis kyis de la bltas shing bcom ldan 'das da dung bzhugs pa lta zhes slar yang dang yang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-0: phyogs de nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo spu bu can dang @225b sbubs can gnyis btul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-1: mdung can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-2: mdung can gyi grong khyer na gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bya ba khro zhing gtum la gzu lums can zhig gnas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-3: mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-4: khyim bdag rnams kyi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag za bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-5: mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-7: bcom ldan 'das 'das mdung can gyi grong khyer du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-9: thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-10: khyu nas khyur 'phrad cing 'dus nas mdung can gyi grong khyer nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-14: khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-15: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-16: de nas mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:225b-17: khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-0: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gdugs @226a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-2: gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-3: gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-7: gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bgyi ba 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-8: bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas sha 'khon ma mchis par ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-14: byis pa btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-16: bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-17: gnod sbyin mo mdung can gdul bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-18: de'i tshe gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-20: mdung can khyod kyis thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-25: bde bar gshegs pa; bdag gis thos lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-26: dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226a-29: gal te 'di dag bdag cag gi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig par bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-6: khyed cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor dang bcas te btul nas gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-12: 'bra go can du gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-13: 'bra go can na byis pa chung ngu dag cig rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa chung ngu dag rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-16: yang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-18: khyod kyis byis pa chung ngu rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba dag mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-22: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi brgya lon pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-23: 'dir ku sha na'i rigs kyi rgyal po ka ni ska zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-24: phyogs 'dir mchod rten brtsigs par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-25: de'i ming ka ni ska'i mchod rten zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-26: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sangs rgyas kyis bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag bdun btul nas ro hi ta kar gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:226b-28: gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas nang du yang dag bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-1: 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-3: dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-9: byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-11: phan yon rnam pa lnga yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-13: da bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-15: dang po'i rgyal srid gang na ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-20: nga gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu byang phyogs su gshegs nas ta ma sa'i tshal rnams lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-21: zhes bya ba nas rdul gyi mchod rten lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-24: ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pas; srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-31: rdo ba dang; gseg ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-34: bud med gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-36: dang po'i rgyal srid rtag bzang dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227a-37: bcom dang ni ao ta la'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-0: kun dga' @227b ra ba dgra mtha' dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-1: tshugs par dka' dang gangg'a'i chu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-2: yi dvags dus dpag phyi ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dang po'i rgyal srid du gshegs nas; de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-5: phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-6: dang por rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de ni; dang po'i rgyal po yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-7: de'i phyir 'di dang po'i rgyal srid ces bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-11: phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur ba'i rta bzang po rin po che byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-12: de'i phyir 'di rta bzang zhes bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-15: bcom brlag gang na ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-17: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa dag gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-20: gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-21: khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba sbrengs pa pha bi mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:227b-26: ri bo rtse mthon zhes bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-0: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo @228a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-1: brgya lon pa dang bcom brlag nas gar mkhan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-2: dpa' bo zhes bya ba spun gnyis kyis de la gtsug lag khang rtsig par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-3: de'i ming gar mkhan dpa' bo zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-4: lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi rjes su mthun pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-6: bcom brlag 'dir spos tshong gi khye'u sbas pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-7: de'i bu nye sbas zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi mtshan med pa zhig byung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-8: nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-9: dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-10: nye sbas de rab tu 'byin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-11: gdams ngag ston pa rnams kyi phyi ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-12: nye sbas yin par 'gyur ro; ;gar mkhan dpa' bo de la phug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-13: srid du khru bco brgyad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-15: 'phang du khru bdun pa zhig yod par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-16: des gang dang gang dag la gdams ngag bstan nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa de dang de rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-17: thur ma sor bzhi tsam pa re re phug de'i nang du 'dor bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-19: dgra bcom pa'i thur mas gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-20: nye sbas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228a-21: de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dgra bcom pa'i thur ma de dag nyid spungs nas de rnams kyis sreg par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-0: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes @228b nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na skye bo mang po la snying brtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-4: tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas lung bstan pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-8: ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-9: legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-12: ri rtse mthon po 'di nyid kyi ngos gsum la rang sangs rgyas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-21: spre'u'i sde dpon gyi kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-22: spre'u'i phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag gsod par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-23: de nas spre mo de dag phru gu'i mya ngan gyis non pas phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-26: bdag cag gi phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-27: sde dpon 'dis gsod par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-28: de la thabs shig bsham bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-29: bdag cag las spre mo gang zhig sbrum par gyur ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-30: des sde dpon la brjod par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-31: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig nas spre mo zhig sbrum par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-32: de de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu sbas nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus bsnyod de spre'u'i phru gu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:228b-33: de yang de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu bsnun gsos bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-2: des sde dpon de rang gi khyu nas bskrad nas ri bo rtse mthon na phan tshun du 'khyams par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-3: de 'khyams pa na rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-4: de de rnams kyi drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-5: gang gi tshe bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-6: de rnams la rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-10: so shing dag 'bul bar byed do; ;de rnams kyis kyang de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-11: rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-12: zos shing zos nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-13: spre'u des kyang de rnams kyi spyod lam mthong nas skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-14: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-15: bdag cag gi lus rnag can 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-17: bdag cag gis zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-22: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-23: de rnams ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe mi ldang nas spre'u des de rnams ma mthong bas mi dga' bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229a-24: ji tsam na spre'u de phug tu zhugs nas rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi chos gos rnams nas bsigs par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-0: de nas phug de na gnas pa'i @229b lha gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-2: spre'u 'dis rang sangs rgyas kyi sku bshig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-4: snyam nas rdo leb chen pos sgo bcad nas 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-8: smre sngags bton te song nas ri bo rtse mthon la kun nas 'khyams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-9: mi rnams 'dod pas mi dga' bar gyur te rna ba gtod cing mi'i sgra thos par 'dod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-10: des drang srong de rnams smra ba'i sgra dag thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-11: de mgron po lam stor ba bzhin du rings pa rings par de rnams kyi drung du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-12: drang srong de dag kyang dka' thub drag pos gdung bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-16: rkang pa ya gcig gis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-18: gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-19: gang gi tshe spre'u de de rnams dang lhan cig bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-20: drang srong de rnams la rtsa ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-24: so shing dag sbyin par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-25: de rnams kyang de la zas kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-26: des de rnams kyi spyod lam dkrugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-27: rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-28: de na gang dag lag pa bsgreng ba de rnams kyi lag pa dag phab nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste sbran nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:229b-29: gang dag rkang pa ya gcig pa de rnams kyi rkang ba phab nas mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-0: gang dag gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed pa de rnams kyi me bsad nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste mdun @230a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-1: du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-2: de nas drang srong de rnams kyis gdams ngag 'bogs pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-4: spre'u 'di bdag cag gi dka' thub la bar chad bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-5: zhes de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-9: dran pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-10: gdon mi za bar 'dis drang srong kha cig gi spyod lam de lta bu mthong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-11: khyed cag gis kyang skyil mo krung chos la 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-12: de rnams kyi skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-13: de rnams sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-14: de rnams kyis mkhan po dang slob dpon med pa'i shes pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang mthun pa'i chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-15: de nas de rnams spre'u de la chos las byung ba'i dad pa skyes nas de rnams kyis ljongs nas bsod snyoms lo thog gsar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-17: dus gsar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams las de la thog mar byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-18: bdag nyid longs spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-19: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spre'u de dus las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-20: de nas rang byang chub de rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-21: yul khams dang phyogs sna tshogs na yod pa'i shing dri zhim po rnams blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230a-22: shing dri zhim po thams cad kyis phung por spungs nas bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-0: rang byang chub rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas @230b pa'i spre'u gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-2: 'di de'i tshe yang skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-3: da ltar na yang ngas 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-4: snying brtse bar lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-6: bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-7: dge slong go'u ta ma bcom brlag tu phyin nas de shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag par 'dod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-15: yang dag par rab tu bstan par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-17: gal te de bcom brlag tu 'dug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-18: bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-19: bkur sti'i bar chad du 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-21: bkur sti ma yin pas skrag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-23: gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin pa byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-24: de lta na de bcom brlag tu 'dug par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-25: gal te de la mi smad rigs kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-27: gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin par byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-30: bdag cag gi nang na skyes bu gtso bo su zhig yod snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-31: de'i tshe bcom brlag na bram ze sngor gyur ces bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-33: rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:230b-34: rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-0: pha rol gyi rgol ba tshar @231a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-2: de'i tshig bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-3: de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze rnam 'dus shing tshogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-4: sngor gyur gyi drung du song nas mkhan po; ;'dir dge sbyong go'u ta ma mchis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-5: der shin tu rigs bzhi po rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-6: zhes thos zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-8: bkur sti ma yin pas skrag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-10: gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-11: de lta na de bcom brlag tu mchis par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-12: gal te de la mi smad rigs kyis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-14: gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis na legs par 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-15: bdag cag gi skyes bu gtso bo mkhan po ma lags pa su zhig mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-16: khyod kyis de la bkur sti ma lags pa'i tshig gi rgya lcag gis spyo bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-20: bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-21: gal te spyo bar 'os pa zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-23: 'on te bstod par 'os pa zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-25: de nas bram ze sngor gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231a-26: bcom brlag na gnas pa'i bram ze rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyis mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-0: bram ze sngor gyur gyis rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis @231b kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-1: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-3: 'od zer nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-4: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-5: shing drung zhig na brten cing zhi ba'i spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-6: mthong nas kyang ya mtshan skyes te mig bgrad de bltas nas bstod par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-7: lus dang ngag dang dbang por bcas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-8: yid kyis tshul bzhin rtse gcig bgyis nas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-9: yon tan rang bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-10: khyod kyi yon tan phyogs gcig brjod par bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-11: smra ba rnams kyi dam pa rab mchog lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-12: skyon med dbang po shin tu mnyam par bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-13: pha rol rgol ba brtson pa thams cad kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-14: don dam thugs su chud la bskyod mi nus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-15: khyod kyi spyod pa shin tu rdzogs pa nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-16: brtul zhugs bsgrubs pas brtul zhugs shin tu rdzogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-17: stobs ldan khyod kyi ting 'dzin zad med pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-18: sred med bu dang ri yi rgyal po bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-19: skyes bu khyu mchog khyod la gnod mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-20: mi zhum bsnyengs pa mi mnga' dub mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-21: 'byung po rnams la'ang mi bzod 'ga' mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-22: khyod ni ma chags 'thab pa ga la mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-23: brtabs pa med cing ha cang zhum mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-24: gdung ba med cing dgyes pa'ang yod mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-25: ri yi bdag po lhun po rab brtan ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-26: khyod kyi thugs ni rtag tu dge ba nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-27: thub pa skyes mchog khams rnams thams cad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-28: khyod kyi ye shes yangs pa sgrib mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:231b-29: skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-2: thub pa khyod la gang la'ang som nyi med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-3: yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-4: khyod nyid kyis ni mchog dang mchog min pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-5: rig pas thugs su chud nas thams cad mkhyen //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-6: mthong na dga' bar 'gyur la mthong na legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-7: mthong na legs pas mthong na mkhas pa dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-8: khyod la dga' ba dang mi dga' mnyam pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-9: rtag tu dga' ba'i spyod lam de bzhin mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-10: khyod ni snyan pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-11: 'dzum pa'i gsung dang dran ldan bsnyengs pa med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-12: mkhas rnams 'dod pa rab tu 'chad pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-13: 'jig rten gsum du khyod kyi grags pa 'byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-14: mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-15: srin po mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-16: thub pa'i drung du yang dang yang lhags nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-17: khyod la yang dang yang zhu mi bzod med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-18: khyod ni snyan pa'i gsung gis dga' mdzad pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-19: mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-20: srin po yid gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-21: khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-22: bzhengs dang bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-23: mnal dang mi gsung yang na gsung ba 'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-24: 'on te lhung bzed chos gos bsnams ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-25: go'u ta ma khyod kyi thams cad mdzes pa nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-26: thogs pa med mnga' mi myur mnyam pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-27: gsung ni snyan pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232a-28: mi yi mchog ni dus su gsung bas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-0: gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa @232b lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-1: 'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-2: skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gtso //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-3: 'jig rten lhar bcas 'di ni mtha' dag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-4: nga rgyal mi mnga' khyad du gsod mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-5: mdza' ba dang ni mdza' ba ma lags dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-6: mthun pa dang ni mthun pa ma lags dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-7: g-yo dang mi g-yo rang bzhin gnas pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-8: ngo mtshar 'dzin pa nam yang mi mnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-9: smre sngags 'don cing snying brtser smra ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-10: kha chu 'dzag pas nyam thag skad 'byin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-11: yongs su gdungs dang rnam par gdungs ldan dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-12: 'jigs dang rims nad mya ngan gyis nyen pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-13: sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya yis gtses pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-14: yun ring nas ni mgon med bde ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-15: srid pa'i sred par zhugs shing mun bsgribs pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-16: 'gro ba 'khrugs pa la ni rab gzigs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-17: bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mthu dag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-18: thub pa thugs rje chen po 'jug mdzad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-19: sh'akya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-20: phongs par gyur rnams dgrol phyir brtson pa mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-21: srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas 'di dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-22: srid pa'i sdug bsngal zad pa gang min dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-23: srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-24: lam ni mtshungs pa med pa khyod kyis bshad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-25: rnam par 'dren pa chen po brtson 'grus che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-26: rab mchog pha rol smra ba rnams kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-27: 'jig rten gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-28: khyod las lhag pa lta zhig ga la mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-29: khyod la khong khro rjes su chags mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:232b-30: thub pa khyod la yongs su zad mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-0: @233a *// sdug dang 'gal dang rtsod pa brtul zhugs bzang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-1: khyod la mi mnga' rtag tu mi mnga' lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-2: thub pa sdug dang mi sdug bde ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-3: sdug bsngal mnyam dang de bzhin mi mnyam spangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-4: dga' dang mi dga' ba dag bzod mdzad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-5: yang dag bsdams shing 'di na nyer zhi spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-6: smad pa byas kyang gnod pa mi mnga' la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-7: rab tu bsngags pas khengs par mi 'gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-8: grags pa grags pa ma yin khyod la mnyam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-9: glang chen mche bar ldan pa g-yul ngo ru //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-10: 'dor ba drag tu 'phangs pa'i mda' dag ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-11: skye bo sdig can rnams kyis smras pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-12: tshig ngan tshig rtsub dag kyang bzod par mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-13: drang srong khyod snyan gsung zhing tshig kyang bzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-14: shin tu ngan du smras kyang mi bzod med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-15: smad par smras sam dge bar smras kyang rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-16: thub pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-17: mchod 'os rtag par mi dang lha dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-18: lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-19: drang srong bdag nyid chen pos rtag mchod na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-20: khyod ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-21: 'di bas bdag mchog ces kyang rlom mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-22: 'di bas bdag chung zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-23: bdag ni 'di dag mnyam zhes mi rlom pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-24: khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa gsum mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-25: brtan dang ldan pa bong ba gser dang mtshungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-26: bee d'urya dang gseg ma gyo mor mtshungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-27: thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-28: 'gro ba 'di ni rtsva shing 'dra bar spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233a-29: zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-0: grang dang tsha ba'i rlung dag langs na @233b yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-1: ri yi dbang po lta bur bzod mdzad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-2: thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-3: gzims cha dang ni stsang nas bshos dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-4: bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-7: de yi don du ston par mdzad pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-8: mgon po bdag la med ces thugs ngan med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-9: ma bcings legs gsungs bdag gir 'dzin mi mnga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-10: gnod pa sna tshogs dag las yongs su grol; rnyed pa rnyed na'ang dgyes par mi 'gyur la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-11: de ma rnyed pas kyang ni zhum mi 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-12: khyad du gsod pa bzod pa mdzad cing 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-13: bkur sti dag la'ang chags pa mi mnga' lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-14: lha gnas ri yi ngos las 'khrungs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-15: khrag ltar dmar pa'i tsandan mchog dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-16: mda' dang ral gri rnon pos khyod kyi thugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-17: lan 'ga' yang ni 'gyur ba mi mnga' lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-18: don med gtam ni gsung bar mi mdzad gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-19: skye bo ngan pas bsten pa'i gtan ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-20: rnyed pas gtam min zang zing bcas gtam min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-21: bdag nyid che rnams mi 'dod ma lags kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-22: gtam gang rab dben bde ba skyed byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-23: rab tu zhi ba 'ga' zhig rab brjod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-24: lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni gang dag cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-25: gsung nas sdig pa rnam par 'dul ba gsung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-26: snyan pa rnams dang 'brel pa rnams dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-27: legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-28: yi; ;rnam par nges pa'i gtam dag thub pa che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-29: 'gro ba'i don slad rab tu gsung bar mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-30: mi mkhas dag dang log par lta rnams dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:233b-31: gzu lums can dang dga' bar ldan rnams dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-2: de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-3: mi ni gang dag drang zhing sgyu med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-4: bden la dga' zhing dbang po thul ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-5: rtag tu legs par brtags nas byed pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-6: de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-7: chos mkhyen lugs mkhyen gang zag mkhyen pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-8: drug po mngon mkhyen khyed la rtag phyag 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-9: thub pa zhing mkhyen mchog dang mchog min mkhyen; ;tshul dang tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-10: khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho rgya chen legs mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-11: bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig yongs su brjod par bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-12: 'phags pa khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha rol ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-13: rtogs par rngo thogs 'gro ba'i nang na mi ma mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-14: de lta bu la sogs pa bstod pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-15: de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngor gyur ji ltar stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-17: de nas bram ze sngor gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas song ste de lam du zhugs pa na bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig gi rgya lcag gis pags pa las thal ba tsam du brgyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-18: mkhan po khyod la kho bo cag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bkur sti ma yin pa byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-20: khyed da gzod slar bstod bstod de 'ong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-22: kho bos sngar kho bo'i lce ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-23: bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234a-24: gal te smad par 'os pa zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-4: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-5: bstod par 'os bas kho bos bstod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-7: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas bcom brlag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-8: de'i tshe bcom brlag na rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-9: de nas bcom brlag na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-11: gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma bcom brlag tu 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-12: bdag gi rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bar chad byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar sgren mor byung nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-18: shin tu bkab kyang bzang ba ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-19: sgren mo lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-20: de nas lha mo de skyengs nas phyogs gcig tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lam las gzur te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-22: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-25: nyes dmigs lnga po 'di dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-28: sdong dum dang tsher mas gang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-29: rdo ba dang gseg ma dang gyo mo mang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:234b-31: bud med mang ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs par bcom brlag gi gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas gang na ba de logs su gshegs te byon nas gnod sbyin @235a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-1: bong bu'i gnas byul te shing drung zhig tu brten cing nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-2: de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu bong bu'i gzugs su byas nas 'phyan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-4: bu mo dag zhon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-6: dga' bar byed du bcug nas nags thibs por song nas za bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-7: de'i ming gnod sbyin bong bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-8: gnod sbyin bong bu zhes bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-9: bcom brlag gi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-10: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-11: bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-12: lha mo zhig gis mtho ba tsam pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-13: bcom brlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas su gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-15: thos nas kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bcas dag so so nas snod du btsos shing bsdogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-16: shing rtar bcug nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-20: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235a-21: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-0: de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba @235b de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-1: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-3: bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis slad du 'dir gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-4: bza' ba dag gis shing rta bkang ste 'tshal te mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-5: bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa; kun dga' bo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-8: song la gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-9: dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-10: bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go ;btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-11: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-12: dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-15: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-17: gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten cing mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsags lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:235b-18: bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge @236a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-1: 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-2: de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-3: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-4: phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-8: gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-10: btsun pa; gnod sbyin bong bu 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-11: bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-16: glags ma btsal bar ni; glags tshol bar bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-17: nges bu btsas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-19: bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-20: gnod sbyin bong bu gdul bar gsol; de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236a-30: dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa las log cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-1: gal te bdag gi slad du phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-4: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang btul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-12: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis de'i ched du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-13: de bzhin du gnod sbyin mda' can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-15: gnod sbyin mo bslang rnyed ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom brlag tu zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-18: zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo 'gran zla ma 'khor lnga brgya dang btul nas de'i don du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang dang phyi rol du gnod sbyin nyis stong lnga brgya btul nas de'i ched du bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-20: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lhag khang nyis stong lnga brgya brtsigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das ao ta lar gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-22: ao ta la na ao ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-23: de nas bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu ao ta la'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-25: longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:236b-26: zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro @237a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-2: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-3: ao ta la ra bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-4: phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing pa lnga brgya tsam mgo bo rdul gyis g-yogs shing sha na'i ras kyis smad g-yogs nas zhing rmod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-5: zhing pa de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-6: gzi brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-7: zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-9: de rnams la chos bshad pas zhes bya ba nas mchod par bya ba dang /
