K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-11: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-13: de nas rmon pa stong po de dag gnya' shing dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-14: ru dag bcad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ste lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-15: bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-17: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes nas zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-19: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-20: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-23: zhing pa lnga brgya bo 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237a-24: las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur nas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-2: 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-3: 'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin te; 'di rnams kyis de na le los dus 'das par byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-4: las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-5: rmon pa 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung ba nas bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo phra mo rnams la gus par ma byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-6: las de'i rnam par smin pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-7: 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nga las bden pa mthong bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-10: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-11: bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu ao ta la'i bus dge sbyong sh'akya'i sras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-12: sh'akya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang ao ta lar byon nas ao ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-14: shes ldan dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i dge ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:237b-17: tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa @238a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-4: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-5: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-8: tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i skye rgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-9: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi zag pa zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-10: tshangs par spyod pa bsten to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-12: 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-23: rnam par byang ba 'ba' zhig ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-25: dge sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-32: shing rta rta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-33: bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas gser gyi 'khar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-34: ril ba spyi blugs thogs te ao ta la nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238a-35: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-0: de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas @238b song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-2: rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-3: bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu ao ta las bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-4: bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-5: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-7: bcom ldan 'das la bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu ao ta las 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-9: dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-11: rang rang gi spyod yul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-12: yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-14: yul gzhan nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-18: lce'i dbang po dang lus kyi dbang po gang dag lags pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-19: yul nyams su myong bar bgyid pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-21: de rnams kyi rton pa yang gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-23: dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-24: yul tha dad pa can 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-29: lus kyi dbang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyis spyod yul dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-30: yul nyams su myong ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-32: de rnams kyi rton pa yang yid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:238b-34: yid kyi rton pa gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-0: dran pa'i rton pa gang lags @239a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-3: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-5: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-7: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-8: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-10: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-12: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rton pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-14: rnam par grol ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-16: rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-18: rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rton pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-19: mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-21: mya ngan las 'das pa'i rton pa gang lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-25: dri ba rnams kyi mtha' gzung bar mi nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-27: yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-28: sdug bsngal gyi mthar bya ba'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-29: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa can spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-30: de nas bram ze ao ta la'i bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-31: 'di la gnod pa ci zhig bya snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-32: des kyang sngon dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239a-34: ci gsol ba de thams cad so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-0: de nas bram ze ao ta la'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu @239b gzar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-1: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-3: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-4: gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-5: gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-6: stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas smon lam log par gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-7: bdag gi sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed cig bshos gsol ba 'di thams cad bdag gi slad du gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram ze ao ta la'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bram ze ao ta la'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-11: khyod kyis mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-15: yang srid pa zad pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-16: sems gzhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-18: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-19: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:239b-21: bram ze ao ta la'i bus smon lam log pas bslang ba'i sems sdig pa can bskyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-1: nas gtsug lag khang gi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-2: log pa'i smon lam 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yul ao ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-4: ao ta la na bran mo rgan mo ka tsang ga la zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-5: de bum pa thogs nas chu 'chur khron pa'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-8: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-10: song la rgan mo pha bi la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-11: chu phul cig ces sgos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-13: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas rgan mo ka tsang ga la gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-14: rgan mo ka tsang ga la la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-21: de nas ka tsang ga las chu bum pa bkang nas rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-22: ka tsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240a-23: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-0: 'od zer nyi ma stong bas @240b lhag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-1: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-2: mthong ma thag tu yang de'i bu'i sdug pa skyes nas des lag pa bsgrengs te bu bu zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-3: dge slong rnams kyis de bzlog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-6: khyod kyis rgan mo 'di ma zlog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-8: 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-9: rtag tu nga yi yum gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-10: nga yi sku la reg pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-11: gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-12: de'u re mod la khrag dron dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-14: bu la gdung ba 'di mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-15: byas pa gzo ba rjes dgongs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-16: thugs rje dang ni thugs brtse bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-17: sku la reg tu gnang bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgul nas 'khyud du gnang bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-19: de bu la chags pa dang bral nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-22: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-23: bcom ldan 'das de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-24: de thos nas ka tsang ga las 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-25: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-26: des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:240b-29: bdag la phas ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-0: mas ma lags zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i @241a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-1: ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-2: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-3: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-4: tshigs su bcad pa dag gis kyang gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-5: ma la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-6: bu mchog gis ni bgyi ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-7: thar la sems gzhol 'gyur ba de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-8: khyod kyis de ring bdag la mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-9: khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro la; ;drangs te mtho ris thar la bzhag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-10: khyod kyis rtsol ba chen po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-11: dka' ba legs par mdzad pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-12: ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-14: de nas dus gzhan zhig na ka tsang ga las jo bo la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-17: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-19: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-20: bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-21: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-23: de nas des rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241a-24: bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-0: brtsal ba byas nas nyon mongs pa @241b thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom mar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-1: khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas rjed par bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-2: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o;; ;;'dul ba gzhi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-4: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la bsdus te mdor bka' stsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-5: gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir 'jug par mdzad pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-6: ka tsang ga las de rgyas par lung ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-9: nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-11: dge slong ma ka tsang ga la 'di mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-12: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-13: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-15: btsun pa; ka tsang ga las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-17: rgas nas rab tu byung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi srid pa tha ma pa de'i mngal du ma bzung bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-23: rab tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-27: dge slong ma ka tsang ga la nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa dag ces bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:241b-29: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-5: gang gi tshe nga rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-7: las de'i rnam par smin pas rgas nas rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-8: nga sbyin pa gtong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-12: ji ltar sgyu 'phrul chen mo ltar 'dis bsod nams dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ba'i las ma byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-14: nga'i srid pa tha ma 'di'i mngal du ma bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-16: dge slong ma slob pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-17: mi slob pa rnams la bran mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-21: de na 'dis gang dag bklags shing ston pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-23: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-24: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-25: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-26: des na nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-27: rab tu 'byin pa'i mkhan po gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-28: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242a-29: des na 'dis kyang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-0: bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yon gnas bla na med pa la tshe ji srid @242b cig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-1: yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-3: bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze khye'u khyod skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-5: zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-6: ji ltar bdag gi mkhan po 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis mdo sde rnam par 'phyed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-8: bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa des mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu ston par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-10: de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-11: ngas da ltar mdo sde rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-14: gcig tu nag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-15: gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-16: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-18: khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-19: zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:242b-22: yul dgra mtha' gang na ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-0: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das @243a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-3: ji tsam na kun dga' ra ba zhig na bram ze zhig khron pa nas chu bcus shing kun dga' ra ba bcu bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-4: bram ze des rgyang ring po kho na nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-6: gal te dge sbyong go'u ta ma kun dga' ra bar zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-11: dpyad thag dang chu snod sbas nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis kun dga' ra bar zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-13: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis khron pa de bzung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-14: kun dga' ra ba de thams cad chus g-yogs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-16: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-17: rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no; ;snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur te gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-18: shes ldan go'u ta ma tshur spyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-23: chab ci bder bzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-25: gal te kun na chu yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-26: khron pa'i chus ko ci zhig bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-27: 'dir ni srid pa'i rtsa bcad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-28: gang zhig yongs su brtsal bar spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze des 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243a-31: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-0: bsnyen par rdzogs @243b pa dge slong gi dngos po thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-1: dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-2: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-4: skra phyi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-5: mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-6: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-9: brtsal pa byas nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom par gyur te khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nas mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-10: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang yul dgra mthar gshegs te dgra mtha' na sbu gu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-12: de'i tshe dgra mtha' na rgyal po bram ze me sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-16: skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-17: rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-18: dgra mthar byon nas dgra mtha' na sbu bu can gyi shing nim pa'i drung na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-20: thos nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-21: dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-22: mtha'i rgyal po thams cad kyis bkur sti byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:243b-25: mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-0: gal te bdag gis dge sbyong @244a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-1: go'u ta ma la bkur sti ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-4: kye ma rgyal po bram ze me sbyin ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-6: de'i grong dang zhing na dge sbyong go'u ta ma nye bar brten cing bzhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-9: ma la bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bstab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-11: rgyal po chen po'i 'byor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-12: rgyal po chen po'i mthus dgra mtha' nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-13: yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-14: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-15: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-16: de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom lda 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244a-17: shes ldan go'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig la dgung zla gsum du na bza' chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-0: snyun @244b dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-1: bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-3: de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-4: de rang gi khyim du song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-5: nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sna bco brgyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-7: tshod ma ro dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-8: 'bras chan rab tu mang por chos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-9: dgra mthar dril sgrog tu bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-10: dge sbyong go'u ta ma zla ba gsum du gzhan gyis gdugs tshod ma gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-11: gang zhig gis gdugs tshod gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-14: zhes des de skad du dril bsgrags nas nub mo nyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-15: rmi lam na bdag gi rgyu mas dgra mtha'i grong khyer thams cad bskor bar rmis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-16: rmis nas kyang sngangs skrag byed cing spu zing zhes byed nas myur ba myur bar mal chen po nas langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-17: lag pa la 'gram pa gtad nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-18: srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-19: de nam nangs nas bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-21: bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam zhig mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:244b-22: de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-2: ji ltar lhas rmi lam bzang po zhig rmis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-3: gal te bdag de dang mthun par bsnyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-4: 'di lhag par yang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la dad pa skyed par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-5: ma la bdag gis 'di ngan par bsnyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-6: snyam du bsam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-8: rmi lam mi bzang lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-12: gdon mi 'tshal bar rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-13: srog gi bar chad du 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-16: kyi hud bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-17: srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-18: bram ze mdun na 'don la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-20: kho bo rgyal srid las nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-21: srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-24: gal te mi gda' ba'i phyogs su zla ba gsum bzhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-25: de nas lha rgyal srid las mi nyams shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-26: srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-27: de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-29: de bya sla bas dril sgrog tu gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-31: des yul thams cad du dril sgrog tu bcug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-32: nga la zla ba gsum du blta zhing nye bar su yang ma 'ong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-34: de ni chad par gsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245a-35: zhes dril sgrog tu bcug nas zla ba gsum du mi snang ba'i phyogs shig na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-0: tshe dang @245b ldan pa kun dga' bo nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-1: rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-2: ji tsam na rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi zho shas 'tsho ba rnams sems las chung ngus 'khod pa dag mthong ngo; ;mthong nas kyang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-8: rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis mi bstab bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-9: khyed cag sems las chung ngus 'khod nas gdugs tshod kyang sta gon mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-12: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod gcod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-15: lhas lnga brgya rnams kyi ched du zhal zas bsod pa mang du sta gon byos shig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-17: che ge mo zhig gi don du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-18: zhes bka' ma stsal lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-22: lhas dril sgrog tu stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-23: da la zla ba gsum du lta zhing nye bar su'ang ma 'ong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-28: bdag cag la mgo bo gnyis mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-31: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-32: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la skabs de rgyal par gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:245b-33: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-2: song la snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-5: sum mdo rnams su shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-6: khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-7: zhal zas gsol cig ces sbron cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-9: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-10: snam sbyar thogs te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gzhan zhig dang dgra mtha'i lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-13: sum mdo rnams su bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-15: khyed cag las gang dag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-17: dgra mtha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-20: re res kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du zhal zas gsol bar spro lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-21: rgyal po sdig pa can 'dis dril sgrog tu stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-22: gzhan sus kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te zla ba gsum du zhal zas ma gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246a-23: gang zhig gis zhal zas gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-0: ji tsam na byang phyogs nas ded @246b dpon zhig rta lnga brgya la khal bkal te dgra mthar phyin nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-1: gal te mod la chas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-2: rta rnams kyi rmig pa dub pas 'theng bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-3: lom par yang mi 'gyur bas 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-6: des rta cang shes la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-8: rta lhag ma rnams la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-9: bre'u chung re re thang chad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-10: des rgyal po rtsis mgo 'di dang 'di dag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:246b-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa yang thos nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:254a-0: @254a *// khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas 'bras s'a lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste bskur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-7: gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing mthong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-8: de mthong nas 'chags shing phyir sdom par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-9: dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-20: tshe thung ngu'i dus su byung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-21: gdul ba'i don bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-22: rab tu mang la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la yang 'bab pas mi gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-23: gal te de lta lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-24: bcom ldan 'das lo bdun nas zla ba bdun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-25: dgung bdun zhig gnang bar mdzad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis der yang ma gnang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257a-27: bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-2: rgyal po bram ze me sbyin khrag dron du skyugs nas dus las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i gnas yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-3: snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-4: de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te rang gi gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-6: blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-8: gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams cad sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyod par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-11: zhal zas thams cad dogs la bkram la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-12: dge slong rnams kyi zhabs kyis bcags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-14: yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-15: des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-17: kha zas ji snyed yod pa 'di thams cad sa la kun tu khrom zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-18: de rnams kyis thams cad du kun tu bkram mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-19: de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyi de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-20: bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-21: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:257b-23: rgan zhugs shig mi bzod pa skyes te bdag cag zla ba gsum du nas rul pa zos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-0: @258a *// da ni; rgyal po sdig can 'di'i 'byor pa ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-3: bca' ba sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-4: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-7: bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-10: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-11: bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-13: nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-14: dge slong dag bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-15: bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas reg par byed pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-17: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-19: dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-20: bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-22: khyim bdag rnams smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-26: dge slong gis bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-27: bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas bcag par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-30: de nas rgyal po bram ze me sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs pa rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258a-31: bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stob cing tshim par byed de zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-0: stan ches dma' @258b ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-1: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze me sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-3: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-4: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-5: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-6: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-9: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-10: gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-11: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-12: chos gos byas pa dang ldan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-13: chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:258b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-1: dang; dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-2: bde ba'i gzhi yin par rig par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-4: dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos la gnas pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-5: gang gi gtsug lag khang na gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-6: sems kyi ting 'dzin tshad med pa'i lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-7: gzhi de las sbyin pa po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-8: sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-9: dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-10: bde ba'i gzhi dpag tu med par rig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-11: gtsug lag khang ji lta bar chos gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-13: gnas mal yang de dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-14: bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-15: dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-16: bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-17: sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad re zhig bsod nams sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-19: bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-20: zhes gzung bar mi nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-21: 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-23: chu bo chen po lnga po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-28: chen po zhes bya ba de dag 'bab cing 'dres par 'gyur ba de la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-32: chu bum pa brgya stong 'di snyed ces gzung bar mi nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259a-33: 'on kyang chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i tshogs chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-0: bsod @259b nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-1: dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-2: bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-3: sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad bsod nams sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-4: bsod nams kyis 'bras bu 'am; bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-5: zhes gzung bar mi nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-6: 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-7: ji ltar rgya mtsho bkra shis gtsang la dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-8: ngogs bde rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho mchog der //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-9: mi dang ri dvags tshogs kyis bsten pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-10: chu bo so so nas 'bab 'du ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-11: de bzhin gos dang zas skom ster ba'i mi; ;mal cha stan dang gding ba sbyin byed la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-12: bsod nams rgyun ni kun nas 'du 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-13: dper na rgya mtshor chu klung 'bab pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-14: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-19: dbu la sogs pa bkum pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis slong mo pa'i skye bo tshim par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-20: bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du sems can gyi don gyi slad du bdag nyid 'o brgyal nas mdzad pa thams cad mdzad lags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-21: yul dgra mtha' na dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyi ma tshang pa dang thabs cig tu nas rul pa gsol la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-22: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-23: mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:259b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-4: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-7: skye rgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-8: 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa; bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-10: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-11: de 'khor dge slong brgyad khri dang rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-12: de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na tshogs rnams slob par byed pa'i bram ze zhig lnga brgya'i tshogs la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-13: 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang lhag par bkur sti byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-16: mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-17: gang kho na nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-18: rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du gshegs pa de kho na nas bzung ste de la su yang bkur stir bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-21: mchod par bya ba mi byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260a-22: de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la shin tu phrag dog skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260b-2: mi slob pa rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260b-3: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260b-4: de nas tshod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260b-5: 'bras chan gyis lhung bzed bkang ste slar log pa bram ze des mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260b-7: ji 'dra ba'i bsod snyoms shig rnyed blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260b-8: de dag drang po'i rang bzhin yin pas bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:260b-9: de phrag dog gi rang bzhin can zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bram ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-8: bdag gi cha ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-9: ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-12: de nas sngon sbal pa byed pa'i lha'i bus rna cha dri ma med pa g-yo ba thogs nas zhes bya ba nas gangg'a'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas te bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-13: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-17: rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-18: de thos pas zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-19: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:265b-24: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-2: chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-3: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-4: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-5: de nas sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong ba khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-6: zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-7: dpa' bo g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-8: nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa lta bur 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-9: dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-10: nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson zhing gnas pa de rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-12: de mthong nas kyang the tshom du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa ci lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-14: mdang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-15: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-16: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-18: nga blta ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs pa yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-19: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-20: 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin gyi; 'on kyang gnag rdzi dga' bo'i 'khar bas sbal ba brdzis te gnad rnams kyang chad la thug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-21: tshigs rnams kyang bye la thug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266a-22: gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam bar chad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-0: snyam nas @266b mi g-yo zhing sgra ma phyung bar 'dug nas de la sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-1: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-2: nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs nas ngas de la chos bshad nas bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-3: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-6: 'khor lnga brgyas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-7: gnag rdzi dag gi nang du skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-9: sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-10: des na sbal par skyes par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-11: bden pa mthong bar bgyis pa lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-14: de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags la tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-16: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-19: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-20: ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-21: de w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-22: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-23: de'i gsung rab la gnag rdzi dga' bo rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-25: rig pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:266b-26: 'khor lnga brgya pa rtsod pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-1: gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams zhi bar byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-2: de nas dge slong khengs pa nga rgyal can gnyis shig lan 'ga' yang de'i drung du mi 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-3: dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis phan tshun du rtsod pa byung nas don de'i phyir de gnyis de'i drung du dong nas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-4: bdag cag gnyis la 'di dang 'di lta bu'i rtsod pa byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-6: des bsam ba; gal te bdag gis 'di gnyis kyi rtsod pa deng kho na zhi bar byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-7: rag ma las pas 'di gnyis phyis 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-9: des dge 'dun thams cad bsags nas rtsod pa de dge 'dun gyi nang du gleng nas chad par ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-11: phyi de nyin yang de la ri bor du dgos pa zhig byung nas de der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-12: de nas de gnyis kyis thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-13: zhes dge 'dun gyi nang du rtsod pa de gleng nas de nas dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-15: dge slong sde snod gsum pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-16: ri bor de nas 'ongs te lam gyis dub pa bsal nas lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-17: re zhig rtsod pa pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-21: de gnyis kyi rtsod pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-23: su zhig gis zhi bar byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-26: de rnams kyis rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-27: des ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-28: tshe dang ldan pa dag mi shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267a-29: ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-0: de rnams @267b kyis kyang mkhan po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-3: gnag rdzi rnams kyi ltar rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-7: de'i tshe dus kyi dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-8: gnag rdzi dga' bo 'di nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-9: de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-10: gnag rdzi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-11: gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gnag rdzi zhes bya ba'i tshig smras shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-12: lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas rnams kyis kyang mthun par smras pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-13: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-14: tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'khor lnga brgya dang gnag rdzi rnams su skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-15: gang 'dis bklags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-17: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-18: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-19: gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-20: da ltar 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-22: sngon sbal pa byed pa'i lha'i bu yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kho na'i gsung rab la dge slong spong ba pa zhig tu gyur te ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-24: ri bor zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der son to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-25: de mtshan mo'i thun dang po la skyil mo krung bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:267b-26: yid la bya ba goms par bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-1: tsam na 'don pa byed pa'i dge slong rnams kha ton byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-2: bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas de sgras sems rtse gcig nyid du ma btub nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-3: 'di dag kha ton zer du chug gung thun la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas gung thun la langs te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-4: ji tsam na dge slong gzhan dag kha ton byed nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-5: thun tha ma la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-6: de thun tha ma la langs te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-7: ji tsam na gzhan dag la ton byed nas de 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas kun nas dkris pa drag po skyes nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-8: 'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni sbal pa bzhin mtshan thog thag sgra 'byin to zhes byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-11: dge slong spong ba pa gang yin pa de ni sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-12: gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la sbal pa zhes tshig tu smras pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-13: las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar sbal par skyes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-14: da lta'i bar du yang sbal bar skyes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-15: gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-16: des na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-17: gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268a-18: des na da ltar bden pa mthong bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-0: gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa @268b ni gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtson par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-2: khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-3: zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gangg'a brgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-7: rul sbal lnga brgyas bskor te bskor ba byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-8: de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-10: 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-11: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-12: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-13: nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-14: ci nas kyang dud 'gro'i skye gnas la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-15: de rnams 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-16: gang bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas kha zas za bar byed pa ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin no snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-17: de rnams kyis kha zas bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-18: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams ni me'i shas che bas dus las 'das te shi 'phos pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-21: lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-25: de rnams kyis bltas na dud 'gro dag las shi 'phos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:268b-26: me tog man d'a ra bas thu ba bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-1: gsal bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-2: bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-7: de dang 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-8: thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-9: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-10: de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-11: des lan gsum du brjod pas ched du brjod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-14: bdag cag la phas ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-23: bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-29: lha dang mi rnams su ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-33: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-34: rus pa'i ri bo las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-36: ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269a-37: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-0: thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo @269b nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-1: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-6: bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-8: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-9: bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-10: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsdos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-13: rus sbal byed byed pa'i lha'i bu de rnams tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang zhes bya ba nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-14: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-15: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-16: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-20: rus sbal 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-24: rus sbal rnams su skyes lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-27: lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-32: rus sbal 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:269b-36: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-0: de w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na drang @270a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-1: srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-2: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-3: de'i bstan pa la de rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-4: de na dge slong de rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo rnams dral bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-5: las de'i rnam par smin pas nya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-7: rus sbal rnams su skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-8: gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnams su skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-9: gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-10: bden pa mthong bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-13: gcig tu nag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-14: gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-17: khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-18: zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-19: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gangg'a brgal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-21: yi dvags sngon du ma tshig pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-22: keng rus bsgreng ba lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-23: rang gi skras lus g-yogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-25: kha khab kyi mig tsam yod pa 'bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-28: me lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor nas de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-30: bdag cag yi dvags rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-31: rnam par ltung ba'i lus can rnams lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270a-32: sngon gyi las kyis nongs pas chab kyang mi rnyed lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-0: 'tshal ma mthong ba lta smos kyang @270b ci 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-2: thugs rje chen po mnga' ba lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-3: bdag cag la chab stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chu bo gangg'a bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-5: chu bsil skye bo kun gyis nye bar spyad bya ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-6: skal ldan shing rta klung chen 'di ni grong khyer dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-7: yul 'khor dag dang grong khyer tshim par byed cing 'bab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-8: zhing rnang s'a lu ku mu da dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-10: yi dvags rnams kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-11: chu bo skye bo kun gyis nye bar spyad bgyi ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-12: skal ldan shing rta 'bab 'di bdag cag rnams la bskams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-13: 'di ni khrag gi dri mas gang zhing lag pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-14: dbyug pa dgra star bcas pa thogs pas 'di srung mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis gangg'a'i lha la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-16: khyod ni grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer tshim byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-17: zhing rnang s'a lu ku mu da dang autpal skru na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-18: ci phyir yi dvags skom pas rab nyen tshim mi byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-19: khyod la byis pa'i skye bo sdug bsngal snying rje med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-21: byis pa'i skye bo la bdag 'jigs pas ma lags shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-22: tshig rtsub rgyus kyang mi mthun chab gtong mi bgyid de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-23: nongs bgyis sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa 'di dag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-24: chu bo bskams gyur 'di la bdag gis ci zhig nongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-27: yi dvags rnams la chu blud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:270b-29: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-1: chu blud par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-2: yi dvags de rnams kyi kha khab kyi mig tsam po dag bskyed par ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-4: de rnams kyi kha bskyed nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos chu blud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-5: de rnams skom pas nyen pas mang du 'thung pas lto rgyas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dang ba bskyed nas shi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-7: zhes bya ba nas bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-8: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-9: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-10: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-12: yi dvags 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-13: des na yi dvags rnams su skyes lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-16: lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-19: 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-22: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-25: bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-26: skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-27: de w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-28: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-29: de'i nyan thos rnams kyi dad pa las bslangs na sangs rgyas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271a-31: dge 'dun la bya ba byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-0: gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @271b 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa rgyas par ma gyur pa de'i tshe dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang nyung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-1: gang gi tshe rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-2: dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong yang mang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-3: ji tsam na 'dun khang zhig na dge bsnyen lnga brgya 'ga' zhig gi phyir lhags shing 'dus par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-4: dad pa 'dri ba'i dge slong rab tu mang po dag de rnams kyi drung du dong nas sbyin du gzhug par 'dod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-5: de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pa drag pos ngag rtsub po'i las phyung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-6: 'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-7: yi dvags rnams su skyes pa bzhin rtag tu lag pa zed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-11: dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-12: yi dvags lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-13: gang yang 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la yi dvags kyi tshig smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar yi dvags rnams su skyes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-14: da lta'i bar du yang yi dvags rnams su skyes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-15: gang yang de la sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-17: gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-18: bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des na bden pa mthong bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-21: gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-22: gcig tu nag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-24: khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-25: zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:271b-26: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo @272a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-2: glang po che'i sta stangs kyis g-yas phyogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-3: chu bo gangg'a gzigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-4: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-5: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du g-yas phyogs nas chu bo gangg'a la gzigs par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-7: dge slong dag khyed cag chu bo gangg'a'i gling gzhi nyan par 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-8: bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-9: bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gangg'a gleng gzhi gang lags pa shad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-11: dge slong rnams nyan par 'gyur lags so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-15: sngon byung ba rgyal po smyug sbam zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-16: chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-21: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-22: shing me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-23: lha rnams dus dus su char 'bebs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-24: sa gzhi lo tog dang ldan zhing 'thab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-30: nad rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-31: mi rnams rtag tu chos la gzhol ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-32: chos kyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272a-33: ji tsam na rgyal po de so ga'i dus la bab nas shing rnams kyi me tog kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-2: shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-3: btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-4: skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-5: ji tsam na mi lus gnyer mas gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-7: lus kyi yan lag rnyis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-10: zho sha chung ba zhig 'khar ba la brten nas gom pa dal bu dal bus 'gro ba zhig mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-11: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-15: mgo skya ba zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-16: 'khar ba la brten nas 'gro ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-20: 'du byed rnams dengs pas rgas 'khogs pa zhes bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-23: nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-28: de nas rgyal po yid mi bde zhing chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-30: mi skya bo rbab rbab po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-31: lus gas shing hrul hrul po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-34: yan lag dang nying lag rnams las 'dzag pa lhan pa rnams kyis dkris pa zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-35: shugs ring po ring por 'byin cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-36: 'khar ba la brten nas 'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-37: mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-39: mi skya bo seng po zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-40: 'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:272b-44: nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-1: nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-2: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-6: nye bar spyod pa'i las bgyis pa rnams la sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-8: rnam pa thams cad du sdig pa mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-9: snyam du bsam nas chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-14: dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-23: bu mo dag bun long zhing mi bzhis bteg nas 'gyogs mis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-25: skyes bu lag na shing thogs pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-30: kyi hud jo bo zhes kun tu dud mo'i sgra 'don pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-31: mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-36: dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan cing zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-37: dud mo'i sgra 'don pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-38: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-44: nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-47: chos 'di ni thun mong lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-51: shi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273a-52: bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod rnams spang dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-0: slar log ste mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug @273b go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-1: de'i yul na bram ze dus dpog ces bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-4: longs spyod che ba zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-5: de ji ltar rgyal pos rgas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-8: yid byung nas mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-9: thos nas kyang bram ze brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-10: shing rta rta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-12: ril ba spyi blugs thogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-13: rgyal po smyug sbam gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-14: rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-16: bram ze dus dpog chab sgo na mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-17: de nas rgyal po phyir byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-20: rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas te 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-22: ci'i slad du thugs ngan gyi khang par zhugs te bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-24: ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bram ze dus dpog la rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-28: rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-29: 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-30: sems can legs pa'i las bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis nyes pa'i las bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-31: gnyi ga'i las bgyid pa yang mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-33: rtag tu las legs pa bgyid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-34: gum na yang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-35: lha yang 'khor los bsgyur ba lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-36: mi'i bde ba khyad par du 'phags pa bstar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:273b-37: lha'i bde ba yang nyams su bstar bar 'gyur mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-0: 'on kyang mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa mchod sbyin @274a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-2: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-4: yul thams cad du dril sgrog bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-5: rgyal po gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-6: khyed shog la longs spyod cig ces sgos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-7: de nas rgyal pos sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-9: btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-10: der 'bras khu dbo ba'i dong dag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-11: der dran po dag blugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-12: bsil bar gyur pas ma dros pa ma dros pa zhes bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-14: 'bras bkrus pa'i khu ba lo bcu gnyis tshang bar bkang bas lud par gyur pa'i kha de nas 'bab chur bab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-15: 'bras khu'i chu 'bras khu'i chu zhes bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-17: gzhon nu bskyed dang glang chen sgra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-18: dpung rgyal ldan dang nor bu can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-19: s'a la stobs dang s'a la'i stobs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:274a-20: gser bre dang ni gnas bcas dang //
