K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:282b-21: stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:282b-22: rgya mtsho lta bu'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:282b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:282b-24: ded dpon bla na med pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:282b-25: yon du bshad pa de yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:282b-27: de la re zhig bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bya ba byas pa'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-1: pa la bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-3: 'di na sems rab dang byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-4: gang zhig bzhugs dang gang zhig ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-5: mya ngan 'das la mchod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-6: bsod nams mnyam ste khyad par med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-7: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-8: sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-9: bsam mi khyab la dad rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-10: rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-11: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-12: bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag gi yon tan ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-15: gang thos na srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-17: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-19: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-27: bden pa dang mthun pa'i bzod pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283a-29: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-0: nyon mongs pa thams @283b cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-4: dge 'dun la bab par bkod pa de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-6: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-7: phyogs de nyid du dus ston btsugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-8: de nas chu mang dus ston can chu mang dus ston can zhes bya bar grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-11: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-12: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-13: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bdag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-15: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-20: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-21: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:283b-22: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-0: de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin stan las langs te @284a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-1: zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-3: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-4: gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-5: nang par sngar langs te stan bting nas nor bu'i chu snod sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-6: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-8: gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-10: de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-11: sgo srung gi mi la bsgo ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-14: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du gzhan mu stegs pa dag nang du ma gtang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-15: de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-17: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo srung gi mis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las nyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-19: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-20: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-21: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-22: stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-0: de @284b nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dgon pa'i gnas mal zhig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-1: skra dang kha spu ring zhing chos gos ngan pa zhig gyon te rgyal byed du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-2: des bltas na rgyal byed kyi tshal stong par 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-3: des dge bskos la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-4: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gang du bzhud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-6: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-8: de nyid du bsod snyoms bza' zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-9: de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-12: nang du ma bzhud par bzhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-14: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas re zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-15: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du gzhan mu stegs pa dag nang du ma gtang zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-16: de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa rnams la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-18: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-19: gang bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis bdag la dge sbyong sh'akya'i sras kyi dge sbyong yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-20: zhes bya bar ma shes pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-21: bdag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-22: song la skye bo bkren pa rnams la snying rje bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-24: skyed mos tshal du song nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-25: deng bdag gis su zhig rjes su gzung bar bya snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:284b-26: re zhig cig tu na grong phyi nyug ma mdzes thebs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-2: slong mo la rgyu zhing 'dug nas de'i drung du de song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-3: des kyang bslangs na 'bras bu zhig rnyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-4: des tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-6: spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-7: nges par bdag gis yon gnas 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-8: des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas su gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-9: gal te 'phags pa 'od srung chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'bras khu bzhes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-15: gal te khyod kyis btang ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-17: de nas des sems mngon par dad par byas nas lhung bzed der blugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-19: des de dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-20: 'bras khu de'i nang du sor mo gcig chad de lhung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-22: 'phags pas bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma phor zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-23: 'on kyang gsol ni mi gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-25: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyi shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-26: de'i mngon sum kho nar 'bab pa'i rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas 'thungs pa dang des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-27: cung zad du na bdag gis sems bsrung ba'i phyir gsol gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285a-28: 'on kyang 'dis zas kyi go chod par ni mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-0: de nas tshe @285b dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-1: grong phyi nyug ma de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-2: sring mo rab tu dga' ba skyed cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-3: khyod kyis byin pa'i zas 'dis kho bo nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-4: de lhag par dga' ba skyes nas bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la bsod snyoms bstabs na bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-5: snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la sems dang ba bskyed nas shi pas; dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-6: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i 'bras khu zhig phul nas sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-7: gang du skyes pa ma mthong nas des sems can dmyal bar brtag par brtsams na yang ma mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-12: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su yang ma mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-14: lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-19: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-20: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-21: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-22: 'od srung bdag nyid chen po can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-23: bsod snyoms phyir ni rgyu ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-25: bud med de ni gar dga' lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-27: dga' ldan zhes bya'i lha de rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:285b-30: bud med de ni de na dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-1: dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-3: bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong na yang sbyin pa dag gtong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-5: bdag bsod nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa ko /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-6: ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-7: bsod nams dag mi bya snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-10: mgon med pa bkren pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-11: phongs pa la thugs brtse ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-12: ma la bdag gis 'di la bsod snyoms bstab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-14: bkren pa'i srang du khyim shag shig tu 'dug par lhang lhong rdol pa shin tu mi bzang ba zhig sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-15: bdag nyid tha ga pa skra yegs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-16: sha na'i ras kyi smad g-yogs gyon pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-17: rkang lag ser ga byung ba zhig tu sprul nas ras 'thag par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-18: lha mo bde sogs kyang tha ga pa'i chung ma'i cha byad du byas nas ras skud 'ju bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-20: lha'i zhal zas zhig gi sta gon byas te bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-24: phongs pa'i skye bo rnams la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir rim gyis khang pa der phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-27: zhes lhung bzed bzed nas sgor bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-28: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i zhal zas kyis bkang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-29: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'di snyam du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-30: 'di zas lha yi bdud rtsi la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-31: khyim gyi spungs mi 'di tsam pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286a-32: shin tu 'gal lo zhes bsam ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-0: @286b bdag gi snying la the tshom skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-4: ma bsam par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-5: bsam pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-7: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yin par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi yun ring po nas rjes su 'brel ba'i the tshom dang som nyi'i zug rngu rtsa nas phyung zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-13: skye bo sdug bsngal ba'i bar chad byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-15: skye bo sdug bsngal ba'i bar chad ci ste bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-17: bsod nams dag mngon sum du ma mthong na yang sbyin pa dag gtong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-19: bdag bsod nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa ko /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-20: ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi gtong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-23: bsod nams dag ni bya dgos te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-24: bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-25: bsod nams dag ni byas pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-28: de phyin chad tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bsam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-29: khyim rnams su bsod snyoms la 'gro bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-30: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-31: lha'i zhal zas kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung gi lhung bzed 'gengs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:286b-32: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos kyang lhung bzed kha phub pas bza' ba dang btung ba bo bar gyur pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-3: de'i phyir rjes su gnang gi lhung bzed kyi kha g-yogs bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-4: grong phyi nyug mche ge mo zhes bya bas 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras khu gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-5: de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi ris su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-6: zhes kun tu sgra grags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-7: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis grong phyi nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras khu gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-8: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-10: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-14: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-15: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-16: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-17: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:287a-18: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-20: bstan pas de nyid gdul phyir bslab par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-24: khyod kyis 'di ltar gang mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ngoms shing chog shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mi gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-26: mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mi ngoms shing chog mi shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-27: ches mang bar rig par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-28: de nas rgyal po nga las nus gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-29: tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-30: 'jig rten pha rol yang shes shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-31: tshe thung bar ni shes byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309a-32: bsod nams dag ni bya ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-0: bsod nams ma @309b byas sdug bsngal 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-1: de bas bsod nams 'dod pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-2: sbyin pa tshul bzhin btang byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-4: sbyin pa byas pa dga' bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-8: rgyal po nga las nu na ste shi la thug cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-10: thos nas kyang yang srog chags brgya stong du ma dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-11: rgyal po nga las nu blta ba'i phyir nye bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-12: rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs rnams la 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs kyi gtam yang byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-13: khyim na gnas pa'i nyes dmigs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-14: de bzhin du 'dod pa smad pa yang bshad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-15: de thos nas srog chags brgya stong du ma dag khyim gyi gnas spangs nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-17: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-18: 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-19: de la mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skal pa mnyam par skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-20: rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-21: ji srid gzhon nu rtse ba'i sa na rtses pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-22: ji srid rgyal tshab byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-23: ji srid dzambu'i gling du rgyal srid chen po byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-24: ji srid shar gyi lus 'phags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-25: nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-26: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-27: gser gyi ri bo bdun la gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:309b-28: ji srid du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gnas su song ste gnas la de'i bar la brgya byin brgyad cu rtsa bzhi shi 'phos pa lon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-0: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi @310a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-2: mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-3: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-4: nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha rnams kyi lo stong ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-5: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-8: lo bye ba phrag gsum dang drug khri yong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-10: gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-13: bdag la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan phyed bstabs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed pa de'i tshe de'i dus kyi brgya byin ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-15: gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-16: ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gnas 'di nas phyung la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-17: bdag nyid lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-18: snyam pa de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-19: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-20: sems can shin tu dbang cher grags pa la ngan sems bskyed pa des na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-21: 'byor pa de las nyams nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310a-22: nad tshabs chen pos thebs shing 'chi ba la thug pa'i tshor ba mi zad pa myong bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-0: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi @310b rgyal po las nu gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-2: gang yang ngas sems can de snyed cig la phan pa byas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-3: des bla na med pa'i ye shes ma thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-8: rgyal po the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-9: the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-12: rgyal po nga las nus las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-13: las de'i rnam par smin pas sems bskyed ma thag tu dgung bdun du pho brang nang du gser gyi char bab lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-17: 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-20: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-21: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gnon ces bya ba byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-23: de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu khyim phub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-24: yul de na chos lugs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-25: bag mar btang nas ring por ma lon par bag rdzongs btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-26: khyim thab la gtong ba'i bag ma gang yin pa rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog gis brgyan nas khyim thab la gtong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:310b-27: khyim thab des kyang de khrid nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-1: po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog thogs nas bzhon pa la zhon te rang gi khyim du chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-2: de chas pa las re zhig cig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-3: lam na tshur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon ljongs rgyu zhing byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-4: des de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-5: blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu dad pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-6: de nas de dad pas brlan pa'i sems kyis bzhon pa las babs nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la gtor ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-9: gshegs na yang phyi bzhin 'ong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-10: bzhugs na yang 'dug pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-11: de dad pa skyes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-12: sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-16: drang srong che kun zil gnon bcom ldan la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-17: nga yis gser gyi me tog bzang gtor nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-18: go 'phang mchog 'di 'dod nas de yi tshe //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-19: nga yis smon lam rgya chen btab pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311a-20: bsod nams de nyid kyi ni rnam smin gyis //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311b-7: gang yang ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la sems dang ba bskyed nas rin po che sna bzhi'i me tog gis gtor ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311b-8: nga'i pho brang gi nang du zhag bdun du gser gyi char bab po //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311b-22: de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311b-23: rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311b-24: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311b-26: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:311b-27: rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-6: ku sha'i thum por bcug nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-10: des ku sha bkrus nas 'thungs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-11: de yang sems can dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-12: de rnams zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-13: de dag thams cad bus pa btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-14: de'i btsun mo dam pa las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-15: bu pho mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-16: bzhin seng+ge'i gdong pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-17: tshan po che chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa zhig btsas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-18: de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-19: ku sha zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-20: rgyal po de bu gzhan rnams mthong na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-23: mi sdug pas zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-24: khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-26: bdag cag thams cad rgyal po la nye can chen po 'dis thibs kyis mnan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-27: de rgyal srid las dbyung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-28: 'dong ngo zhes de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-29: de'i grong khyer bskor te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-30: rgyal po la nye can chen po ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-31: de rnams dang lhan cig g-yul sprod ma phod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-32: de sgo rnams bcad der ba'i kha nas sbrengs te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-34: ma'i drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-36: ci'i slad du sgo rnams bkum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:322b-37: khyod kyi yab khams kyi rgyal phran dag dang lhan cig g-yul sprod ma phod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-0: @323a *// de sgo rnams bcad de 'dug pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-2: bdag 'di dag dang lhan cig g-yul sprad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-3: bdag la rgyal pos shing rta stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-5: khyod de'i snying du mi sdug cing zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-6: de ji ga khyod la shing rta ster tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-9: bzhud nas gzhon nu ku sha 'di dag dang lhan cig g-yul sprod par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-10: shing rta stsol ces gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-11: de song nas rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-14: bdag 'di dag dang lhan cig g-yul sprad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-16: des de la shing rta byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-17: de dong pa gnyis thogs nas shing rtar zhugs te 'byung bar brtsams pa na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-18: khams kyi rgyal phran 'di dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-19: mthu dang ldan pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-20: gzhon nu ku sha bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-27: byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis khyod 'tsho bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-28: de sgo phye nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-29: de nam dung 'bud pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-30: dung gi sgras dpung rnams skrag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-34: rna ba bkab nas bros so; ;nam 'khor lo'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-36: de dag sa la 'gyel bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323a-37: des dmag gi nang du song nas dung bus pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-0: de dag thams cad kyi rna ba rdol bar gyur nas de @323b rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-4: des ril phab nas pha'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-6: bdag gis rgyal po thams cad pham par bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-8: rgyal po la nye can chen pos thos nas mgu ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-10: gzhon nu ku sha mthu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-11: brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-12: ci'i phyir bdag gis 'di la mi dga' ba bskyed snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-13: de de la dga' ba bskyed par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-14: des bu de rnams khyim phub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-15: ku sha'i chung ma yang bslang ba de brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-16: de dag thams cad kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-17: ku sha ma gtogs pa la bu mo sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-18: rgyal po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po gzhan gyi bu mo zhig bslangs te bag mar ma blangs pa'i bar der /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-19: rgyal po la nye can chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-20: bu gzhan gyi ched yin pa'i thabs shig gis bslangs nas bu mo de ku sha la byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-24: gzhon nu ku sha'i khyim phub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-27: sus kyang gzhon nu ku sha la me long ma ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-28: chur 'jug pa'i khrus ma yin pa'i khrus kyi khrus byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-29: nyin par chung ma'i drung du ma gtong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-30: gzhon nu ku sha spun rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba chung ma des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-32: gzhon nu rnams kyi dbus na rtsed mo byed pa'i sha za pha bi su zhig yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-34: khyod kyi khyim thab yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:323b-36: kho mo'i khyim thab 'di 'dra ba zhig gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-0: phyi zhig na yang des gzhon nu rnams dang lhan cig chu @324a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-1: na rtse ba'i bar dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-2: de bzhin du bdag gi khyim thab ci 'dra ba zhig snyam ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-6: des me mar bus te phru bas bkab nas bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-7: de yang chung ma'i drung du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-9: mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-10: bzhin seng ge'i gdong pa 'dra ba zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-13: sha za zhes byas nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-14: rgyal po la nye can chen po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-15: ri bor pa gzhan zhig log nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-16: des gzhon nu ku sha song la ri bor pa rnams phobs cig ces btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-20: khyed cag sa'i steng na skyes pa med dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-21: ci na khyed kyis bdag sha za la sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-22: gal te bdag bkum na de lta na legs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-23: gal te mi bkum na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-24: kho mo rang 'chi'o zhes spring ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-25: de dag gis de khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-26: gzhon nu ku shas kyang ri bor de phab ste 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-29: bdag gi mchis brang de gar mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-33: khyod sha za yin snyam nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-34: yum mchis la de dgug par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-38: be con khyer te der song ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-41: skye bo'i tshogs chen po seng ges 'jigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-42: sgo rnams bcad de phyogs su lta zhing 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324a-43: gzhon nu ku shas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-4: gal te bdag gis bsad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-6: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-7: gzhon nu ku shas seng ge'i drung du nye bar song nas dung bus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-8: de'i rna ba rdol de shi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-9: des de khyer te ri bor du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-13: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyed khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-15: khyed cag nyid kyi lag tu zhog la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-17: de ri bor gang na chung ma de yod pa'i ri bor der song nas me tog phreng rgyud mkhan zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-18: des smras pa; khyod 'dra ba su zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-20: me tog phreng rgyud mkhan gyi bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-25: las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-26: des me tog phreng legs par brgyud pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-28: bu mo de la me tog phreng ba de byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-30: 'di 'dra ba'i me tog phreng ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-31: khyed kyis sngon lan 'ga' yang ma brgyus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-33: bdag gi slob mas brgyus so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-43: g-yos mkhan zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:324b-46: kho bo g-yos mkhan gyi bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-3: bsreg pa legs par byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-5: bu mo de la bcos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-12: bdag gi slob mas g-yos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-13: khyod kyi slob ma de blta'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-21: bu mo de klad nad kyis thebs par gyur pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-22: sman pas gso ma nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-23: sman pa sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-26: ci'i phyir sems khong du chud cing 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-27: rgyal po'i bu mo klad nad kyis thebs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-28: kho bos gso bar ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-30: legs so zhes de song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-31: des mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-36: gang gi tshe bdag sos par gyur pa de'i tshe smra'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-40: sha za zhes sgra phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-42: blon po rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-45: de rnams kyis de drung du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-46: sngon dbang po'i rgyal po'i bu gang yin pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325a-47: bdag gis sngon rgyal po'i bu mo thob pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-0: gzhon nu @325b ku shas bor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-1: rang gi khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-3: des rgyal po de la gal te re zhig kho bo la bu mo byin na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-5: gal te ma byin na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-7: zhes spring pa dang; des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-9: rgyal po la nye can chen po'i bu rgyal bu gzhon nu ku sha la byin zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-11: de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-12: rgyal po'i pho brang bskor te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-14: de dang lhan cig g-yul sprod ma phod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-15: des sgo dag bcad nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-16: gzhon nu ku shas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-17: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir sgo rnams bcad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-18: de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-19: gzhon nu ku shas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-20: gal te kho bo la rgyal po'i sras mo byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-21: kho bos de dang lhan cig g-yul sprod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-22: de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-25: ngas la nye can chen po'i bu la byin zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-27: da ltar gyi khrag khrug 'di yang bu mo kho na'i phyir yin no; ;blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-29: su rgyal bar 'gyur gtol ma mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-30: re zhig 'di de rnams dang lhan cig g-yul sprod du stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-31: de na skol gyis dus mkhyen par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-34: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:325b-35: stong thub ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-0: de nas bzhon nu ku shas mda' lnga brgya shong ba'i dong pa gnyis @326a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-4: be con khyer te byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-6: de rnams kyi rna ba rdol nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-7: rgyal po'i bu mo des bsam pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-12: de de la dga' ba bskyed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-13: rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-14: ji skad zhal gyis bzhes pa de mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-16: ngas khyod ku sha la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-19: gzhon nu ku sha de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-22: gal te de lta na song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-23: ces nges de la yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-24: bkur sti cher byas te btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-25: de ri bor der phyin nas de rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-27: kho bo'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa'i phyed byin cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-30: de na ha cang mi ring ba zhig na lug dag cig rgyu nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-32: lo ni drug cu lon pa'i glang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-34: der ni ba lang lug khyer bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-35: rjes su dpag nas shes par bya'o ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-38: gal te re zhig byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-43: de rnams kyis de la byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326a-44: de 'bab chu dang nye ba zhig tu btab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-0: ngal @326b bas khrus bya ba'i phyir chur zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-1: de na des rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-2: mtshan ngan pa rnam pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-3: bzhin sengge'i gdong pa 'dra ba yin te; de nyid kyi phyir rgyal po'i bu mo 'di bdag la mi dga' ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-7: de nags thibs po zhig tu zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-8: bdag nyid 'gegs par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-9: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-12: gzugs bzang po dang mi ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:326b-13: bdag nyid gsod par byed kyi /
