K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-8: sprul khas sdigs pa zhig blon po rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-9: bdag la gser gyi thum po 'di stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-10: bdag gis klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa 'phrog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-12: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-15: khyed cag gang la yid ches shing yid brtan pa de'i lag tu bzhag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-16: klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa khrid de mchis nas 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-18: de nas sprul khas sdigs pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-19: mi yid brtan du rung ba'i lag tu gser gyi thum po gtad nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-20: de nas des mtsho de'i kho ra khor yug tu brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-21: mtshan ma la mkhas pa zhig pas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-22: phyogs 'di kho na nyid na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-24: de nas de gtor ma dang yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345a-25: blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-0: bdag la gtor ma dang yo byad rnams @345b stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-1: zhag bdun gyi nyin par klu'i bu de 'phrog ste khrid de mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-2: sbrul khas sdigs pa de yang des mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-5: zhag bdun gyi bar bdag 'phrog nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-6: pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal chen po bdag gis myong bar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-8: su la skyabs btsal snyam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-10: mtsho de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-12: spang leb can gnyis gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-13: de gnyis mtsho de'i drung na gnas bcas nas gang dag skam la yod pa'i srog chags ri bong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-15: phag la sogs pa mtsho de la 'thung du 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-16: gang yang chu na yod pa nya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-18: sbal pa la sogs pa bsad cing 'tsho bar byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-19: de na yang sran can ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-23: klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-24: rngon pa spang leb can ma gtogs pa skyabs gzhan med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-26: de nas mi'i cha byad du byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-27: rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-29: rgyal po nor can gyi yul gyi 'byor pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-33: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-37: ma he phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:345b-39: ji ga khyod kyis shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-1: rgyal po de chos dang ldan pas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-4: brtse ba'i sems kyis yul bskyangs pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-9: gzhan gyi yon tan zhig kyang yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-10: mtsho 'di na klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs can zhes bya ba gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-11: des dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog phun sum tshogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-12: de na sa gzhi lhag par lo tog dang ldan pas yul yang bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-13: btung ba mod par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-14: skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-15: gal te 'ga' zhig gis klu'i bu de yul 'di nas 'phrog na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-18: de pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-19: rgyal po dang yul mis 'phrog na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-20: de la khyod kyis ji ltar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-22: khyod kyis klu'i bu de gang yin pa shes sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-25: lho phyogs lnga len pa'i sprul khas sdigs pa nga 'phrog par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-27: yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-28: 'ongs nas mtsho ngogs su seng ldeng gi phur bu grva bzhir btsugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-29: tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bres te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346a-30: gsang sngags rjod par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-0: de nas ha cang @346b yang mi ring pa zhig tu khyod mi mngon par 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-1: gang gi tshe des cho ga de lta bu bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe mtsho'i nang gi chu khol zhing lud par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-3: de'i tshe khyod kyis sbrul khas sdigs pa de'i gnad du mdas bsnun la de ma thag tu drung du song ste gsang sngags slar sdus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-5: khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-6: sa la bor ra re zhes smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-7: gal te des gsang sngags rnams ma bsdus par srog dang bral te shi na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-8: kho bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-10: gal te khyod gcig pa la phan thogs na yang de bzhin du kho bo kho nas byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-11: yul mtha' dag la phan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-12: kho bos skyabs bya'i song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-13: de nas klu'i bu des de la dben pa'i phyogs shig bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-14: ji tsam na rngon pa de zhag bdun gyi nyin par phyogs dben par bdag nyid gab ste 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-15: sbrul khas sdigs de yang 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-16: gtor ma dang yo byad kyi cho ga bya bar rtsom ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-17: des phyogs bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi btsugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-18: tshon skud sna tshogs kyis bres te gsang sngags brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-19: de nas chu de khol du cha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-20: rngon pas gnad du mdas bsnun nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:346b-21: khyod kyis nged kyi yul na gnas pa'i klu'i bu gsang sngags kyis dbrog gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-1: khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor ra re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-2: de nas sbrul khas sdigs pas sdug bsngal nyams su myong bas nyam thag cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-3: 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas gsang sngags brtul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-4: rngon pas de ma thag par de bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-5: de nas klu'i bu gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa las thar te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-6: mtsho nas byung nas rngon pa la 'khyud de 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-7: khyod ni kho bo'i ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-11: khyod la brten pas kho bo pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ma skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-14: zhes des de gnas su khrid de song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-16: btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-17: rin po che dag bstabs nas ma dang pha la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-20: bdag gi snying du sdug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-21: skyabs dang gnyen du gyur pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-24: lhan cig pa las bral bar ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-25: de dag gis kyang de la dam pa sbyin par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-26: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs byin nas des de rnams khyer te mtsho de nas byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-27: mtsho de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-30: bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-31: de na drang srong byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347a-32: sems can rnams la sdug par 'dzin pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-0: de @347b nas rngon pa de drang srong de'i drung du dus gsum du 'gro bar rtsom zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-1: de la klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang lhan cig ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-2: de nas drang srong des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-3: khyod la rin po che dang gser ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-4: de'i gnas na don yod pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa yod kyi de slongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-5: de nas rngon pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa la chags pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-6: drang srong gi tshig mnyan te slar klu'i gnas su song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-8: klu'i khang pa'i sgo na don yod pa'i zhags pa de mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-9: bdag 'dod pa'i zhags pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-13: de nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-14: klu gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par dga' ba dang mgu ba dag byas nas rin po che dag bstabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-17: rin po che mi dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-18: 'on kyang don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di kho bo la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-19: skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-20: khyod la 'di ci dgos kho bo cag la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-22: gang gi tshe nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa byas pa de'i tshe 'dis kho bo cag srung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-25: nam mkha' lding gi gnod pa lan 'ga' zhig 'byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-28: dus kun tu dgos kyi gal te legs pa byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:347b-29: phan btags pa dran pa lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-1: skye ba sna tshogs pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-2: 'dis bdag la phan cher btags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-3: pha ma la brtags te sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-5: des pha ma la brtags te zhags pa de byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-6: de nas rngon pa de bdag thob pa bzhin du bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-8: don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-9: klu'i gnas nas byung nas rang gi khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-10: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-11: rgyal po nor can btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-13: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-16: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-19: lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-20: bdag gi khyim du nor zas 'di snyed cig bsags kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-21: bdag la bu pho yang med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-24: bdag gi rgyud 'chad cing yul 'chor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-25: bdog pa ril yang rgyal po gzhan gyis dbang bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-27: sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-32: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-34: ci'i slad du thugs mi dgyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-36: de rnams la rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-38: lha rnams la gsol ba mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-39: khyod la sras mchis par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348a-41: bu mngon par 'dod pas zhi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-1: nor lha la sogs pa la gsol ba 'debs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-4: kun dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-5: nags tshal gyi lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-8: gtor ma len pa'i lha dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-10: chos dang mthun pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-11: rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dag la yang gsol ba 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-12: 'jig rten na; gang gsol ba 'debs pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag skye'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-13: zhes bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-15: de lta bu ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-16: gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-17: re re la yang 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-19: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du bu stong yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-20: 'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon par gyur pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-21: bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-22: gsum po de dag gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-23: pha dang ma dag chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-24: ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-25: dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-26: gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-27: bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-28: de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-29: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' zhig btsun mo dam pa de'i mngal du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:348b-30: bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-0: skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa @349a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-2: dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-3: mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-4: gang las mngal du zhugs pa de yang shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-5: khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste; gal te khye'u yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-6: dku g-yas par brten cing 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-7: gal te bu mo yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-8: dku g-yon par brten cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-9: de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-12: bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-14: bdag gi dku g-yas par brten cing mchis pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-16: dgyes pa bskyed du gsol; de yang yid dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa g-yas pa brkyangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-18: kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa bu'i ngo mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-19: kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-20: kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-21: gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-22: bgo skal la spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-23: kho bo rigs rgyud la yun ring du gnas par bsgrub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-24: bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung du'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-25: mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-28: de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-29: ces ming gis yon bsngo ba byed par gyur cig ces ched du brjod pa rjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349a-30: de la sems can zhugs par rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-0: mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin @349b par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-1: dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-2: sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-3: ha cang mi skyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-4: ha cang lan tshva mi che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-5: ha cang mi mngar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-6: ha cang mi tsha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-7: ha cang mi bska ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-13: bska ba spangs pa'i zas dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-17: lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-20: zhod kyis gzhir mi 'bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-21: des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par nyam bag tu bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-22: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-23: khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-31: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-33: kun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rnga brdungs ba rgyal pos thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-35: btsun mo rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-36: lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-37: khyod kyi sras po zhig bltams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:349b-38: de nas rgyal pos grong khyer de thams cad rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-2: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-5: shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag bshams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-6: me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-10: phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-12: de'i phyir nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-13: khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-14: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-16: rgyal po nor can gyi sras lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-17: khye'u'i ming nor bzang du gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-18: zhes de'i ming nor bzang zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-19: khye'u nor bzang ma ma brgyad po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-20: pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-21: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-22: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-23: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-24: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-30: yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis bsring bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-32: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-33: gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-35: klog pa la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350a-36: spyod pa gsal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-0: zhes @350b bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-1: de rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-5: sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di mngon par rgyal bar byas te gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-6: las kyi gnas zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-7: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-8: de'i phas chung ma gsum po che ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-10: chun ma dag bzhag cing gnas pa'i khang pa rnam pa gsum po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-14: skyed mos tshal rnam pa gsum po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-18: de nas gzhon nu nor bzang steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la skyes pa med par song nas sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-21: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-22: rngon pa spang leb can ri dvags tshol zhing de dang de dag tu rgyu ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-23: ri bo gzhan zhig la phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-24: des ri bo de'i zhod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-25: drang srong gi bsti gnas me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-28: de na mtsho chen po autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-33: ngur bas mdzes pa de mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:350b-34: de bsti gnas der 'khyam par brtsams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-2: lus rlung dang tsha bas gdungs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-3: shing gos gyon pa zhig shing drung du gnas bcas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-4: rtsva'i spyil bu na 'dug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-5: mthong nas kyang rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te thal mo sbyar nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-10: khyod kyi yun de srid cig tu phyogs 'dir lon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-11: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' lta gzigs pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-13: drang srong zhi ba'i bdag nyid des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-14: dal bu dal bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-15: bzhin bzang khyod kyis mtsho 'di mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-18: tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing zhes bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-21: padma dkar pos gang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-22: bya sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyis bsten pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-25: ba mo'i mdog lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-26: shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog gis bskor ba'i chu'i rdzing 'dir tshes bco lnga la mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-27: mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-28: mgo khrus dang bsku mnye sna tshogs dang 'ongs nas khrus byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-29: de khrus byed pa'i tshe bro gar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-31: rol mo'i sgra nyan pas bya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-32: ri dvags kyang yid 'phrog par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-33: kho bo yang de'i sgra thos nas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351a-34: yid bde ba chen pos zhag bdun 'da' bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-0: @351b bzhin bzang kho bos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-1: de nas rngon pa spang leb can 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-2: bdag gis klu las don yod pa'i zhags pa thob pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-3: de mi'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma la gdab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-6: tshes bco lnga la don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-7: mtsho 'gram dang nye bar me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-9: lo ma tshang tshing zhig tu 'khras nas gcig tu bsgrims pas bya ra byed cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-11: yid 'phrog ma mi'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-12: de 'dra ba'i 'byor ba nyid kyis tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing du khrus kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-13: rngon pa spang leb can gyis de ma thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa btab pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-14: des mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-15: don yod pa'i zhags pas zin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-16: mtsho'i nang na mchong brgal zhing 'jigs pa'i sgra yang phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-17: mi'am ci mo'i tshogs lhag mas de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-18: phan tshun brgyugs te mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma la brtag par brtsams pa las bzung bar mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-19: mthong nas kyang skrag nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-22: blta na sdug pa de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-23: mthong nas kyang gzung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-25: ma rabs khyod ni nga la ma reg cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-26: khyod kyi 'di ni thog tu bab ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-27: nga ni gzugs bzang rgyal gyi 'os yin pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:351b-28: 'dzin pa legs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-1: de khyod ma bzung na 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-4: gal te yid mi ches na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-5: 'di'i mthus kho mo steng gi nam mkha' la 'gro'i gtsug gi nor bu 'di zungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-8: des de la gtsug gi nor bu byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-10: gtsug gi nor bu 'di su'i lag pa na gnas pa de'i dbang du kho mo 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-11: de nas rngon pas nor bu de blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-12: zhags pas bcings bzhin du khrid de song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-13: de'i tshe gzhon nu nor bzang ri dvags 'chor du chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-14: rngon pa des gzhon nu nor bzang gzugs bzang po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-16: blta na sdug pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-17: mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-19: rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-22: blta na sdug pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-24: btsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-25: ma la bdag gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du bdag nyid kyis dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-27: de nas de zhags pas bcings bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-28: rgyal po gzhon nu nor bzang gang na ba der khrid song nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-29: rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-31: bdag gis bud med rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal te mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352a-33: rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-2: bud med kyi mtshan bco brgyad kyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-3: yul gyi mi bas bzang pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-4: nu ma gser gyi bum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-7: mkhrang zhing mkhregs pas shin tu legs par zlum pa ltem pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-8: mig mthong mthing la rtsa dmar zhing dkyus ring la padma gzhon nu 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-9: sna'i gzegs ring zhing mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-14: 'gram pa ma rnyong zhing yongs su rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-15: mkhur tshos lhag par dga' bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thig le can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-16: smin ma rim gyis mdzes shing 'dzar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-17: dpung pa zla ba dri ma med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-18: lto gnyer ma zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam rnyong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-19: nu ma'i g-yur gyi ro stod bags kyis 'dud la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-20: dku shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin tu mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-21: lag pa chu shing gi snying po 'dra ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-22: brla byin gyis phra ba zlum pas mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-23: rtsa shin tu mi mngon zhing gya gyu med pas yan lag thams cad mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-24: nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-29: se mo do'i sgras 'gying zhing 'gro ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-31: bde sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub kyis brgyan cing gser gyi 'og pag can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-33: do shal mang po dpyangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:352b-34: mdog gser gtso ma ltar bzang ba mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-1: ma thag tu gzhon nu nor bzang 'dod chags kyi zhags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-2: chu zla dri ma med cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-3: gsal ba g-yo ba'i rang bzhin lta bur gzung dka' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-4: rlung chu rlabs dang bcas pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs par dka' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-5: nam mkha' lding dang rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar 'gro ba shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur myur du 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-6: spre'u ltar sa gcig na mi 'dug pas g-yo zhing gtsab yab can gyis ni dam du zin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-7: 'dod chags kyi mda' rtag tu nyon mongs bsten pa la goms pa'i 'dod chags kyi bde ba ro myang ba la brkam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-8: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul ngan 'gro'i g-yang sa las mi ldog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-9: bzang mo la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis shin tu dri ma can du byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-10: 'phrad pas 'dod pas shin tu dbyung mi bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-11: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'phangs pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-13: me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-15: dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'gyu ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-16: bzhin ras zla ba 'dra de nor bzang gis mthong ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-17: de la chags pa'i 'dod pa steg tshol las byung ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-18: 'dod chags mda' yis de yi sems la pho ga ///
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-21: de nas rgyal bu nor bzang gis yid 'phrog ma de khrid de glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353a-22: rngon pa de la yang grong khyer mchog gcig byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-0: de nas gzhon nu nor bzang yid @353b 'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir dong nas lhan cig tu rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-5: bsnyen bkur brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor bzang gi sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar 'phrog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-6: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-7: bram ze gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'ongs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-9: rgyal po la rten bcas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-12: rgyal po la brten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-13: rgyal pos mdun na 'don du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-14: longs spyod kyi skal ba yang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-15: gzhon nu nor bzang gi gang yin pa de la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-16: des longs spyod kyi skal ba tsam zhig byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-18: gzhon nu gang gi tshe yab 'das nas khyod rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-20: gzhon nu nor bzang gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-21: ji ltar khyod kyi grogs po bram ze /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-22: nga'i yab kyis mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-23: khyod kyang nga'i mdun na 'don du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-24: zhes bya ba'i gtam de gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-25: bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-27: ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis kyang rgyal srid mi thob pa de ltar bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-28: mdun na 'don du gzhug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:353b-29: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po de'i yul du ri bor pa zhig bsngo bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-1: 'bebs su dmag kha chen zhig btang ba las de bcom /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-2: rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-3: de bzhin du kha che bdun gyi bar btang ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-5: rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-6: rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-8: ci'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu skyed par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-9: gang yang lha'i yul na mtshon gyis 'tsho ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dgug tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-10: bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-11: gzhon nu nor bzang gsad pa'i thabs bya ba'i dus ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-14: de nas rgyal po la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-16: dbab par rngo mi thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-21: ci'i slad du lha nyid gshegs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-23: dar la bab cing mthu rtsal snyems pa dang ldan pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-24: dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig tu dgyer gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-28: de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354a-30: dmag dang lhan cig tu dengs la ri bor rnams phob cig lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzang gis rgyal po las mnyan nas btsun mo rnams kyi gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-0: des thams cad brjed par gyur @354b to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-1: de nas yang rgyal pos bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-3: de mthong ma thag tu thams cad brjed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-4: de nas mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-7: yid 'phrog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi bar rngo mi thogs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-8: dmag bsdogs la gzhon nu btsun mo rnams kyi nang nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-9: ci nas kyang yid 'phrog ma'i drung du mi mchi bar thal byung gtang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-10: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-12: dpung gi tshogs sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-13: blon po rnams kyi rgyal po las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-14: dpung gi tshogs glang po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-17: dpung bu chung phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-18: 'tshog chas go mtshon rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa dag sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-19: de nas gzhon nu phyir byung ba dang bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-20: gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs sta gon byas kyi song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-23: yid 'phrog ma la bltas te mchi bar bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-25: gzhon nu thogs par 'gyur gyi ma lta zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-29: gzhon nu ma la ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-30: des yid 'phrog ma'i gtsug gi nor bu khyer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-31: ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-33: bdag ri bor ba rnams 'bebs su mchi lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:354b-35: khyod kyis shin tu dben par sbos la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-1: 'phrog ma 'gum pa la thug pa ma lags par ji ltar gyur kyang ma stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-2: ces des de skad ma la bsgos nas mchi phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-3: dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-4: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis yul 'das nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-5: ri bor ba de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du btab ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-6: de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-7: 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-8: 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang lam de nas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi mdun sar chas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-9: de la ma de nas chas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-10: nam mkha'i lam la thogs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-12: bdag gis lam 'di nas lan mang po zhig tu song na bdag gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par ma gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-14: de ltar thogs pa 'di lta rgyu ci yod snyam pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-15: des gzhon nu nor bzang mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-18: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-19: dmag la chas pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-20: 'di'i grogs byas te ri bor pa 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355a-21: snyam du bsam nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-0: khyod kyis @355b gzhon nu nor bzang ri bor pa rnams dang g-yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par mi bya bar phobs cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-1: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-2: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-3: lha'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs shing ta la'i tshad tsam gyi skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-4: ri'i tshad tsam gyi glang po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-5: glang po che'i tshad tsam gyi rta dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-6: gzhal med khang gi tshad tsam gyi shing rta rnams sprul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-15: mtshon cha'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-16: sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs pa chen po ston cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-17: lnga len mthu chen po tshogs rnams dang ri bor du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-21: sil dkrol gyi sgra sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-22: gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi mthus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-23: ra ba dag ral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-24: de nas ri bor na gnas pa de rnams kyi dpung gi tshogs de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-25: ra ba dag ral ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-26: mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-30: gzhon nu nor bzang 'di'i mjug nas 'ong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:355b-33: gal te myur du ma phye na thams cad rmeg med par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-2: bdag cag rgyal la mi ldog ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-3: gzhon nu blo dang ldan la min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-4: rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-5: bdag cag 'jigs shing skrag gyur med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-7: de rnams kyis sgo phye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-11: rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis gzhon nu nor bzang bsu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-12: des kyang dbugs phyung nas de rnams bgrang ba las sna bo bskos te dpya thang bcad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-14: de nas ri bor pa de rnams cham du phab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-15: gzhon nu nor bzang slar log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-16: rgyal po nor can gyis de nyid kyis nub mo rmi lam na bya rgod cig 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-17: rgyal po'i lto dral nas rgyu ma gzangs te grong khyer de thams cad kyi mtha' bskor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-18: rin po che sna bdun gyi khyim du 'ongs par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-19: de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-20: mi dga' zhing spu zing zhes byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-21: myur ba myur bar langs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-22: gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-23: srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-24: sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-26: rmi lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-29: rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-30: gdon mi za bar gzhon nus ri bor pa rnams pham par byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356a-31: log pa bzhin du bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-1: khyed kyi rmi lam du gzigs pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-3: gdon mi 'tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-4: sku tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-5: 'on kyang 'di zlog pa'i thabs mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-6: de yang bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig las mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-7: zlog pa'i thabs de ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-9: skyed mos tshal du rdzing dbyibs legs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-10: tshad la bab pa bgyis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-11: de nas rdo thal gyis byugs te legs par bstar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-12: ri dvags phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-13: de nas lhas khrus la gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-14: rdzing de la them skas gcig las 'jug par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-15: gcig las zhugs nas gnyis la 'dzeg par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-16: gnyis pa las zhugs nas gsum pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-17: gsum pa las zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'dzeg par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-18: de nas bram ze rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-19: rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs lces bldags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-20: mi ma yin pa'i tshil gyi bdug pas bdug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-22: lha'i dngos sdig 'byang zhing yun ring por rgyal srid skyong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-27: mi ma yin pa'i tshil bu 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-31: mod pa gang lags pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-34: de ji lta bu zhig yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:356b-38: mi ma lags pa ma lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-2: 'di la gzhon nu'i srog 'dug gi de skad ma smra zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-5: khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' gtang ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-6: grong rdal phyir ni khyim gtang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-7: yul ljongs phyir ni grong rdal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-8: bdag gi phyir ni sa gtang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-9: zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-10: rgyal po bdag nyid brtan gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-11: gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-12: gzhan zhig stsal bar spyod grang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-14: bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-15: mi byed pa ci yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-17: de nas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-18: rdzing brkos nas rngo thal gyis byugs shing legs par bstar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-19: ri dvags phra mo rnams kyi khrag gsog pa la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-21: nor bzang gi btsun mo'i skye bos shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-24: bdag cag lang tsho la bab cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-25: gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-28: gzhon nu nor bzang du yongs su dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-29: zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-30: yid 'phrog mas mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-31: khyed cag ci'i phyir lhag par dga'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-33: gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrog ma la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357a-34: yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-0: yid mi bde ba skyes nas gzhon nu @357b nor bzang gi ma gang na ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-1: rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas snying rje rje skad du sgra gcom chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-6: yid 'phrog mas brtags nas yang smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-7: des brtags na yang bden par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-8: de nas des gtsug gi nor bu de dang gos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-9: yid 'phrog ma la byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-10: bu mo khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-12: kho mo la kham mchu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-13: de nas rgyal po ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la chas te khrag gis gang ba'i rdzing bur zhugs nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-14: de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la bram ze rnams kyi lces bldags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-16: mi'am ci mo khrid de shog cig ces bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-17: de ma thag kho nar yid 'phrog ma nam mkha' la 'phags te tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-18: bdag ni reg dang 'phrad pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-19: bdag ni bgad dang brtses pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-20: bal glang mo btags thar pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-21: da ni bdag mo 'gro bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-22: rgyal pos kyang nam mkha'i lam nas 'gro ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-23: de skrag ste mdun na 'don la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-24: gang gi phyir 'bad par bya ba de ma grub par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-25: mi'am ci yid 'phrog ma bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-30: dngos sdig dang bral lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:357b-31: de nas yid 'phrog nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-1: bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-2: drang srong des bstan pa las gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-3: gal te des ma bstan na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-4: bdag gzung zhing 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-6: re zhig drang srong de'i drung du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-8: de de'i bsti gnas su song nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas drang srong la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-9: drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-11: mi'i reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar chad du cung zhig gis ma gyur to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-13: gal te brgya zhig la gzhon nu nor bzang bdag tshol zhing mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-14: de la bdag gi sor gdub stsol la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-15: 'di skad kyang gsung ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-17: lam yang bgrod par dka' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-18: nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi slar bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-19: gal te bzlog kyang mchis su ma btub na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-20: de la lam bstan pa'i rigs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-21: gzhon nu yid 'phrog mas bstan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-22: byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-23: de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-24: de dag brgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-26: ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-28: ri bo phur pa'i rtse mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-29: de nas lam chu sgra can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358a-33: 'dod rgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-1: ri bo de dag khyod kyis rgol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-2: de la ri bo seng ldeng can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-8: thabs 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams brgal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-11: skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-12: phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-15: gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-16: phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-17: bdag gi slad du gzhu brdungs la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-18: mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-19: gang nas lug gnyis phan tshun nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-20: rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-21: de gnyis rva re bcag mdzod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-22: lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-23: 'jigs pa che skyed mtshon thogs pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-24: lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-25: de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-26: lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-27: srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-28: kha 'dzum gdangs par bgyid gzigs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-29: de tshe de yi dpral ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-30: phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-31: de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-32: drug cu'i khru can la khyod mchongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-33: skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-34: mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-35: gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:358b-36: gzhu bkang ste ni gsad mdzod la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-2: chu bo mang po brgal mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-3: nang gi phye ma leb gdungs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-4: sna tshogs dud mo rgod pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-5: sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-6: nang ga na ni srin mo khro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-7: phye ma leb na mi ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-8: gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-9: sna tshogs can na 'dod rgyur gzugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-10: dud mor ma'i ma ci yi bran //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-11: rgod pa na ni mi'am ci'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-12: mna' ma sbrul mang sbrul can na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-13: 'od ma can klung shal ma yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-14: nang ga la ni brtan par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-15: phye ma leb la brtul phod bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-16: gdungs par 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-17: sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-18: dud mo can du yid bde bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-19: rgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-20: sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-21: sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-22: sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-23: klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-24: sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-25: chu bo rnams brgal nas gcan po'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-28: mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-30: drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas de skad smras nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-32: ji tsam na gzhon nu nor bzang gis ri bor de phab nas skyes khyer te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359a-34: zhes rgyal pos thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyes so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-8: phyag mdzod du gzhug tu gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-11: legs par byas kyi bzhes so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-22: nges par der nyid bdag mchis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-23: rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-24: de nas gzhon nu rang gi khyim du song na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-25: btsun mo'i pho brang gi sgo dpal gyis stong par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-26: de sems khong du chud bzhin du zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-28: snying stor te phan tshun du rgyu zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-30: yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-31: ji tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-32: btsun mo de rnams gtam rlung la bskur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-33: de'i snying la zug rngus zugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-34: yang nas yang du dris pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-35: de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:359b-36: de mya ngan gyis yid blong bar gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-4: ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-6: ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-8: yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-9: gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-10: yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-11: bdag yid 'phrog ma gang du mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-12: yid kyis rab tu rgyug snyam na'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-13: bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-14: de dang bral bar gyur pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-15: snying ni shin tu gdungs pa nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-16: bdag gi yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-17: yid du 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-18: yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdungs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-19: bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-22: yid 'phrog ma sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-25: des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-26: des pha snying rje med cing byas pa mi gzob yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-35: lam de ri dang drang srong dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-36: seng ge dag gis rtag bsnyen cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360a-37: chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360b-25: drang srong gi drung du song dang de las khungs phyin par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360b-27: rgyal pos gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma dang bral bas shin tu yid blong ba'i gtam de thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360b-28: de nas rgyal pos smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:360b-31: de bas khyad par du 'phags pa'i chung ma sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-0: de ma lags pa'i mchis brang gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thogs lags @361a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-1: so; ;rgyal pos de la lan du ma smras kyang ma bzlog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-2: de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-3: ra ba'i khar ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor bar bya ba'i phyir skyes bu srung ma dag bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-5: mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-7: mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-11: bud med skyes pa la chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-13: chom rkun pa'i ra bgo dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-17: gal te bdag sgo nas song na rgyal po'i sgo srung gi srung ma gtum po dag yod de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-20: ci nas kyang ma la bdag srung ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-25: de nas des zla ba la bltas nas yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu dag 'don par byed de; zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal mdzad kye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-26: khyod ni snar ma'i mig tu sdug pa ded dpon bzang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361a-27: cig bdag gi sdug pa autpal lta bu'i mig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-0: yid 'phrog ces bgyi khyod kyis sa steng @361b gzigs lags sam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-4: kye ma ri dvags mo khyod rtsva chu lo ma za /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-6: ri dvags mo ltar mig dkyus ring bas gzugs bzang ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-7: bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-10: 'bras bu mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bung ba dag longs spyod pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-11: de nas bung ba zhig la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-12: sbrang rtsi'i bung ba ri bo mthon mthing lta bu'i mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-13: smyug ma'i sbubs dang padma dag la gnas 'cha' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-14: skra yi tshogs ring kha dog bung ba ltar gnag pa //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:361b-16: phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362a-10: des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362a-21: slad kyis bde blag 'byon 'gyur 'di la bdag gi yid la the tshom yong ma mchis //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-16: de mar la btsos nas btung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-17: des na skom pa dang bkres pa med cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-18: dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-19: spre'u zhig kyang bkri bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-20: gsang sngags dag kyang bslab par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-21: gzhu mda' dang chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-22: nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-23: dug gsod pa sman dug sel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-24: lcags kyi phur pa gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-25: pi wang yang bcang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-26: ri'i rgyal po gangs can gyi byang phyogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-27: ri bo phur pa'i rtse yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-28: de nas lam chu sgra can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-32: 'dod rgyur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-35: mi g-yo ba dang rab grol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-36: khyod kyis ri de dag brgal dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-37: de la ri bo seng ldeng can la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:362b-38: phug nas 'jug rgyud gcig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-2: rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-3: thabs 'di dag gis ri rnams brgal bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-6: skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag gzhom par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-7: phug na sbrul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-10: gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-11: phug na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-12: bdag gi slad du gzhu brdungs la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-13: mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-14: gang la lug gnyis phan tshun nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-15: rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-16: de gnyis rva re bcad mdzod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-17: lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-18: 'jigs pa che skyes mtshon thogs pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-19: lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-20: de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-21: lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-22: srin mo lcags kyi mchu can zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-23: kha 'dzum gdangs par bgyid gzigs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-24: de tshe de yi dpral ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-25: phur pa dag gis gdab par mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-26: de bzhin khron pa klong khrag 'khyil //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-27: drug cu'i khru can la khyod mchongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-28: skra mig seng ge'i lhar ser zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-29: mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-30: gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-31: gzhu bkang de ni gsad mdzod la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-32: chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-33: chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-34: nang gi phye ma leb gdungs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-35: sna tshogs dud ma dgod pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363a-36: sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-0: nang ga na @363b ni srin mo khro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-1: phye ma leb na mi ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-2: gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-3: sna tshogs can na 'dod sgyur gzugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-4: ngud mor mi 'am ci yi bran //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-5: dgod pa na ni mi'am ci'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-6: mna' ma sbrul can sbrul mang na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-7: 'od ma can klung shal ma li //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-8: nang ga na ni brtan par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-9: phye ma leb la rtul phod bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-10: gdung bar 'dzin khri kha bcing ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-11: sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-12: dud mo can du yid bde bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-13: dgod byed du ni mi smra ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-14: sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-15: sbrul can du ni sbrul dug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-16: sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-17: klung du mtshon rnon gdab pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-18: sbyor ba kun tu rgal bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-19: chu bo rnams brgal nas gcan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran btsugs te gzhom par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-20: de nas ni mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-22: de nas gzhon nu nor bzang gis ji skad bstan pa'i sman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-24: sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-25: de nas des spre'u ma gtogs par ji skad bstan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-26: de nas de rnams khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-27: yang drang srong de'i drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-28: des de la spre'u byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:363b-33: grogs med pas lus gdon mi za bar 'gyur gyi thong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-1: ni; gdon mi za bar mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-2: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-3: mkha' la zla ba rgyu ba grogs shig ga las mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-4: mche ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i ri dvags gtso bo dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-5: me yis nags sreg pa na grogs shig ga las mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-6: bdag lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-7: kye ci rgya mtsho che chur 'jug par mi bgyi'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-8: ci lags sbrul gyis zin ces gso bar mi bgyi'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-9: sems can spungs can gyis bstan brtson 'grus cher brtsams te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-10: gal te 'bad de ma rungs 'di la nyes pa med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-11: de nas gzhon nu nor bzang yid 'phrog mas bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-15: g-yang sa la sogs par sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-17: sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-19: grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-20: skyed mos tshal gyi tshal me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-21: 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pas mdzes par byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-22: bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-26: mi'am ci mo rnams kyis bskor ba de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-27: mi'am ci mo rnams chu len du 'ong ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-28: de nas gzhon nu nor bzang gis de rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-29: chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364a-32: ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog ma zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-0: de mi'i @364b lag tu son par gyur pas de'i mi'i dri bshal ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-1: gzhon nu nor bzang gis dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-3: bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de'i steng nas ldugs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-9: sor gdub kyi rgya 'di bum pa gcig gi nang du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-11: des mi'am ci mo gcig gi bum par ma tshor bar bcug nas mi'am ci mo de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-12: khyod kyis bum pa 'dis thog mar yid 'phrog ma la khrus byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-14: gdon mi za bar 'di la dgos pa zhig yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-16: de nas des bum pa de thog mar yid 'phrog ma'i spyi bor blugs pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-17: ji tsam na sor gdub kyi rgya pang du lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-19: de nas mi'am ci mo la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-23: song la de dben pa zhig tu zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-24: des de nang du khrid nas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-25: de nas yid 'phrog mas pha'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-27: gal te bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-28: gzhon nu nor bzang de mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-29: de la khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-33: ngas de dum bu brgyar byas te phyogs bzhir gtor te gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-36: mir gyur pas 'dir ga la mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:364b-37: bdag nyid de skad mchi bar bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-1: ci'i rgyal po ljon pa kun nas dkris pa dang bral te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-2: de kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-3: gal te gzhon nu de 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-4: ngas khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-7: mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te de la chung ma'i don du sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-8: de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-11: gzhon nu nor bzang lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas mi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-12: ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-13: de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-14: gzhon nu nor bzang gzugs bzang po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-17: kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-18: mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te de nas de bgam par 'dod nas gser gyi sdong po bdun dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-23: byang chub sems dpa' yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-24: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-26: las kyi gnas de dang de dag la mkhas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-27: lha rnams kyang de dag la gegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-28: de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-33: pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-34: rdza rnga la sogs pa rnams kyis bsgrubs pa'i sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra'i khyad par ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365a-36: mi'am ci stong phrag du mas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-0: yongs su bskor nas ral gri autpa la sngon po'i @365b 'dab ma 'dra ba thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-1: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mthong bar gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-2: chu shing la gcod pa bzhin du sdong po de dum bu dum bur bcag par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-3: de nas de til 'bru tsam du brlags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-7: phag bdun gtsang mar phyung ste ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo bar gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-8: de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-9: mi'am ci'i brgya stong phrag du mas aa la la zhes ca co dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-10: ga zha'i sgra chen po phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-11: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong zhing thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-12: de nas mi'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma bzhag ste gzhon nu nor bzang la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-14: tshur yid 'phrog ma ngo shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-15: de nas gzhon nu nor bzang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-16: de ngo shes par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-17: ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-18: kho bo'i sdug pa yid 'phrog yin zhes na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-19: bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nar ni; ;yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-20: de nas de ma thag tu gom pas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-21: mi'am ci rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-26: pha rol gnon pa shin tu tshogs pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-27: yid 'phrog ma dang thab rir bab lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:365b-28: ci'i slad du 'di la mtho btsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-1: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi'am ci'i tshogs rnams kyi rjes su bsngags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-2: mi'am ci rnams kyi 'dun pas gzhon nu nor bzang la rjes bkur sti chen po byas nas yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan te lag pa g-yon pas bzung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-3: gser gyi bya ma bum lag pa g-yas pas bzung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-4: gzhon nu nor bzang gi drung du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-5: gzhon nu; yid 'phrog ma 'di mi'am ci mo stong gis yongs su bskor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-6: kho bos khyod kyi chung ma'i phyir byin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-8: ngo mi rtag pa yin gyi ji ltar yang 'di mi dor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-10: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-11: mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-12: mi'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pa na yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig skyes pa med par sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-15: de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-17: pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis non par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-19: de ltar gyur pa dag pha la rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-21: gzhon nu dang lhan cig song la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-23: slu bar byed pa yin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366a-24: khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-0: de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas nor bu @366b dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-2: gser la sogs pa mang du brdzangs te btang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-3: de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi nam mkha'i lam la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-4: mi'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-5: rim gyis glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-6: de nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-9: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-13: shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por ngag bshams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-14: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste dga' dga' ltar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-15: de nas gzhon nu ma'i gtso bo stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-16: yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-17: de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal sos nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dag khyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-19: rgyal po'i stan gyi glo zhig tu 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-20: mi'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-21: 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-22: de nas rgyal po nor can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-26: pha rol gnon pa can no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-29: gzhon nu nor bzang gis bsam pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-32: sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad par yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:366b-33: ma la da yang bdag gis sbyin pa dag ni gtang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367a-9: ngas gang yid 'phrog ma'i phyir stobs dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367a-13: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367a-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367a-21: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367a-25: thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367a-26: rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367a-31: mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-0: 'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi ba zhes @367b bya ba nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-1: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-4: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-19: sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-21: gzhon nu thams cad sgrol dad pa bzang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-24: gzhan la phan par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-28: skye rgu rnams la byams pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-32: de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-33: dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skye bo 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-34: thams cad kyang yid la re ba rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-35: de nas re zhig cig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:367b-36: byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-2: tsandan sa mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-5: gung gi pags pas g-yogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-6: rta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-8: dngul gyi dril bu g-yer ka'i sgra 'khrol pa bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-9: grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-10: de nas bram ze rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-11: rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol mngon du bsu nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-12: rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-14: khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-15: thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-16: bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-17: khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-18: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-20: shing rta de las myur ba myur bar babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-23: rab tu dga' bas bram ze de dag la shing rta de byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-24: bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-25: mchog tu dga' bas shing rta btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-26: de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum //
