K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-31: glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368a-32: me tog kun mu da dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-0: sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can @368b bdun legs par gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-1: rkang lag legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-2: glang po che sa srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-3: rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-4: mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-5: shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-7: g-yog rnams phyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du sos ka'i dus la bab pas; shing rnams me tog kha 'bus shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-14: shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-15: de nas phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-16: rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-18: lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-19: khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-20: khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-21: bdag cag rnams la stsal ba'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-22: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-23: byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mchog de las myur ba myur bar babs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-26: rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis de dag la glang po'i mchog de byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-27: bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-28: mchog tu dga' bas glang chen btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:368b-29: de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-0: @369a *// btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-1: rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-2: khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas rbad pa'i bram ze rnams la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-4: thos nas kyang rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin tu khros /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-6: gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-8: khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-9: de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol phas spangs pa dang bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-10: bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad pa byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-11: 'jig rten thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-12: glang po chen po de yang btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-13: de bas khyim na gnas pas ni; ;ci nus par ni sbyin par gtang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-14: dka' thub gnas su brten nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-15: nges par mchog dag bya ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-16: bslangs nas mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-17: tshig ni smra bar mi phod kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-18: de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-19: dka' thub gnas su rab tu 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-20: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas chung ma rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-21: de dag rgyas par smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369a-22: de nas rgyags sbyin mas thos ma thag tu sdug pa dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-0: rje'i sras @369b gal te de lta na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-1: bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nags su mchi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-4: skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thogs lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-5: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-6: nam mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-7: ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-8: padma chu yis stongs par gyur pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-9: bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-10: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-11: bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-13: 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-18: bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus shin tu skyid de ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-19: dka' thub kyi nags na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-29: tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-31: yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni brten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-32: bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-34: glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod sbyin la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-36: de na yang gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-37: de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-39: re zhig da dung yang legs par soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-42: bdag rdo ci thogs kyis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:369b-43: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-2: dam bcas pa de khyod kyis dran par byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-4: yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-5: nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-6: bdag ni grong nas dgon par mchis lags kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-7: mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-8: de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs brnangs te skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-10: sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-11: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-12: sa ni ri dang bcas par yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-13: gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-14: sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-15: sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-19: chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-20: grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-21: yul mi mya ngan byed pa brgya stong rjes su 'brang bzhin song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-22: de nas mi zhig gis du zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-23: skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-26: skye bo'i tshogs chen po cho nges 'debs pa 'di rgyu ci las gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370a-31: 'di ltar mi yi dbang pos nyid kyi sras po che ba bzang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-0: brtan pa'i ngang tshul @370b rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di ni spyugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-1: de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chags pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-2: pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'debs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la ci rigs par mngon du song nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-8: shin tu yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral ba'i mtha' can du 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-9: gnyen gyi skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-10: lam kha'i ngal bso ba'i bsti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-12: 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-13: mdza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur bsam nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-14: khyod kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-15: zhi phyir blo gros mi g-yo brtan par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-16: de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-17: byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-20: khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-21: khyod kyis shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par bgyi ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-22: de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:370b-23: tshig brlang pos bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-1: na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-2: bram ze 'di ni shin tu brtse ba med pa'i blo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-3: mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-4: 'di la 'dir ni snying rje jig mi skye'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-5: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-6: khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-8: rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-9: kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-10: sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' bas yang rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-13: bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-14: shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-15: bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-16: zag med chos kyi shing rta che bskor shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-17: de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu nag po phrag pa la khyer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-19: gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas dka' thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-20: rim gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371a-21: de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-0: ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i @371b phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-1: bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drang du 'ongs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-4: bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-5: spar shugs lhan cig 'khyams bgyid na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-6: de yi don du bus pa gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-7: khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-8: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-10: bu sdug pa gtong ba la chung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-14: bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-16: khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-17: khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-18: bdag nyid can du sa steng grags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-19: ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-20: khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-21: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-22: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-23: bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-25: rang gi srog ni btang ba la'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-26: lan 'ga' dpyod pa ma myong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-27: rang gi bu ni btang ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-28: bdag blo gzhan du gyur ci smos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-31: bdag gis nags su bskyed pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-32: bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-33: ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-34: 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:371b-35: gzhon nu shin tu brtse med pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-3: bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-5: thams cad sgrol la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-7: rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-8: sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-9: srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-12: bkur stis spos kyi glang po che lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-15: glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-19: ltogs pa yongs su sdud pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-20: thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-22: khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-23: lam gyis dub pa; 'bras bu med pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-26: yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bru 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-30: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba'i kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-32: de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-34: chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372a-35: ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-0: grong khyer @372b grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-1: mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs pa'i gtong phod yod ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-3: bu la chags pa'i blong bas 'di dag sems par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-4: gal te re zhig bu gnyis po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-5: bram zer byin na bu dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-6: bral ba las byung sdug bsngal dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-7: bdag dang rgyags sbyin gyis thob 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-9: brtul zhugs las kyang nyams 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-10: bram ze 'di ni tshi chad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-12: nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-13: mya ngan sa steng bdag gis blangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-14: de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-15: zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-17: sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par gtang bar chad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-19: dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-20: rgya mtsho chen pos so sor 'jigs byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-21: gting mi dpog par rab tu bying ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-22: pha rol brgal phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-23: zla ba dri med nya ba'i bzhin ras can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-24: ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-25: mchi ma rlan chus mig ni gang gyur pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-26: byis pa gnyis ni bram ze de la byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-29: rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-30: des ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:372b-31: 'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-0: @373a *// bus pa gzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-1: de nas sa g-yos pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-2: tshal de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams dngangs nas phan tshun smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-3: sa ni mi bzad g-yos gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-4: 'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-6: shin tu gsal bar shes par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-7: de nas gnas 'jog dang rus gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-8: ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-9: drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-10: gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-13: mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-14: thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-17: de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-18: snying rje rje skad du du zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-19: yab cig yum ni ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-20: khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-21: re zhig de ni mthong gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-22: de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-23: de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom zum gnag cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-24: mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373a-26: nga yi snying du mi sdug min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-0: @373b snying brtse snying rje med min te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-1: 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-2: yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-3: ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-4: zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-5: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-6: rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-7: de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis phas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-8: pha'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-9: sma bab pa'i tshig gis dal bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-10: gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-11: ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi 'phrin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-12: khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-13: yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-16: byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-17: gal te la lar thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-18: gus par mnyan pas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-19: de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags zhes bzod pa mdzad du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-21: pha la phyag 'tshal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-22: mig mchi mas gang bzhin du bla ma la smra bar yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-23: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-24: yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:373b-25: dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-1: pa gzhon nu dag dong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-2: lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la ca co dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-4: ae ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-5: bus pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-6: gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-7: de yi nges pa rmad gcig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-8: de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyer te bsti gnas logs su chas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-9: sa che thang du g-yos pa des myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-10: lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thar par bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-12: sengge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-13: rgyags sbyin mas ri dvags kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-14: ri dvags rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-15: kho mo'i lam 'di bkag nas ci ste 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-16: ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo nges shes na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-17: lam las zur te myur du 'gro bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-19: khyod kyang ri dvags rgyal po'i chung ma la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-20: bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-21: btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-22: ri dvags rgyal mos bdag gi lam phye zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-23: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374a-24: lha seng ge'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-0: de nas @374b rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-2: ji ltar bar snang la dud mo'i sgra grags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-3: ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i lha rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra grags pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-4: gdon mi za bar bsti gnas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-6: ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-7: ji ltar bya skad 'byin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-8: ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-9: bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-10: ji ltar sa 'di g-yos pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-11: bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-12: ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-13: bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-14: zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te mi dga' bzhin bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-15: bu de gnyis ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-16: de nas rmongs shing snying 'dar nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-17: bsti gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-19: gzhon nu nag po sring mo dang lhan cig ri dvags kyi phru gu dang rtag tu rtse rtse /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-21: de gnyis kyi sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-23: de gnyis kyi rtse mo'i cha byad yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-26: gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-27: lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas nyal ltar srid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-29: 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:374b-30: mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-1: bu mo gnyis gang du mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-2: thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-3: kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-4: re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-5: bus pa de gnyis de la byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-6: de la rjes su yi rang rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-7: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-8: rgyags sbyin ma ri dvags mo mda' dug can zhig gis phog pa bzhin du sa la 'gyel nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-9: nya chu'i gnas nas byung ba bzhin du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-11: krung krung bu stor ba bzhin du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-12: snying rje rje skad du ngu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-13: ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-15: padma gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-16: lag pa padma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-17: bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-18: 'gro ba gang du song nas sdug bsngal gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-19: ri dvags bu ltar drang zhing ri dvags mig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-20: ri dvags lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-21: de ring bdag gi bu gnyis ji lta bur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-22: gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-23: mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-24: snying rjes du ba shin tu sdug bsngal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-25: de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-26: skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tsho //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-27: de gnyis bdag gi pang nas bskyed bskyed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-28: zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-29: bzod dang gnam pas bla ma brtag dka' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-30: bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-31: de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375a-32: rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lum spangs pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-0: skye bo sdig can ngan dang @375b 'phrad gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-1: bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-2: skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-3: de gnyis yid dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-4: bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-5: de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal yongs su gzir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-6: bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-7: srog chags sdug pa brgya dang bral ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-8: sdig las shin tu mi bzad 'dir byas pa des na ba be'u med bzhin cho nges 'debs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:375b-9: bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:385a-14: de la rjes su yi rang rigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:385a-15: de brgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:385a-16: de la chu mang pos btab nas brtas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:385a-18: bus pa gzhon nu dka' thub kyi nags nas bskrun pa bde ba'i bdag nyid can de dag /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:386b-7: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:386b-18: w'a ra n'a si zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:386b-22: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:386b-23: ji tsam na ltas mkhan dag gis w'a ra n'a sir lo bcu gnyis su char pa mi 'bab bo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387a-33: des mngan bkug ste smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387b-5: de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387b-6: ji tsam na phyi dro'i dus su rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po gzhan yang lhags nas khyim bdag 'dum byed la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387b-16: bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387b-20: de ri zhig mngan la rmas te bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387b-21: des mngan bkug ste smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387b-33: sbyin pa'i khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta ba'i mi dag kyang bskos /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:387b-36: mu ge de yang lo bstud ma kho nar bar ye ma chad nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:388a-5: bdag gis sa bon stsal tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:388a-7: de dag gis sa bon btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:388a-8: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:388a-11: 'jig rten na yon gnas gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:388a-19: de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:405b-24: rtag tu zhi ba nyid du blo yis rtogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:405b-25: de nas ban glang mo de mi bzod pa skyes nas khyim thab la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:405b-27: tshig 'di dag gis bde bar bskrun pa khyod gsod pa btang snyoms su bgyid rngo mi thogs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:405b-29: nying lag rnams sprugs g-yeng dbug gsheg gzhom par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-1: nas byang chub sems dpas 'dzum phyung ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-3: nyon mongs pa'i 'byung po gso ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma'i mngon par zhen pa rung ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-6: 'byung po gdon gyis thebs pa sems rmongs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-7: nad pa des ni sman pa mi bkur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-8: de la sman pa gnod pa mi byed kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-9: 'byung po de nyid zil gyis mnan nas 'joms //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-10: de bzhin nyon mongs gdon gyis thebs pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-11: skye bo sems rmongs 'di ni sdig rab byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-12: de la bdag shes nyon mongs gnod byed kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-13: nyon mongs pa yis pham byas rnams la min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-14: lhan cig spyod ma bdag gis byang chub thob nas srid gsum 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-15: grags pas kun bkang nyon mongs g-yo can dran 'dul brtan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-16: drang po 'joms byed khyer [?] brlags bcad dang btags cing bskams pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-17: rab tu bskams pas ring po mi thogs shin tu tshar gcad bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshig rnams kyis ba na glang mo de snying rtse bri bar byas pas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-19: de nas glang po che'i tshogs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-21: byang chub sems dpas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-22: glang po che 'di dag gis 'di nyid du rngon pa 'di la gnod pa bskyed na mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-26: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406a-27: lus kyis log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-0: sems kyis ni ma yin @406b pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-1: de rngon pa de'i mdun du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-2: mi'i skad kyis ma 'jigs shig ces smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-3: dbugs phyung nas brang 'og tu sbas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-4: glang po che de rnams kyang snyad cig btags nas phyogs de nas gzhan du btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-5: glang po che rnams dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-6: des rngon pa la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-9: glang po che rnams dong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-11: rang gi dgos pa byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-15: bdag la dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba 'dis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag gis dad pa bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-17: de skad phyung ste ngus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-18: de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-23: byang chub sems dpa' mi dga' nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-24: ma la bdag gis skyabs byas pa'i tshe gnod par gyur pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-25: ban glang mo 'dis bdag gsod pa la mi bzod pa skyes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-26: 'di la mi dga' ba cung zad cig byas par gyur tam snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-27: rngon pa de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-30: de nas rngon pa de mig mchi ma'i dba' rlabs kyis gang bzhin du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-31: glang chen dbang po khyod kyi ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-32: lus la bdag gi mda' yis brgyab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-33: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi mdas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-34: bdag gi sems la brgyab par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-35: dug can mda' yis phog pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-36: lus rnams skyes par 'gyur ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-37: yon tan gyi ni mdas phog pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-38: mi mkhas rnams ni skye mi 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:406b-39: gshed ma la yang snying rje ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-2: yon tan rgya mtsho khyod kyi ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-3: yon tan deng brjod su yis nus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-4: mdor na bdag ni mi snyam pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-5: blo yang bdag la mi 'byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-6: bdag lus yon tan gyis stong pa; ;'di la tshig ba za ba skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-7: mi yi sha tshugs ldan yang bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-8: dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-9: glang chen mchog khyod dud 'gro yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-10: skye gnas sha tshugs 'chang yang mi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-12: mir yang brtsi ba ma yin gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-13: gang la yon tan nyer dmigs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-14: de ni mi zhes bya bar dran //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-15: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-16: yon tan gyis bstod par byed pa'i tshig gis gtam gyi bar chad byed pa thong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-17: don ci zhig gi phyir khyod kyis nga la mdas bsnun pa myur du smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-19: rgyal po'i nan tur gyis bdag gis bya ba ma yin pa 'di byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-20: khyod las dgos pa zhig yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-21: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-22: gal te de lta na dal bus thong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-23: lag pa gnyis ni myur rkyong la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-24: ci 'dod pa ni blang bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-26: mi gtong cung zad med pas longs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-27: bdag gi sha 'di bcad nas 'khyer ba'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-28: mche ba rnams kyang 'dod par byed la rag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-29: 'di ni gzhan la brtse ba'i phyir bskyed pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-30: lus 'di la ni ji ltar dga' bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-31: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer 'jug nus kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-32: 'khor ba bgrod dka' bdag ni zhugs pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407a-33: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-0: gzhan la @407b brtse ba de yi rgyu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-1: de nas rngon pa de ngo tsha ba skyes kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-2: rgyal po'i nan tur la bsam nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-3: khyod kyi mche ba rnams dgos lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-4: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-5: dal gyis phyung la khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-7: khyod nyid kyis thugs dpag mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-8: bdag ni khyod kyi mche ba 'byin mi phod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-10: gal te snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-11: khyod kyi mche ba rnams phyung na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-12: byams pa'i me yis nges bsregs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-13: bdag gi lag gnyis mi ltung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-14: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-16: nga nyid kyis phyung la sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-17: zhes de nas des mche ba rtsa ba shin tu ring du zug pa dag phyung ba dang bdag nyid chen po de las khrag phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-18: de mthong nas gzhan dag gis dper byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-19: mche ba bton pa las byung khrag gis mthong ka kun nas bshos pa de'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-20: me tog ku mu ta bkram mdog lta bu yi lus de dpal ldan rnam par mdzes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-21: ri steng kha bas khebs pa'i ri bo 'od zer mdzes dang ldan gyur pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-22: rtse mo tshon rtsi btsag gis kha bsgyur chu yis gsab gseb gtor ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-23: de nas byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid spro bsring ba'i phyir smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-24: snying khyod da ni brtan par mnos shig rmongs su ci zhig yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-25: phongs par gyur dang mgon med 'jig rten la yang blta bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-26: khyod ni skye bo 'chi ba'i dbang du song ba rnams kyi mgon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-27: de ltas 'dir ni de zhum bya ba'i cha ma yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:407b-28: bar skabs der nam mkha'i ngos kyang ya mtshan gyis yid rangs pa'i lha rnams kyis gang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-1: mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-2: de nas lha zhig gis byang chub sems dpa'i las shin tu dka' ba spyod pa de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-4: bdag nyid chen po'i gnas gang yin pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-6: mche ba rnams ni phyung ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-7: tshor bas nyam thag gyur kyang de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-8: lhag pa'i bsam dang ldan pa'i sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-9: byang chub las kyang mi ldog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-10: de nas lha gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-11: mche ba phyung ba las byung ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-12: sdug bsngal rang gis myong yang de'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-13: snying rje dmyal ba la gnas pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-14: sems can rnams la mngon 'phel ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-15: gang dag yin pa de yi sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-16: byang chub las ldog ga la 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-17: de nas byang chub sems dpas mche ba de dag phyung nas rang nyid thogs te cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-18: de nas rngon pa mi dga' ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-20: 'dis rang gi mche ba de dag bzung nas sbyin par gtong mi 'dod dam snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-21: de nas byang chub sems dpas de'i bsam pa shes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-22: me tog kun da lta bu'i sna mngon du brkyangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-24: bag ma tsha zhig ces smras te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-25: ku mu ta dang zla ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-27: drug po 'di dag khyod sbyin zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-28: bdag gis bzung gi bde bar 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-29: skad cig tsam zhig sdong cig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-30: len pa po dang nye bar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-31: de yi bar gyi sdug bsngal gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-32: gdungs pa'i yid rab dang bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-33: gal te khyod ni ci ste bdag brtags nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-34: khyod kyis sems ni rab tu dang bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-35: bdag ni gsod 'khu g-yon can ngo tsha med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408a-36: de la go bar gyis shig snyam sems na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-0: khyod kyi @408b nyes spyad gdug dang gzhu gdug pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-1: de dang mda' rnon khyad du bsad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-2: ngur smrig 'phags pa'i rgyal mtshan gyur pa de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-3: mthong nas yid ni rab tu dang bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-4: sbyin pa kha cig len pa las 'dag ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-5: de bzhin gzhan ni sbyin pa po las 'dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-6: de yi phyir na 'dir ni rang sems las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-7: yon gyi dag pa yang dag bskyed par 'bad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpas 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-9: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-11: ngur smrig de nyid la rtog cing sems rab tu dang bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-12: mche ba rnams rang gi lag nas byin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-13: dug can mda' yis phog nas bdag gi snying la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-14: mi dga' cung zad ma gyur bden pa gang yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-15: bden pa de yis yang dag byang chub mchog thob nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-16: 'gro ba nyam thag sdug bsngal dag las yongs thar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-19: de'i tshe de'i dus na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-20: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-21: 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-22: glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa zhes bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-24: de na ngas byams pa'i sems nye bar bsgrubs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-25: bya dka' ba'i sbyin pa yongs su btang bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-26: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-28: 'on kyang nga nyid byams pa'i sems dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:408b-30: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-4: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir ri bong du gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-5: drang srong la bdag nyid kyi sha byin pa gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-8: 'das pa na ri khrod chu mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-11: rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa zhig na drang srong dka' thub drag po can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-17: sbyin sreg byed pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-18: drang srong de'i grogs po ri bong mi skad du smra ba zhig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-19: de nyin par drang srong gi drung du song nas son pa dang phyag byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-20: gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yang dag par mgu bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-21: de gnyis pha dang bu kho na bzhin sdug pas gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-22: ji tsam dus 'das pa dang than chen byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-24: klung rnams chu chung bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-26: 'bras bur mi ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-27: de nas drang srong de bsti gnas de na kha zas dang bral ba lhag par dga' bar ma gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-29: shing shun rnams bsdu bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-30: de nas ri bong gis de de lta bu la zhugs pa mthong nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-34: grong 'dab tu song la der bcos pa'i bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409a-35: de nas des drang srong gi tshig thos nas gdung ba skyes te pha ma dang bral bar sems shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-0: rkang pa @409b gnyis la gtugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-1: drang srong de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-3: gzhan yang khyim na gnas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-4: nyes pa du mas dkrugs pa lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-5: dgon pa na gnas pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-6: yon tan du ma phun sum tshogs pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-7: des lan du ma smras na yang ldog tu ma btub nas de nas ri bong gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-9: 'on kyang re zhig deng la gzhes la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-10: ji ltar dgyes pa bzhin du sang bzhud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-13: 'dis de ring nges par bdag kha zas la mgron du 'bod par 'dod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-14: 'di ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags 'di dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-15: gsog pa la brtson pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-17: des de la khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-18: de nas me'i spyad pa byas nas kha zas kyi dus la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-19: ri bong song nas drang srong de la bskor ba byas te bzod par gsol bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-21: bdag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pas blang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-22: dor ba ma 'tshal nas khyod la nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa bdag la bzod par mdzod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-23: ces smras nas de ma thag tu me'i nang du mchongs so; ;de nas drang srong de mi dga' ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-24: ngom zum gnag la mchi ma zag cing bu sdug pa gcig pu la bya ba bzhin du 'khyud nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-29: dgon par dgyes par mdzod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-30: bdag gi shas nyin zhag gcig gi 'tsho ba mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:409b-32: nags su skyes pa'i ri bong la til dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-1: thug chen po ci ma mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-2: bdag gi lus ni zhugs su legs par bsgral ba 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-3: 'di ru gsol la deng la dka' thub nags su bzhugs par mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-4: de nas drang srong des ri bong gi tshig thos nas mi dga' ba skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-6: khyod dga' ba ltar ci byung ba byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-7: 'di nyid du srog dor bar byas te grong gi mthar mi 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-8: ri bong gis tshig de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-10: mgo bstod nas nam mkha'i ngos logs su bltas te gsol ba 'debs par zhugs shing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-11: dgon pa la ni gnas bcas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-12: bdag nyid dben pa la dga' na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-13: bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-14: dbang chen lha yis char phob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang po chen po'i gnas g-yos par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-17: lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-18: 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas ci las gyur bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-20: ji tsam na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang phyug chen po'i char phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-21: des bsti gnas de slar rtsva dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-25: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-26: de nas drang srong des dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri bong la brten nas de na gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-27: mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-28: de nas drang srong gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410a-31: snying rje 'di lta bus ci zhig don du gnyer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-2: sems can ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-3: ma grol ba rnams dgrol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-4: dbugs ma byin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-5: yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-6: de nas drang srong des tshig 'di thos nas ri bong la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-7: gang gi tshe khyed sangs rgyas su gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang dgongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-15: de'i tshe de'i dus na ri bong der gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-17: de na ngas bya dka' ba bdag nyid yongs su btang bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-18: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-22: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-27: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir pha dang ma long ba phrag pas khyer ba gang yin pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-29: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-30: w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:410b-41: chom rkun med cing nad rab tu zhi bar gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-3: ma he phun sum tshogs pa la chos kyi rgyal po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-5: chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-6: de'i mdun na 'don gyi bram ze'i bu ljang gu zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-7: rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-11: gzhan la phan par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-13: pha dang ma la sri zhu byed pa yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-16: pha dang ma de dag kyang rgas nas mig nyams te ldongs la thug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-17: de nas de'i pha mas rgyal po tshangs sbyin la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-19: gzhon nu ljang gu 'di mdun na 'don du dbang bskur du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-20: bdag cag dka' thub kyi nags su mchi lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-21: de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis ljang gu la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-30: dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi rim gro 'tshal ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-31: de nas ljang gus khyim na gnas pa dang mdun na 'don mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du spangs nas pha ma'i grogs su nags na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-32: de nang par langs nas sngar pha ma gnyis la so shing dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-33: chu gtsang mas bsnyen bkur byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-34: de nas de'i 'og tu lha la me'i sbyin sreg gis mchod sbyin byas nas phyis 'bras bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-35: rtsa ba'i phyir nags khrod du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411a-38: chu bsil ba khyer te pha ma la byin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-0: de'i @411b 'og tu phyogs gcig tu song nas bsam gtan la brtson par gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-1: rim pa de lta bus dus 'da' bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-2: ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-3: pha dang ma'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-4: rmi lam du yang mthong ba rig par byed cing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-5: bdag gi g-yar lam sbrul nag pos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-6: bdag lus shin tu zos pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-7: bdag ni zhags pa nag po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-8: bcings nas lho phyogs khrid pa rmis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-9: g-yar lam 'jigs byed mthong dag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-10: snying la dogs pa deng bdag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-11: bla ma dang bral shin tu ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-13: ji tsam na pha ma de gnyis kyis dbugs phyung nas nyi ma la kha bltas te 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-14: bden pas gsol ba btab ste ril ba khyer nas chu len du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-15: de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs sbyin ri dvags 'chor du chas te dka' thub kyi nags der zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-16: rgyal po de sgra grags par phog pa zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-17: des ri dvags kyi sgra lta bu zhig thos nas gzhu rna drung du bkang ste mda' 'phangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-18: ljang gu'i snying gar phog par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-19: de nas mda' gnad du phog pas sa la 'gyel kyang de rang gi sdug bsngal khyad du bsad nas pha ma kho na'i mya ngan byed cing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-20: mda' gcig bsnun pas bdag dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-21: dbang po nyams par gyur pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-22: pha dang de bzhin ma dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-23: bdag cag skye bo gsum bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-24: de nas rgyal pos de thos nas 'ongs te dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-25: ci ste nga'i mda' gcig bsnun pas skye bo gsum bsad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:411b-26: de nas ljang gus snying rje rje skad du dus nas rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-2: pha ma yang ni ldongs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-3: bdag kyang mda' yis bsnun pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-5: de nas rgyal po 'jigs shing skrag la dngangs nas ljang gu la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-9: nga la dmod pa 'dor du mi gzhug par pha ma la gsol ba bya ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-10: de nas ljang gus gus pa dang bcas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-11: rgyal po dbugs 'byin par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-13: bdag dang nye bar mchis pa rnams la dbang zhig mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-15: skye bo la byams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-16: 'jig rten pha rol la blta ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-19: bdag gi bla ma gang na bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-20: ril ba 'di ni snoms mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-21: de dag gi ni rkang bkru ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-23: bdag gi tshig gis rkang pa la phyag mdzod la 'di skad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-24: ring por mi thogs par mthar ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-25: gdon mi za bar 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-27: de nas rgyal po rang kho nas ril ba khyer te nags khrod du chas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-28: de'i tshe phyogs bzhir mi ma yin pa che thang du 'khrugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-29: de nas long ba de gnyis gcig la gcig smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-31: mtsho'i 'gram du ring mo zhig lon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-32: de nas de'i mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-33: da ltar kho mo'i ljang gu de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-35: ngang pa sgra snyan 'byin pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412a-36: ri dvags lhan cig rtse bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-0: de nas rgyal pos drung du @412b phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-1: de'i rting sgra las drang srong de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-2: snying du sdug cing mthong dga' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-3: ljang gu ci ste nang du 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-4: pha ma nyam chung bkres pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-5: nyam thag pa la ci zhig gtse //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-6: de yid ma dga' nas snying rje rje skad du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-9: kho bo rgyal po tshangs sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-10: byon pa legs tshur khyod bde'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-11: gdan 'di la ni bzhugs shig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-12: ljang gu chab dang 'bras bu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-14: mi dbang ljang gu zhes bgyi ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-15: yon tan rnams ldan rang bzhin byams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-16: de yi byams pa'i stobs kyis 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-17: ri dvags dang ni bya rnams gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-18: de nas rgyal pos drang srong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-19: mchi ma zag cing skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-21: nags tshal 'di'i nang du snying la mdas phog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-22: srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus shing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-23: ril ba chus bkang ba 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-25: 'dis khyed gnyis kyi rkang pa'i khrus tha ma mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-26: de gnyis kyis thos nas brgyal te sa'i steng du 'gyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-27: de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis chus gtor nas bslang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-28: de gnyis snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-30: de 'gum pas bdag cag kyang 'gum du bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-32: phyogs gang na mchis pa der bdag cag khrid cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-33: ci nas bu de ma gum pa la reg par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-34: de nas rgyal pos khyo shug gnyi ga khrid de phyogs der phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:412b-35: de'i srog gi lhag ma cung zhig lus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-0: ljang gu'i lus la kun du @413a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-2: sdug pa 'di ni su yis bskyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-3: ljon shing dam pa su yis bcad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-4: de nas rgyal pos rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-5: kho bos sdig pa'i las kyis su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-6: nags tshal nang nas rgyu ba na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-7: khyed cag gi ni bu gcig pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-8: 'di ni mda' yis bsnun par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-9: de nas de'i pha ma dag snying rje rje skad du smre zhing bden pas gsol par byed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-10: bu khyod kyis ni pha ma la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-11: bsnyen bkur lha la me yi ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-12: sbyin sreg byas pa'i bden pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-13: des ni dug kyang zhi bar shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-14: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas g-yos par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-15: des sa g-yos pa 'di ci las gyur ces brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-16: bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' gnad du mdas phog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-17: dug gis glongs pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-18: de nas gnas nas babs nas bdud rtsi btab ste pha ma'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-19: lha rnams kyi dbang po'i mthu gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-20: zug rngu phyung ba gang yin pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-22: dug gi shugs de yang zhi nas ljang gu sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar nas yun ring por pha dang ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-26: de'i tshe de'i dus na ljang gu zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-29: ngas pha ma gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413a-30: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-0: @413b khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-8: gzhan yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-9: 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyis pha ma dag smyung ba la 'jog par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-12: dam pa ma yin pa'i chos de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-13: ngas thams cad kyi thams cad du bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-15: gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer pa'i phyir nyan thos du ma mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-18: 'das pa'i dus na w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-23: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-31: bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-33: ma he phun sum tshogs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-34: bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-35: rgyal po tshangs sbyin de'i chung ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-39: rgyal po tshangs sbyin bu med cing bu mngon par 'dod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:413b-44: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i khyad par la gsol ba 'debs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:414a-1: dga' ra ba'i lha dag dang /
