K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418a-25: ngas deng gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418a-26: de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin yid dga' zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418a-27: yid dga' nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418a-29: dengs la grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418a-31: gyo mo rnams myur du sol la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418a-34: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sgreng la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418a-35: me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma khrom zhig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-0: sa bdag rnams @418b ni; tshig gis 'grub la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-3: sems bskyed ma thag tu thams cad 'grub ces bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-5: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-6: grong khyer thams cad rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-11: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-12: me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkram mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-13: gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-14: ya mtshan skyes pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'dus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-15: de nas gzhon nu lkugs phye rkang gis grong khyer du zhugs nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-16: rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-17: mi dbang bdag ni lkugs 'phye dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-18: blun po blo mi gsal ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-19: rnam par gsal bar bgyid pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-20: tshig gis gsal bar bgyid pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-21: mi dbang bdag ni lkugs 'phye dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-22: blon po blo mi ldan ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-23: dbang po rnams ni tshang ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-24: gsal ba dag dang ldan pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-27: ci'i phyir chig mi 'byin cing rkang gis mi 'gro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-30: bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs dran //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-31: lo ni drug cu'i bar du ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-32: mi yi nang na rigs brgyud pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-33: rgyal tshab bdag gis bgyis pa gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-34: lo ni drug khri'i bar dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:418b-35: dmyal ba'i nang du mi bzad smin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-2: drag po 'jigs byed de dran nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-3: dmyal bar yang mchi mi rung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-4: rgyal srid la ni mngon mi dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-5: yab cig gnang bar mdzod cig dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-6: da ni rab tu dbyung bar bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-9: drang srong rnams kyis gang dka' thub cung zad ci byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-10: mchod sbyin dang sbyin sreg ci byas pa de dag thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-11: rgyal srid kyi phyir yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-12: khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs pa spangs te rab tu 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-13: de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-16: bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro lta bu'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-17: tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-20: bde ba gang ci nyams su myong ba de thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-22: ci'i phyir khyod rgyal srid kyi bde ba spangs te rab tu 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-23: gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-24: gang las sdug bsngal rab 'byung ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-25: bde de bde'i snyam mi bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-26: gang las bde bar rab skyes pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-27: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal snyam mi bgyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-28: yab cig bdag la gnang bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-29: dka' thub nags su mchi bar bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-32: re zhig khang bzang gi gzhi pog gi dud pa dang phye mas 'khrigs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419a-33: me tog sna tshogs bkram par mal 'jam po steng g-yogs bzang po can bshams pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-0: gang @419b nas kyang 'jigs pa med par ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-2: rol mo'i sgra snyan pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-11: rab tu byung bas rtag tu shing drung du rtsva'i gding ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-13: 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems kyis gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig nyal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-17: shing shun gyi gos ni gyon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-21: chu rnyog ma can gyi btung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-23: khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-24: de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-25: nags na shing shun g-yang gzhi gyon cing 'bras bu za //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-26: gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig gdug pa bla'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-27: mkhas pa 'jig rten pha rol dag gis 'jigs pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-28: rgyal srid phyir ni gsod dang rdeg dang 'ching mi rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-29: yab cig bdag la gnang bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-30: dka' thub nags su mchis par bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-32: bu re zhig nga'i the tshom gsum po 'di dag chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-33: de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu 'byung bar mi dka' bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-34: gang khyod kyis w'a ra n'a si'i 'byor cing rgyas pa mthong nas w'a ra n'a si 'di ci stong pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-35: 'on te gnas pa zhig yod ces smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:419b-36: de khyod kyis ci zhig las bsam ste smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-0: lhas bdag nongs pa ma mchis par dgum @420a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-2: 'gas kyang gzhon nu 'di ci'i phyir gsad ces chos kyi tshig ma smras bde las bsam ste bdag gis smras lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-4: gang khyod kyis mi ro mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-7: 'on te gson po shi zhes smras pa de ci las bsam ste smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-10: gang zhig nyes par bgyid pa'i las bgyid bgyid nas gum pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-11: gum pa nyid gum pa lags la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-12: gang zhig legs par bgyid pa'i las bgyid bgyid de gum pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-13: gson por gum pa lags pa de las bsam nas bdag gis smras lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-15: gang khyod kyis 'bras kyi phung po chen po mthong nas 'bras kyi phung po chen po 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-16: dang po nyid nas ma zos dang drung zug par 'gyur ba zhig ces smras pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-20: zhing pa 'di rnams kyis 'bras bun blangs te 'tshal nas las bgyid cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-21: de dag lo tog smin nas 'bras kyi phung po chen po bcer nas bu lon pa rnams la 'jal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-23: de dag gi drung de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-24: snga nas 'tshal ba nyid lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-25: de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis mi nyid thob la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-26: de thob nas dge ba'i las kyis lam mi gsog na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-28: de'i sngon gyi dge ba de rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420a-29: dge ba'i rtsa ba de rgyun chad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-0: bde 'gro las nyam shing ngan 'gror gnas par 'gyur ba de @420b las bsam nas bdag gis smras lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-1: de nas rgyal pos bu'i tshig thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-2: mchi mas brnangs bzhin bu la 'khyud de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-3: brtul zhugs nges longs rang gi chos spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-4: bdag kyang khyod kyi slob mar khas blang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-5: de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-7: gal te gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rab tu ma byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-11: khyod cag gi bu rnams cir 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-15: khyed cag gi bu rnams ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-17: bka' ci stsal tu bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-18: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si dang ha cang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas shig yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-19: de na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-22: sems can thams cad la byams pa zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-23: de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes 'khor lnga brgya dang 'byor pa chen pos drang srong de las rab tu byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-24: des de la gdams ngag byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-27: brtson 'grus drag pos mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-28: de nas dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de dus kyi chos dang ldan par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-29: gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes drang srong de'i ro dri sna tshogs kyi shing phung por spungs nas bsregs te mchod pa dang bkur sti tsher byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:420b-30: gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de rnams la gdams ngag byin nas de rnams kyis 'bad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-2: brtson 'grus drag pos mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-6: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes rgyal srid lag mthil du 'ongs pa yongs su spangs te bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-9: ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-11: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-13: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-14: 'on kyang ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-15: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-20: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir ri dvags dang bya'i tshogs me'i 'jigs pa las thar par byas pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-24: 'das pa'i dus na nags tshal stug po ri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-29: pa la sha rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig gi tshal gseb na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-30: bya'i tshogs chen po zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-31: tshal stug po de na yang shing gnyis phan tshun drud pas me byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421a-32: de nas bya'i tshogs gang dag 'phur nus pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-1: 'phur mi nus pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-4: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sreg pa zhig tu skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-5: byang chub sems dpas me chen po sreg cing rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-6: mthong nas kyang de sems can de rnams la snying brtse ba chen po skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-8: bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa 'di rnams kyi don la brtson par ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-9: bdag gson te yang ci rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-10: bdag gis sems can rnams 'khor ba las ji ltar bsgral bar bya snyam du bsam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-11: byang chub sems dpa' 'dab ma chus gsher bar byas nas me'i phung po'i steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas 'dab ma sprug cing tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-14: 'di dag rkang pa yod mod kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-17: me ni ma g-yo bar 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-18: byams pa shin tu bsgoms pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-19: bden pa'i tshig ni gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-20: bden pa'i tshig ni de yis su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-21: me ni ma g-yo bar 'dug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-22: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan par byed pa de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-24: mthong nas kyang mi dga' bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-25: 'dis bdag nyid yongs su btang bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:421b-26: de rnams la phan pa ci zhig nus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-0: gzhan yang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di sems can @422a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-1: rnams la phan pa byed pa la skyo bar 'gyur gyi ma la bdag gis 'di'i grogs bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-3: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis char chen po rab tu phab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-4: me de rab tu zhi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-5: des na sems can de thams cad me'i 'jigs pa las thar par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-8: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi sreg pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-9: nga nyid byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-11: de na nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas sems can la phan pa byas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-14: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-20: gzhan yang ngas sems can la phan pa byas te blon po lnga brgya rang gi sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-24: 'das pa'i dus na w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-25: de'i blon po lnga brgya yod pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-26: khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis blon po lnga brgya po de rnams kha phyung ba'i gleng gzhi de dag rgyal pos thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422a-27: rgyal po de yang chos dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-0: gzhan la phan par zhugs pa zhig @422b pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-2: 'di dag bsad de ci rung snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-4: de rnams smyags bcad de dong ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-5: bye gling zhig la phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-6: de na de rnams skom pas nyen nas phan tshun brtags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-7: chu gang na yang ma mthong nas de rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu sgra byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-8: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' glang po che rnams kyi nang du yan lag bdun legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-9: glang po che sa srung gi bu'i sha tshugs lta bu zhig tu skyes pa de'i bsod nams kyi mthus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-10: ri sul dag me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-15: glang po che'i gtso bo des thag ring po na gnas bzhin du tshor nas des sna chus bgang nas brgyugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-16: des blon po de rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang dbugs phyung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-17: chus de rnams kyi kha bshal te rgyab tu zhon dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-22: lam gyis dub pa bsal nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-23: de nas des de rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-24: ri sul 'di'i pha rol ngos na glang po che'i gtso bo'i ro zhig yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-25: de'i rgyu lto khrus te chus khong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-27: 'bras bu dag bsdus te dengs shig dang de ltar na 'brog 'di rtol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-29: de nas glang po che'i gtso bo de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-30: ri de la 'dzegs nas sems bskyed smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:422b-31: ji ltar bdag gis sdug bsngal nyam nga ba 'di las yongs su bskyabs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-1: 'di las rtol ba'i thabs bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-2: 'di dag gi don du rang gi srog phangs pa yongs su btang ba de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-3: bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-4: bdag gis 'di dag nyid 'khor ba'i dgon pa las sgrol bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-6: glang po che des lag pa gnyis kyis sna brdzis nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-7: bdag nyid ri de'i kha nas mchongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-8: glang po che'i gtso bo lus chen po lhung ma thag tu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-9: mod la shi bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-10: blon po de rnams kyis btsal ba na mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-11: de rnams gnas der song nas de rnams kyis glang po che'i gtso bo de mthong ba dang gcig la gcig smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-12: glang po che'i gtso bo gang gis bdag cag gi srog 'byin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-14: gal te 'di'i steng du lag pa bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-15: ji ltar bdag cag gi lag pa sa la ltung bar mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-16: de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-17: bdag nyid chen po 'dis gang gi don du srog yongs su btang ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-19: de nas blon po de rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-20: glang po che'i gtso bo de'i rgyu lto phyung nas bkrus te chus bkang nas rtsab dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-21: 'bras bu rnams khyer nas glang po che'i gtso bo de'i ro la mchod pa byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-22: 'brog de rtol nas phyis smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423a-23: ji ltar bdag nyid chen po 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-0: bdag cag rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir rang gi srog yongs @423b su btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-1: bdag cag 'brog 'di las yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bdag cag 'khor ba'i 'brog chen po las yongs su thar par byed par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-8: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che'i gtso bo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-11: ngas bdag nyid yongs su btang ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-14: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-15: 'on kyang ngas bdag nyid yongs su btang ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-16: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-21: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir srog chags stong phrag mang po rang gi shas tshim par byas kyang nga'i sems nyams pa med pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-26: klu gzhon nu tsam pa skyes zhes bya ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-28: dge ba'i bsam pa can de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:423b-30: bcu bzhi la gnas nas byung nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso spyong blangs te gnas gsal bar lus chen por byas nas lus btang ste gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-0: gnas pa la cung zad kyang gnod pa mi byed @424a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-2: lo nyes byung nas las la mi lta ba'i mi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-7: lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-8: klu'i sha las bcad cing bcad cing bza' bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-9: de na ngas dus mang por rang gi shas tshim par byas na yang nga'i sems ma nyams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-12: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi klu gzhon nu tsam pa skyes gang yin pa de ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-23: gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-27: mtsho chen po ma dros pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-28: ngang pa rnams kyi sde dpon yul 'khor skyong zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-29: de la bu gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-40: rgyun kho nar ngang pa rnams la sdig par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424a-42: kha cig la sder mos rma 'byin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-0: gnod pa gzhan yang brgya phrag @424b dag byas nas ngang pa rnams ngang pa'i sde dpon yul 'khor skyong gi drung du song nas nyi ma re re zhing yang go bar byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-6: gal te 'di rgyal tshab tu bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-8: 'dis ngang pa'i khyu bshig par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-9: 'di la thabs shig bsham par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-12: bzhin rgyas gnyis ka bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-15: mtshe'u rnams bltas te nga'i drung du thog mar su 'ongs pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-16: ngas ngang pa rnams kyi sde dpon du gzhug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-18: de gnyis kyis 'bab chu'i dong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-20: mtshe'u rnams phan tshun du bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-21: de gnyis rim gyis w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-22: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-24: rgyas pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:424b-25: w'a ra n'a si'i skyed mos tshal na de'i rdzing tshangs ldan zhes bya ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425a-5: bzhin rgyas la yang rang gi khyus smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425a-10: zhes des myur bar song nas rgyal srid blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425a-11: de nas ngang pa lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas w'a ra n'a sir lhags te tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du babs nas rtse bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425a-12: de de lta bu'i bag yod pas gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425a-13: skye bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425a-15: ngang pa'i sde dpon mchog tu blta na sdug pa'i gzugs can gang nas 'dir 'ongs /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425a-28: bag brkyang ste gnas shing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-2: gal te de ltar gyur na bya ba rnams khug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-6: tshangs ldan gyi mtsho na bya mchog tu gzugs mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-8: ngang pa'i sde dpon zhig ga zhig cig nas 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-10: khyed cag gis de gcig pu ma snad par rnyis bzung la nga'i drung du khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-11: des de rnyi ma chag tu 'jam pos rma ma byung bar bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-12: des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-13: bdag ni dam pos rnyis bzung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-14: mi yi dbang song byar med kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-15: ci nas ngang pa'i khyu dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:425b-16: myur du ma dros 'deng bar gyis //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-0: glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas @443a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-15: glang po 'dul mkhan yang gong du zhon nas ri dvags 'chor du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-16: ji tsam na glang po che des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-17: nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-18: des dri de'i rjes bzhin rgyugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-19: de nas rgyal po glang po che rlung ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-20: glang po che 'dul mkhan la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-22: nam mkha' 'gul ba 'dra zhing phyogs kun myur du 'dul bar 'gro ba 'dra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-23: sa ni mtha' dag 'khor lo bzhin 'khor shing rnams mkha' la 'khor ba 'dra /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-24: glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu 'di rgyug mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443a-25: ri bo 'di rgyugs snyam nas ri rnams gya tshom myur du rgyug pa 'dra //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-4: 'chi bar nges par rnams kyis tshe yis man bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-5: glang po 'di ni bdag stobs zil gyis mnan nas mchi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-6: mi yi dbang po lcags kyu'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-7: zhags pa'am yang na lcags gis kyang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-9: tshar gcad nus pa ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-10: 'dod chags sems kyi zug rngu ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-11: ji zhig ltar na skye 'gyur te //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-15: gnas thams cad du bzlog par ma nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-19: shing gi yal ga la 'jus mdzod cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-28: lha de lta lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-29: dpyad dran nas ring por mi thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:443b-31: zhag bdun lon pa dang dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-12: zhes des lcags kyi thu lum so mal du tshos par bsregs pa zhig dpyad kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-36: mang po brtsams par byed mod kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-37: mi nus par ni shes nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-38: brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-39: de dang der ni de lta bu'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-40: 'bad pa rnam pa mang byas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-42: rtsa nas phyin par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444a-44: kha cig yul rnams spong bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-0: de gzhom 'dod @444b pa gzhan dag ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-2: lha dang lha min mi dang seng ge stag dang sbrul dag dang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-4: 'dod pa'i zhags pa shin tu phra mo rnams kyis yid bcings nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-7: gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i glang po 'dul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-8: rgyal po gzugs can ma lags phra sems ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-9: drang srong chab rlung 'tshal bas ma thul to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-10: glang chen 'dul ba gzugs med phra ba'i sems //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-11: drang srong chu rlung za bas ma thul na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-12: gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-13: mi yi 'jig rten dag na yod dam kye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-14: gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-15: lha gcig mi yi 'jig rten na mchis te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-16: rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-17: nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' bo stobs ldan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-18: de dang gang dag de 'drar rjes 'brang ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-19: de dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-20: de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brtson 'grus dang stobs thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-23: bsod nams dag byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-24: sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-25: 'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:444b-26: sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyi ma bsgral ba //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:450b-38: mi ma yin mo'i skyes rabs dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:450b-40: de bzhin bdag ni bden dga' ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:450b-41: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-2: gnag lhas skyes su nga gyur tshe //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-3: shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-4: de bzhin rnga bo che yang bsgrags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-5: bram ze rab 'bar gyur pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-6: ral par 'dab chags tshang bcas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-7: bsam gtan las ni ma langs par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-8: bsam gtan pha rol phyin brtson byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-9: snying rje yongs su bsgoms byas shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-10: pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-11: khur lci ba ni ngas bor te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-12: dam bcas pa yang rdzogs par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-13: nga dang sangs rgyas gang phrad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-14: mchod pa byas pa'i mi mchog ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-15: de kun mya ngan 'das par gshegs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-16: nga ni byang chub la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-17: rgyal po 'od ldan dbang po nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-18: thub pa dbang po rgyal mtshan bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-19: sems can bye ba phrag stong ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-20: srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral ba byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-22: rdzogs sangs rgyas te lha mir bcas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-24: sgrol bar mdzad pa smos ci dgos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-25: ngas ni 'jig rten don gyi phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-26: mya ngan 'das na'ang chos kyi gru /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-27: brtan pa dag ni bca' byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-28: brgya stong phrag ni bsgral bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-29: mi gang sangs rgyas skyabs song zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-30: mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-31: bya ba byed pa'i skyes bu de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-32: 'jig rten dag ni skyid de ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-33: gang dag de bzhin gshegs rgyal la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-34: bya ba cung zad byed pa na'ang de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-35: mtho ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-37: yang dag ji bzhin 'di thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-38: dge ba bungs ni bskyed de bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451a-40: srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams sa re //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451b-0: @451b sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451b-42: don thams cad grub pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:451b-43: tha ma dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-2: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-4: bla mar byas zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-5: de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-6: mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-7: de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-8: kun tu rgyu rab tu mang po rtog khang du lhags shing 'dus par gyur nas skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-9: shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-11: bdag cag la rgyal po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-19: ded dpon rnams kyis bkur sti byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-25: nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyang rnyed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-27: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba la bkur stir byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-30: mchod par byed ces bya ba nas sman dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-31: yo byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-32: des na de ltar bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-33: de la bdag cag gis ji ltar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-34: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452a-35: tshangs par spyod pa la mi tshangs par spyad pa skyon yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-0: bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang @452b mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-2: blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-4: tshur dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur ba thob cig ces spro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-5: bdag cag gi nang na kun tu rgyu gzugs bzang mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-7: blta na sdug pa gang yin bram ze'i bu mo rtsva mi yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-8: de la spro ba bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-9: zhes de rnams kyis de pho nyas bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-10: sring mo shes par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-12: bdag cag gis bkur sti dang zhes bya ba nas nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-14: dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-15: 'jig rten de la bkur sti byed pas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-16: bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-18: bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtsva mis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-19: 'phags pa dag bdag gis de la ji ltar bgyi lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-21: khyod kyis nye du rnams kyi ched du dge sbyong go'u ta ma la kho mo dang lhan cig tu mi tshangs par spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-22: zhes khyod skur pa 'debs par spro'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-25: bkur sti sngon gyi bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-26: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-27: bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtsva mis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-29: kun tu rgyu rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-31: dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-32: skur pa 'debs par bdag mi spro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-34: khyod ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs par mi spro ba de tsam du bdag cag dang gtam 'dre bar mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-35: phebs par smra bar mi bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-37: rnam par blta bar mi bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:452b-38: khyod gnas thams cad du 'dug tu mi gzhug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-1: kyis dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-3: shes rab chung ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-5: 'phags pa; bdag gis ji ltar bu zhig bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-7: tshur khyod rgyal bu rgyal byed tshal du rgyun du song la dus thag gi tsam lon nas dge sbyong go'u ma la skur pa thob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-8: de nyi ma re re zhing langs te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-9: ji tsam na lto la snod gcig bcings nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-10: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtsva mi rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-11: gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-12: nga nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-15: 'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-16: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-17: gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-18: de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu rgyu rtsva mi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-20: bdag ni 'di ru sbrum bgyis nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-22: snyan cing 'jebs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-23: da ltar chos ni gsung mdzad dam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-25: yang dag min pa smra ba dmyal bar 'gro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-26: bram ze'i bu mo rtsva mis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453a-27: gang gis byas nas ma byas zhes smra ba'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-0: bcom ldan @453b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-1: dman pa'i chos can mi ni de gnyi ga /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-2: pha rol dag tu 'dra bar 'gro bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-3: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-5: bram ze'i bu mo rtsva mi 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-7: dge slong gi dge 'dun la yun ring po nas mtho 'tsham par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-9: rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la lhung bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-10: de nas bram ze'i bu mo rtsva mi skyengs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-11: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-13: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchid kyang bka' stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-14: gang du thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa yang lung bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-16: ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma dros par mchis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-19: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-20: chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar mdzad pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-23: ji srid sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:453b-24: sems can 'gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-1: bya ba thams cad btul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-2: nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig tu bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-4: sku tshe'i lnga cha btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-5: mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-6: grong khyer gsal bar lha las gshegs pa bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-7: yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bkod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-8: mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-10: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig mtsho chen po ma dros par sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-12: mtsho chen po ma dros pa gang na bar 'dong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-13: der rang rang gi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-15: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur te mtsho chen po ma dros par gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-17: gnod sbyin gtum po mi bzad gnas pa yid 'ong zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-18: me tog sna tshogs shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-19: de las rgya mtsho dug can dag tu 'gro ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-20: chu bo chen po bzhi po 'di dag phyogs bzhir 'bab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454a-21: gang ga sindhu de bzhin pakshu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-0: si ta de dag rdzu 'phrul @454b stobs thob pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-1: ma gtogs mi rnams kyis ni mi bgrod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-2: der ni thub pa dge 'dun bcas par bzhugs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-5: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur yan chad kyi sems kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-7: de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-8: nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-9: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-10: mtsho chen po ma dros par las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-11: de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du padma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-13: bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-18: padma stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba zhig sprul pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-19: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la padma'i snying po de la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-20: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang padma gzhan rnams kyi snying po la 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-21: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la snam sbyar 'drub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:454b-24: song la rab tu byung ba'i zla bo khrid de shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-0: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal chen po ma dros pa nas @455a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-2: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-4: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-5: ston pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba dang thabs cig tu mtsho chen po ma dros pa na sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas khyod la gzhes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-9: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-10: re zhig snam sbyar drubs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-15: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis sor mo lnga char gyis drub par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-16: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-17: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-18: 'o na lta bu drub zin tu zad mo /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-23: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-24: ske rags rgya cang phrol nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-25: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-26: khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-27: re zhig khyod kyis 'di khyer la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-28: de nas phyis kho bo khyer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-29: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:455a-30: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bsam pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:459b-16: chung ngu gcig pu de ni myur dran nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:460a-12: mthu chen lus mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:460b-5: yan lag lam gyi yan lag rnam par thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:460b-6: de dag bsgom pa bdag gis dga' mgur thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:460b-7: zag pa zad cing lus kyi tha ma bzung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:460b-8: lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa rdul med pa //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-16: dpal dang bdag nyid der skyes te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-17: kun la sdug cing yid 'ong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-18: mthar phyin gnas ni thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-19: bdag ni nyin mo yongs rgyu zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-20: mtshan mo dag nyi nyal bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-21: myur bar de nas langs pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-22: de na bud med mang po dag //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-23: rdza rnga dang na rngi chen dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-24: 'khar rnga'i pi wang sngas btsugs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-25: sgren mor bla rdol byed pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-26: lag brkyang nas ni gnyid log mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-27: de nas bdag gi sngon gyi rgyu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-28: mthu chen po ni skyes par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-29: bdag la de nas bud med la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-30: dur khrod mi gtsang 'du shes byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-31: de nas skyo bar gyur nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-32: bdag gis sdang ba'i tshig smras pa; ;grogs pos bdag ni gces gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-33: kun nas 'tshe bas reg par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-34: de nas mal nas langs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-35: khang bzang nas ni shod du babs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469a-36: lhas ni rjes su snying brtse bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-0: bdag @469b gi sgo ni rnam par phye //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-1: grong khyer nas ni mngon byung nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-2: 'bab chu'i ngogs su nye bar song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-3: bdag gis pha rol 'gram na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-4: dge sbyong dbang po bsdams pa mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-5: bdag gis dge sbyong de mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-6: sgra gsang bstod de smras pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-7: dge sbyong dag ni gtses gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-8: grogs po bdag la 'tshe bas reg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-9: de nas ston pas bdag la yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-10: de tshe bdud rtsi'i tshig gsungs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-11: gzhon nu ma 'jigs khyod tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-13: bdag gis nor bu'i lham phud de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-14: 'bab chu yi ni ngogs brgal nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-15: sangs rgyas gang zag zla med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-16: thugs rje can gyi spyan sngar song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-17: de nas bdag sgom thugs chud nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-18: gang zag zla med ston pa des //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-19: snyan pa'i chos ni bka' stsal pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-20: de ni so sor bdag gis rtogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-21: de nas bdag gis bden mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-22: thub chen rab byung gsol ba btab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-23: go'u tam thugs rje chen po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-24: thugs brtse ba yis rab tu phyung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-25: mtshan gcig lon nas de nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-26: nyi ma 'char kha tsam na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-27: bdag gi zag pa kun zad cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-28: bdag ni bsil gyur mya ngan 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-29: de ltar gnas brtan grags pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-31: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-32: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-33: gnas brtan grags pa'i le'u ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-35: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:469b-36: tsho dang ldan pa dpal skyed la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-1: skyed; tshe dang ldan pa grags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-2: rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-3: tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis kyang nga rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-5: de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-6: w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-8: rgyal po kri kris rin chen las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-9: byas pa'i mchod rten chen po brtsigs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-10: rgyal po kri kri'i grags ldan bu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-11: bdag ni thu bor gyur pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-12: bdag gis thog mar gdugs kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-13: rgyal ba'i mchod rten la gdags byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-14: dge ba'i las ni de byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-15: gang dang gang du skyes pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-16: bsod nams byas pa'i mdzes pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-17: lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-18: skye ba de dang de dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-19: phyug cing longs spyod che ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-20: nor dang 'brur ni ldan pa yi; ;bdag ni yon bdag chen por gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-21: bdag gis tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-22: sbyin pa mi nyung btang byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-23: slong ba pa dang dge sbyong dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-24: bram ze so sor tshim par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-25: shin tu dad pa'i sems kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-26: 'dod chags bral zhing zag med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-27: tha ba med pa'i rang sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-28: lnga brgya po dag tshim par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-29: dge ba'i las ni de byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-30: srid pa tha ma 'di la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-31: sh'akya phyug po'i rigs su skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-32: btsas ma thag tu tshig smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-34: ji ga cung zad cig yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-35: 'di ltar sbyin pa ngas btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470a-36: dbul po rnams su tshim par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-0: dbul @470b po rnams la zas byin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-1: gtong bas ngoms par 'gyur ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-2: ji ga nor lta yod dam khyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-3: bdag la myur du legs par smros //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-4: de dag bdag gi tshig thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-5: yid skyo bar ni gyur nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-6: ma ma gtogs par phyogs dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-7: phyogs su rnam par rgyug par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-8: ma ni bu la byams pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-9: de tshe bdag la 'di skad smras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-11: khyod su bdag la myur du smros;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-12: ma gcig khyod kyi bu bdag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-13: mi lags srin po ma lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-14: sbyin bdag tshe rabs dran pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-15: rtag tu sbyin pa gtong la spro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-16: bdag gi tshig de mas thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-17: yid ni dga' bar gyur nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-18: dbugs 'byin byed cing smras pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-19: bu gcig ci dgar sbyin pa mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-20: yo byad mang po rnams kyis kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-21: bdag la mas ni gso ba byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-22: kun la sdug cing yod 'ong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-23: bdag ni lta bas ngoms mi myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-24: bdag ni btsas ma thag tu yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-25: khyim de nor dang 'bru rnams dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-26: gser dang bran dang las byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-27: rnams kyang rtag tu 'phel bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-28: dpal skyed khye'u zhig btsas gyur la; ;btsas ma thag tu smras pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-29: bdag gi ming ni gnyen rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-30: dpal skyed ces ni bya bar btags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-31: de nas bdag gis sbyin btang zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-32: dbul po rnams ni tshim byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-33: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-34: khyim med par ni rab tu byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-36: bu lon nyen pas rab byung min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:470b-37: de tshe dad pas rab byung nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-2: bdag ni rgyal po blon po dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-3: de bzhin grong mi rnams kyis mchod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-4: zas dang btung ba gos dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-5: gnas mal yang ni rnyed par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-6: de ltar gnas brtan dpal skyed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-7: dge slong gnas brtan mdun 'dug nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-8: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-9: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-12: der dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rab tu mang po rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-13: tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-14: tshe dang ldan pa ba ku la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-15: tshe dang ldan pa dpal skyed kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-16: rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-17: tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-18: da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-20: de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-21: rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-22: bdag sngon spos 'tshong gyur pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-23: rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-24: dge slong dge 'dun spyan drangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-25: khyed cag ji snyed bzhed pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-26: snyun sman bdag gis dbul bgyis te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-27: shun pa rtsa ba 'bras bu'i sman //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-28: dge 'dun bdag gis tshim par bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-29: dge 'dun g-yar ni spyan drangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-30: bdag la dge slong gcig cig gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-31: aa ru ra gcig ma gtogs par; ;de nas 'ga' yang slong ba med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-32: bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-33: bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-34: sman sbyin pa yi rnam smin ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471a-35: mthu chen 'di la blta bar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-0: dge ba chung ngu @471b byas pas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-1: bde ba mang po nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-2: aa ru ra ni gcig byin pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-3: yun ring mtho ris rnams su dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-4: de nas las kyi lhag mas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-5: bdag gis mi yi srid thob nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-6: yul 'khor bsod snyoms len pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-7: slob pa na yang ma myong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-8: nub gsum kho nas rig pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-9: gsum po bdag gis mngon sum byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-10: ngan ngon gyis ni 'tsho byas shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-11: phyag dar khrod kyi chos gos 'chang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-12: khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-14: bdag gi tshe ni lo brgya dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-15: drug cu lhag cig lon na yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-16: de tsam bar du'ang bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-17: na bar mngon par mi dran te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-18: btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-19: chung ngu bgyis pa 'di dran te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-21: bde ba byung ba nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-22: de ltar gnas brtan pa ku las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-24: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-25: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-28: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-29: tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan zhes bya ba la 'di skad ces smras so; ;tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-30: tshe dang ldan pa ba ku las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-31: rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-32: tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-33: de nas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan zhes bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-34: de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-35: sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-36: bdag ni lham mkhan gyur pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:471b-37: mu ge byung nas de na bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-2: bza' bar bya ba kho na'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-3: ko ba'i ras ma 'tshod pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-4: dge sbyong gzhan zhig zas kyi phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-5: bsod snyoms la ni byon pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-6: de la bdag gis sems dad pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-7: ko ras kyi ni thug pa byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-8: dge sbyong des ni longs spyad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-9: de ni nam mkhar 'phags par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-10: bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-11: thal mo legs par sbyar byas te; ;de nas gang dang gang du ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-12: song ba kun tu 'brang byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-13: dga' ba rgya chen thob nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-14: de tshe smon lam btab pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-15: gnas brtan 'di lta bu dang bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-16: lhan cig 'dug par gyur par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-17: dge slong 'di yi las gyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-18: dri med chos ni gang reg pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-19: bdag gis chos de reg gyur ces //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-20: de tshe smon lam btab par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-21: kha dog ldan pa ma yin zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-22: dri ni sman par gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-23: ro dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-24: sbyin pa de tshe bdag gis btang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-25: dge ba chung ngu byas pas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-26: bde ba mang po myong bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-27: bsod nams byas pa'i mdzes pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-28: lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-29: bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-30: mi yi srid thob 'di yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472a-31: rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472b-15: tshong pa thams cad bsdus nas ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472b-24: mu stegs gzhan las rab tu byung //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472b-26: cho 'phrul mdzad pa mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472b-27: de nas de la rab byung phyir //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472b-29: thugs brtses bdag cag rab tu phyung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472b-30: bdag cag ga yas mgor son nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:472b-32: de nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-3: de tshe mchod rten mngon btud pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-4: bdag cag kun ni rab byung nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-8: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-23: dri rnams 'tshong la mkhas gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-24: de ni de tshe nyo ba'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-25: bud med gzhon nu ma dag 'ongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-26: der ni bdag gi gzugs ldan ma'i //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-31: mi tshangs spyod pa spro med kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-32: ma brtags gzhan gyi bud med la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-33: lag pas reg par byas pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473a-34: las kyi rnam par smin pa des //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-2: lag pa g-yas pa bskams par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-3: de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-4: gang dang gang du skyes pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-5: rtag tu bdag gi lag pa ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-9: mya ngan 'das pa bder gyur pa'i //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-13: las rnams chud mi za bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-14: de yi 'bras bu nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-15: da dung du yang bdun pa dag /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-17: lag pa g-yas 'di ji lta bar; ;g-yon pa de lta ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-18: skyes pa'am bud med gang yang rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-19: byi ba byed pa gang yin pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-20: sems can dmyal bar skyes gyur nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-30: bdag gis de ltar sdig byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-31: sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-32: yun ring dmyal ba de yi ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-34: bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-35: bla na med pa'i gnas thob nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-37: bsil bar gyur cing mya ngan 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:473b-38: de lta bas na bde 'dod cing //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:474a-31: de nas skyed mos tshal bstar ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:474b-0: rgyal po des @474b ni phul bar gyur //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:474b-6: mi nyung ba dag sbyin par btang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:474b-9: de na bud med legs brgyan bus //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:474b-36: lha yi rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-3: bde ba mang po nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-4: bsod nams byas pas lha dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-5: mi yi nang du mdzes gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-6: bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-10: bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-24: thub pa chen po thugs brtse bas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-26: sangs rgyas shes rab chen po ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-27: rgyal po'i khab byon bdag gis thos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-28: bcom ldan thub de gang na bar; ;dga' ba'i yid kyis song ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-30: sgron ma 'dzin pa mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-31: de tshe babs te rkang pas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-32: thub pa'i spyan sngar song nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-33: thub pa che la bdag mgu bas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475a-35: skyes mchog la ni phyag byas nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-2: ring por ma thogs mnyes par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-3: 'jig rten ston pa bla na med //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-6: de tshe bdag gis so sor rtogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-7: de nas bdag gis thugs rje can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas la 'di skad gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-9: dpa' bo bdag ni rab 'byung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-10: bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob par 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-11: de nas shes rab dam pa can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-12: sangs rgyas gang zag zla med pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-13: dge slong tshur shog ces gsungs pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-14: bdag ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-15: des na bdag ni bag yod cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-16: brtson 'grus bsam gtan brtan po yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-17: bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das zhi ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-18: gnas kyi dam pa reg par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-19: rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-20: ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-21: mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-22: dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-23: srid par 'khor bar skye ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-24: 'chi ba rnams las bdag grol zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-25: mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-26: thams cad du ni bdag grol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-27: de ltar gnas brtan me skyes kyis; ;dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-28: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-29: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-32: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-33: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-34: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:475b-35: tshe dang ldan pa me skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-1: dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de; ka sha'i yul 'khor dar byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-3: rgyal po kri kri zhes bya byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-4: rgyal po kri kri'i bu tha chung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-5: de yi tshe na bdag gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-6: 'od srung dpal dang ldan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-7: mchod rten chen po brtsigs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-8: pha yi yid ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-9: de la gdugs bu chung zhig phul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-10: dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod rten la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-11: gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa des //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-12: rab byung rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-13: lhan cig 'grogs gyur smon lam btab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-14: dge ba'i las ni de byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-15: gang dang gang du skyes par ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-16: bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-17: lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-18: bdag gi skye ba tha ma 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-19: bang mdzod stug por bdag skyes te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-20: der yang tshong dpon khyim du skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-21: rigs kyi bu gcig bur gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-22: mi dbang ko'u rab bya dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-23: de bzhin kun sdug yid du 'ong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-24: de bzhin yul mi rnams dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-25: bdag ni gnyen tshogs yid du 'ong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-26: mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-27: gzugs bzang shin tu dbyibs legs shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-28: mi yi 'byor pa rnams kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-29: 'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-30: ston pa dga' zhing yid 'ong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-31: bang mdzod stug por gshegs pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-32: bdag gis mthong nas sems dad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-33: rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476a-34: ston pa gang zag zla med de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-0: bsam pa kun la mkhas gyur @476b pas; ;bdag gi bsam pa des mkhyen nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-1: rab tu byung ba las bzlog pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-2: pha ma dag gis ma gnang ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-3: gang zag dge yang sangs rgyas rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-4: rab tu 'byin par mi mdzad kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-5: song la bdag nyid thar par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-6: de nas khyim du bdag song nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-7: pha ma gnyis la smras pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-8: yab cig gnang bar mdzod cig bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-9: khyim ma mchis par rab phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-10: pha mas bdag las thos nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-11: de tshe yid mi bder gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-12: bu gcig khyod ni bdag cag gnyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-13: shi bar gyur na'ang mi gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-14: de thos nas ni bdag gis su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-15: gal te mi gnang 'di nyid du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-17: sa la yang ni nyal bar byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-18: de tshe dkar po'i chos dag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-19: bskul nas rab 'byung don gnyer zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-20: thar par 'dod pas zhag drug tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-21: zan ma zos par 'dug pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-22: de nas bdag dang mdza' ba yi; ;ne'u zlas pha ma la smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-23: 'di ni gnang bar gyur na legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-24: khyed la shi bas ci zhig bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-25: gal te 'di ni rab byung bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-26: dga' na phyis kyang khyed cag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-27: gson po nyid du bltas pas chog ;shi bar gyur na ci zhig rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-28: gal te rab tu byung ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-29: 'di ni dga' bar ma gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-30: khyed kyir zad mod pha ma las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-31: gzhan ni bu gnas ga la yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-32: bdag gi snyan smra ne'u zla la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-33: pha ma gnyis kyis smras pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-34: gal te rab byung lta byed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-35: de lta na gtang gzhan du min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-36: de nas ne'u zla bdag gi drung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-37: nye bar 'ongs nas smras pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:476b-38: mkhas pa khyod ni pha ma yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-2: khyod la pha ma gnyis na re //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-3: gal te rab tu byung nas khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-4: phyis kyang lta bar byed na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-5: bu gcig song la rab tu byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-6: legs zhes bdag gis mnyan byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-7: de nas nyams ni rtas byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-8: ston pa'i spyan sngar song nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-9: 'di skad ces ni tshig gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-10: btsun pa bdag ni gnang lags na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-11: thub chen khyod kyi bstan pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-13: rgyal ba bdag ni rab tu byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-14: de nas bdag ni rab byung nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-15: ston pa'i bstan la 'di ltar gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-16: bdag gi kun sbyor thams cad zad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-17: zag pa rnams ni bcom par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-18: bdag gis gdugs gcig btang bas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-19: bde ba mang por myong bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-20: bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-21: lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-22: thams cad gzigs pas dgon pa pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-23: rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-24: mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur ba'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-25: dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-26: de ltar thugs rje che rgyal la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-27: yid ni rab tu dang byas te; ;mchod rten la ni bkur sti byos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-28: 'jigs pa che las rnam thar gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-29: gnas brtan phyag dar khrod pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-30: yul 'khor skyong zhes grags pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-31: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-32: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477a-37: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-0: tshe dang ldan @477b pa sa ga la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-1: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-2: tshe dang ldan pas gas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pas gas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-4: rgyal po'i khab kyi tshong dpon gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-5: gtso bo nor chen bdag gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-6: dbyar gyi dus su drang srong ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-7: lnga brgya dag ni nye bar byon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-8: der ni tshong dpon lnga brgya yang; ;thams cad 'dus par gyur nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-9: kun gyi drang srong re re zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-10: khyim khyim du ni bgo bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-11: rang gi don du kha zas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-12: ji lta bu dag g-yo byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-13: dka' thub can de re re la'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-14: rtag tu de 'dra kho na sbyin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-15: de'i nang drang srong rgan po gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-16: de ni bdag gi skal bar 'ongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-17: tshong dpon mchog la de bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-18: thub pa mchog de 'tsham par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-19: bdag la lnga brgya ba yi zas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-20: snod gang nas ni 'dren byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-21: de 'dra ba yi kha zas nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-22: bdag gis dge slong de la byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-23: de nas de la bdag la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-24: ser sna shin tu mi bzad skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-25: 'di lta bu yi kha zas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-26: bdag gi chung mar byin ma myong; ;sring mo ma yin de bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-27: bu dang bu mo dag dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-28: phu nu la'ang ma byin na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-29: dge slong 'di la zla gsum du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-30: sbyin pa lta zhig smos ci dgos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-31: bdag ni lnga brgya po dag gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-33: ma la bdag gis dge sbyong 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-34: gsad pa la ni brtson byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-35: 'di ni shi ba'i dus byas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:477b-37: de nas bdag gi sdig sems kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-1: yi gcin ni bskol byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-2: nyes med par ni gsad bya bar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-3: kha zas rnams dang lhan cig byin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-4: der ni zos ma thag tu yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-5: mi bzad pa yi nad langs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-6: rgyu ma gnye ma mkhal ma dag //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-7: ro smad nas ni zags par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-8: thub pa chos kyi yon tan dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-9: shes bzhin de nas dus las 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-10: lha dang gnod sbyin gcig la gcig ;sgra ni shin tu sgrog byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-11: kye ma'o tshong dpon 'di re sdig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-12: 'di yis thub pa rang sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-13: bsil bar gyur cing zag med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-14: dbang ldan 'di ni grongs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-15: nye du rnams kyang 'khrugs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-16: de nas bdag la smod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-17: gang phyir thub pa 'di bsad pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-18: khyed kyis bsod nams min mang bskyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-19: nye du rnams kyi tshig thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-20: bdag kyang yid mi bder gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-21: drang srong de dag bsags nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-22: de nas bdag gis nyes pa bshags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-23: bzod pa gsol nas de nas yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-24: nyes pa thams cad so sor bshags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-25: lnga brgya la ni zhal zas kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-26: gus dang bcas pas tshim par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-27: bdag gis sdig pa de bshags nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-28: bzod gsol drang srong de dag ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-29: zas dang btung bas tshim byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-30: de tshe smon lam btab pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-32: bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-33: ji ltar 'di kun grol gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478a-34: de bzhin 'ching las grol bar shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-0: bkren pa rnams kyi @478b khyim du bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-1: lan 'ga'ang skye bar ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-2: bdag gi sems ni lan 'ga' yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-3: ser sna skye bar ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-4: bdag gis rang sangs rgyas bsad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-5: shin tu mi bzad las byas pas; ;de nas 'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-6: dmyal ba rnams su skyes nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-7: yun ring lo ni stong dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-8: sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-9: slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-10: phyug cing nor chen gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-11: 'jig rten rnams kyis mchod bkur na'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-13: rtag tu bdag ni nang grol dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-14: 'dzag pas shi ba'i dus byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-15: khyim pa'i rtags rnams spangs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-16: khyim med par ni rab tu byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-17: bstan la brtson 'grus byas pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-18: 'dod chags thams cad yang dag bton //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:478b-19: gang tshe len pa med pa yi //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:479a-15: bdag gis zan ni mi sbyin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:479a-23: de yi 'og tu zas zar bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:479a-24: las kyi rnam par smin pa des //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:479a-25: bsdus gzhom dang ni tsha ba yi //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:480a-8: de nas bdag gis rab tu phyung //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:480b-18: dge slong rnams ni nyer 'ongs nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-18: rdzogs sangs gang zag zla med pas //
