K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-21: yang dag len par skul ma mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-22: de nas ded dpon bla med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-23: sangs rgyas la ni bdag gis gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-24: re zhig bdag gis lo bdun du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-25: sbyin pa mi nyung gtang bar bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-26: bdag gis sbyin pa dag btang nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-27: lo bdun lon par gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-28: shes rab mchog can khyod las ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-29: de nas bdag gis rab tu 'byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-30: lo bdun dag ni thogs ches la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-31: tshe ni cung zad tsam yin pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-32: sang nyid 'chi yang sus shes kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-33: de ring nyid du brtul te gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-34: bdag gis gus pas sangs rgyas kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481a-35: gsung ni slar ldog ma byas par //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-23: bdag lta gson na'ang ci ru rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-24: mtshon gyis gdab par bya'o snyam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-25: mtshon rnon bdag gis blangs nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-26: skyil mo krung ni bcas nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-27: mtshon ni skye la gtad pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-28: de nas sems ni rnam par grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-29: bdag sems tha ba las grol nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-30: yang dang yang du brjod pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-31: ae ma'o sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-32: ae ma'o chos nyid ae re bzang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-33: sngon ni bdag gi 'du shes gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-34: so so'i skye bo shi bla snyam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:481b-35: bdag gis srog la ma bltas pas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-19: dag pa'i las ni de byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-20: grong khyer w'a ra n'a sir ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-21: ka shi'i rgyal po kri kri yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-22: bu pho 'bring por bdag skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-23: 'od srung mchod rten mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-24: de nas dad pa'i sems bskyed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-25: mchod rten de la bdag gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-26: gdugs 'bring zhig ni gdags pa byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-27: khrus de dang ni bsro gang dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-28: yung gi byug pas byugs pa dang; ;gdugs ni gdags pa byas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-29: bde ba mang po nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-30: de nas las kyi lhag mas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-31: bdag gi yang srid tha ma 'dir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-32: sh'akya'i rgyal po'i rigs skyes nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-33: sangs rgyas skyob pa'i mched du gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-34: bdag gi lus ni 'di la yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-35: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-36: sum cu lhag pa ma yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-37: sum cu dman pa ma yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485a-38: sh'akya seng ge'i bstan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-0: @485b bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-1: mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-2: dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-3: thams cad gzigs pas mdzes pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-4: rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-5: nyes bsal zag pa zad nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-6: go 'phang dam pa thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-7: de ltar gnas brtan dga' bos ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-9: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-10: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-11: dga' bo'i le'u ste; nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-12: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-13: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-14: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-15: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-16: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-17: de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de; 'di nas bdag sngon tshong pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-18: nya pa zhes ni bya bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-19: tshong pa'i lam du zhugs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-20: dbang du gyur cing zag med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-21: nyon mongs med pa'i rang sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-22: drang srong zhig ni mgron par 'ongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-23: de yi bar du bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-24: rtag par zas la mgron du bos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-26: der ni gding ba dag kyang bshams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-27: rkang pa'i chu dang til mar dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-28: de yi mar me dag kyang bshams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-29: ji srid lam yod de srid du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-30: bdag gis de la bkur sti byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-31: tshong pa rnams kyis rim bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-32: rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-33: dge slong gru drung nyer 'ongs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:485b-34: bdag gis de la smras pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-0: @486a *// btsun pa rgya mtsho 'di la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-1: nor gyi slad du bzhud dam ci //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-2: btsun pa bdag cag phongs pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-3: 'dod pa dag gi phyir yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-4: rgya mtsho chen po'i tshu tshogs la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-5: nyen can du ni 'jug par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-6: bdag la dge slong des smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-7: bdag ni mya ngan 'das pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-8: khyed cag gnyen kun lhan cig tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-9: nor chen bsod nams che bder gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-10: de tshe de la bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-11: rab dags chos gos bzang po phul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-12: mgo bos phyag ni byas nas yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-13: de la bskor ba dag byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-14: de nas bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-15: de ni chos gos blangs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-16: de dag thams cad blta bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-18: cho 'phrul byed pa de mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-19: de tshe bdag ni skyo gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-20: bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-21: de nas smon lam btab pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-22: gnas brtan 'di lta bu dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-23: bdag ni lhan cig 'grogs par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-24: 'di yi chos ni gang dag thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-25: de dag bdag gis thob par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-26: rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-27: rab tu byung ba thob pa dang;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-29: rnam 'phrul bkur sti byed par shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-30: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-31: lha yi 'jig rten rab tu dga'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-32: mi yi 'thob pa thob nas kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-33: bde ba rgya chen nyams su myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-34: skye ba de dang de dag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-35: bdag ni nor chen phyug pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-36: bsod nams byas pas mdzes pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-37: lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486a-38: bskal pa tha ma 'di la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-0: srid pa tha ma 'di @486b la yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-1: ku shi zhes bya'i gyad rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-2: gyad kyi bur ni bdag skyes te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-3: blta na sdug cing mdzes pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-4: gzugs bzang spyod pa mdzes pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-5: thams cad la sdug yid 'ong zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-6: phun sum tshogs pa mthar phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-7: sangs rgyas sh'akya seng ge ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-8: bla na med pa mnyes par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-9: mthong nas bdag sems dad byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-10: khyim med par ni rab tu byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-11: ma ga dha yi ri rgyud nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-12: 'od ma'i tshal du gnas bcas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-14: nyan thos dag cig der lhags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-15: gnas mal dag ni bskos na yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-16: dge slong rnams la spyo byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-17: rnam par 'tshe zhing skrod pa dang; ;yang dang yang du gshe bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-18: tshangs pa mtshungs spyod rnams mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-19: bdag ni snying rje bar gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-20: bdag ni zag pa zad gyur kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-21: nyid kyis dge slong bsnyen bkur bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-22: bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-23: bstan pa 'di la brtson byas pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-24: dgra bcom bdag gis thob nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-25: mngon shes drug la dbang byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-26: ston pa'i spyan sngar song nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-27: thub la mgo bos phyag byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-28: thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-29: skyes bu dam pa la gsol ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-30: 'dod chags gti mug gis ma lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-31: byams sems gus dang bcas pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-32: thub pa bdag ni dge slong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-33: rim gro bgyid pa gnang bar mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-34: pha rol sems la mkhas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-35: ston pas bdag gsol mkhyen nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-36: nyid kyis dge slong dge 'dun mdun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:486b-37: gnyug ma'i rim gro byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-2: de bzhin ngag dang yid kyis kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-3: bdag gis rtag tu sems smad nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-4: dge slong dge 'dun rim gro byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-5: spyod pa la ni zhugs pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-6: lam nas 'ongs pa'i dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-7: bdag gis mthong nas dga' ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-8: so sor yid ni bde gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-9: til mar rab 'bar lta bu yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-10: bdag gis sor lnga'i sgron ma yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-11: rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-12: gnas mal dag ni 'cha' bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-13: dge slong gang dag bdag gi ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-15: nam ni sros par gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-16: mun khung bdag drung lhags nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-17: de rnams la ni ci rigs par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-18: byams sems gus dang bcas pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-19: gnas mal dag ni 'cha' byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-20: skye bo mang po skyo ba bskyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-21: bdag gis bsam pa gang yin dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-22: bdag gis smon lam gang btab pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-23: bdag gi bzang po de grub cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-24: go 'phang mi g-yo bdag gis thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-25: de lta bur ni gyad bu nor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-26: zag pa med cing dbang gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-27: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-28: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-29: gyad bu nor gyi le'u ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-31: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-32: tshe dang ldan pa nye sde la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-33: tshe dang ldan pa nye sde; tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487a-34: tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-0: de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye sdes de'i tshe rang gi las @487b kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-1: 'das pa dag gi dus na bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-2: rngon pa dag tu gyur pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-3: nags chen nyams dgar byul ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-4: ri dvags rnam pa sna tshogs mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-5: dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-6: gzhu yi tshogs dag blangs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-7: ri dvags mang po'i ri yi rdzong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-8: de dang der ni bdag gis rgyus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-9: bdag gis ri dvags rnams mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-10: gdug pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas; ;dug gis bskus pa'i mda' rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-11: ri dvags mang po rab tu bsnun //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-12: bdag gi lag na gzhu dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-13: dug gis bskus pa'i mda' sel bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-14: rang sangs rgyas shig ljon shing gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-15: drung na bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-16: bdag gi dge sbyong de mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-17: de tshe yid ni mi bder gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-18: de nas thub pa gnod med pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-19: lus la mdas ni bsnun par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-20: de yi 'og tu dge slong de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-21: mda' yi zug rngu'i sdug bsngal ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-22: shing de nyid kyi drung du ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-23: len pa med par mya ngan 'das //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-24: rtsub pa'i las de byas pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-25: sems can dmyal bar skyes nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-26: de la lo ni stong phrag tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-27: bdag gis sdug bsngal tshor ba myong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-28: de nas dmyal las shi 'phos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-29: dud 'gro'i skye gnas song nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-30: ri yi rdzong ni de nyid du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-31: bdag ni ri dvags rnams su skyes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-32: rtag tu 'jigs shing bag tsha zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-33: bkres shing skom pas nyen pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-34: rid cing shin tu sdug bsngal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-35: bdag ni de dang der rgyu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-36: rdzong der rngon pa gdug pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:487b-37: shin tu mi bzad pa rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-2: bdag gis lus la bsnun par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-3: bdag 'gyel de dag gis mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-4: bdag ni gson zhing 'gul bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-5: mtshon gyis yan lag rnams kyi sha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-6: bcad nas de rnams khyer zhing 'dong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-7: bdag ni sa phyogs de nyid du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-8: sha yi ched du bsad byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-9: de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-10: sdug bsngal mang po bsgrubs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-11: ri bo de nyid ngos nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-12: dka' thub ldan la mthu che zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-13: rdzu 'phrul che gzi mi bzad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-14: drang srong rab tu mang po mthong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-15: bdag gis drang srong de mthong nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-16: de nas byams pa'i sems bsgoms te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-17: blo bzang byams dang ldan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-18: yang dang yang du blta byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-19: dka' thub ldan pa de rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-20: bdag gis gus bcas sems dad byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-22: bdag gis mi yi srid pa thob /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-23: zas don gnyer ba'i slong ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:488a-24: rang sangs rgyas shig mthong nas ni //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491a-34: de nas gang zag zla med pa //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-2: de ni nyan thos rnams la gtad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-3: bdag ni rab tu dga' gyur nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-18: bdag ni dgra bcom dbang sgyur cing //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-22: bsod nams byas pas grags ldan pa //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-27: de ni sems la smon pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-28: de ring sbrang rtsi rnyed gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-29: de nas mi ma yin rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-30: bdag son shes te phyogs bzhi nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-31: sbrang rtsi khur gyis blangs nas su //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-32: de dag tu ni 'bul bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-33: bdag gis sbrang rtsi ci dgos pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-34: bzang po dag las blangs nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:491b-35: dge slong dge 'dun tshim byas te //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492a-10: bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492a-15: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492b-0: thub pa'i @492b zhabs la mgos gtugs nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492b-4: bdag ni skyabs su ma song bar //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492b-6: bde gshegs drung nas bdag song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492b-9: bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492b-22: bram ze lnga brgya rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492b-23: tshal du gsang tshig brjod pa'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:492b-24: bram ze rnams kyis yongs bskor nas //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:493a-6: khyod la de bzhin de gda' bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:493a-7: khyod sangs rgyas par the tshom med //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:493a-10: khyod las lhag pa ma mchis te //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:493b-30: khyim rnams nas ni khyim med par //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:494a-17: mya ngan 'das pas nges par yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:494a-18: rab tu byung ba srab gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:494a-19: dam chos kyang ni ston mi 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:494a-20: bdag cag ji skad thos pa'i chos //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-0: @498a *// rtag tu bkur zhing mchod pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-1: lha yi spyod pa lta bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-2: skyob pa'i mchod rten phyags nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-3: ngo mtshar byung ba gzhan yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-4: bdag gi lus la lan 'ga' yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-5: gnod pa byung bar mi dran lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-6: de ltar sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-7: dri ma med pa bsam mi khyab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-8: bsam mi khyab la mngon dad pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-9: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu che //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-10: de bas rga shi zad pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-12: rgyal ba yi ni mchod rten la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-13: mchod pa bla na med pa gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-14: btsun pa bdag gis dge ba gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-15: bgyis pa dran pa 'di lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-18: de ltar dge slong 'od byed kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-20: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-21: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-24: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-25: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-26: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-27: tshe dang ldan pa 'od byed kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-28: tshe dang ldan pa nam grus kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-29: da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-30: de nas tshe dang ldan pa nam grus de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-31: 'di nas bskal ba bye ba'i sngon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-32: sangs rgyas kun zil gnon de la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-33: bdag gis dge ba gang bgyis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-34: btsun pa bdag gis dran lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498a-35: brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-0: nyan thos rnams @498b kyis mdun bdar nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-1: rgyal po'i pho brang dpe med du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-2: skyes bu dam pa gshegs pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-3: bdag kyang dgos pa zhig gi phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-4: grong khyer gzhan nas der phyin nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-5: de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-6: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-7: me dang nor bu glog 'od dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-9: 'od kun zil gyis mnan nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-10: sangs rgyas gzi brjid khyad par 'phags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-11: gzi brjid me dpung lta bu ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-12: sngon ma mthong ba mthong nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-13: bdag gi mdun na 'dug pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-14: bram ze zhig la dris pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-15: dris pa bdag la 'di skad smras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-17: lha dang mi mchog rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-18: zla med pa yi gang zag yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-19: bdag gis sangs rgyas sgra thos nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-20: de tshe bdag ni rab dgar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-21: dga' zhing mgu ba skyes pas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-22: lus ni thams cad bde bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-23: mi ma yin rnams lha yul gyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-24: rol mo'i sgra rnams 'byin pa thos //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-25: lha yi tsandan phye ma yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-26: grong khyer dam pa de ru bab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-27: kha cig autpal tsam pa gzhan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-28: de bzhin pa ri sha ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-30: bdag ni thal mo sbyar byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-31: yid ni mgu zhing rangs pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-32: nam mkha' la ni 'phags te gnas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-33: dga' dang rab tu dga' ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-34: lus kun tu ni khyab par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-35: dri dang phreng ba la sogs phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-36: mtha' dag tu ni brgyugs pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-37: de yi tshe na bskor kyang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-38: me tog gcig kyang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-39: de tshe de na bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-40: ha cang ring ba ma yin par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:498b-41: gdugs byed pa yi tshong khang na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-2: gdugs phyir bdag gis de la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-3: gsol btab nas ni gdugs blangs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-4: sems ni rab tu dang ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-5: sangs rgyas la ni gdugs bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-6: bdag gi lag nas gdugs shor ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-7: bar snang dag la mngon 'phags nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-8: ston pa gshegs nas gdugs 'gro zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-9: bzhugs pa na yang sdod par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-10: nam mkha'i ngos la sprin lta bur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-11: sangs rgyas la ni grib ma byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-12: thub pa'i sku ni mi 'dor ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-13: bar snang la ni 'dug par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-14: de nas bdag dang skye bo gzhan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-15: cho 'phrul rnams la brtags nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-16: thal mo legs par sbyar nas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa la mgos phyag byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-18: de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-19: nyan thos mtshan ma bzung nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-20: rjes su dran pas yid dga' zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-21: khyim gyi las kyi mtha' byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-22: kye ma'o thob pa legs thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-23: sangs rgyas mthong nas dran pa rnyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-24: yon tan bla na med pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-25: rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag gis phul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-26: yon gnas bla na med pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-27: bdag gis gdugs phul gang yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-28: dge ba des na bdag la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-29: rin chen bdun dang ldan par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-30: de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-31: lha yi nang du bdag skyes te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-32: lha yi rgyal por bdag gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-33: lha ni bye ba rnams kyis mchod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-34: slar yang mir ni 'ongs pa na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-35: stobs kyis bsgyur ba'i rgyal gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-36: nor chen brtson 'grus che ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499a-37: rgyal po rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-0: bdag @499b gis las 'di byas pas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-1: yang dang yang du 'khor ba na'ang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-2: bdag byed pa yi las de ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-3: lan 'ga'ang bar ni ma bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-4: de lta bu yi yon gnas la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-5: bdag gis dad pas phul ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-6: dge ba'i las de byas pas na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-7: ngan 'gror song ba mi dran no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-8: bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-9: mi yi srid thob 'di yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-10: yang dag sangs rgyas bla med pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-11: ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-12: sh'akya seng ge'i bstan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-13: bdag gis rab byung thob nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-14: mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-15: dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-16: bdud kyi lus ni lus chen po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-17: ri bo lta bur dpag tshad tsam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-18: nam mkha' las ni sprin lta bur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-19: mdog mi sdug pa sprul pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-20: de nas bdag gi g-yeng byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-21: 'di ko su zhig snyam pa las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-23: bdud yin par ni myur du shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-24: sdig can khyod ni ci dgar zad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-25: lus ni khor yug gcig lta bur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-26: mgo yang lhun po lta bur ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-28: bdag ni dgra bcom dbang gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-29: rig gsum ldan pa'i dge sbyong ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-30: sangs rgyas kyis gsungs gang yin pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-31: bde bar gnas pa rnams kyang thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-32: bsod snyoms byas pa lan gcig gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-33: zhag bdun du yang 'dug nas ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-34: rnam par grol ba'i dga' myong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-35: de lta bu dag bdag gis bsgoms //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-36: btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-37: gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:499b-40: de ltar nam gru blo ldan gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-0: ma dros pa yi mtsho chen @500a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-2: rang gi las ni lung bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-5: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-6: rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-9: bdag cag gis rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang da nyid kyi 'phrin las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa'i rigs so lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-13: des na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na yang gor ma'i dum bus zhabs kyi mthe bo rma phyung bar gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-17: tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya bas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-19: ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-21: sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-22: khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-23: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-25: dga' mgur spyod par byed ces bya ba nas khye'u zhig btsas nas bskyed bsrings te chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-26: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-28: de nas khyim bdag des chung ma gzhan zhig blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500a-29: de de dang ldan cig rtse bar byed ces bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-0: de las kyang khye'u zhig btsas @500b so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-2: de nas khyim bdag des khye'u phu bo shos chung ma blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-7: bu mo mang du btsas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-8: ji tsam dus phyis zhig na khyim bdag chung ma dang bcas te shi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-9: bu de phu bo nyid kyi drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-12: khye'u 'di khyod kyi cir mchi lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-16: ci 'di yang khyim gyi bgo skal dbang ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-18: bdag cag la yang phyed yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-22: ji ltar 'di la yang phyed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-23: bdag cag mang po la yang phyed lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-31: nor gyi phyir nu bo gsad du ga la rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-32: des de la yang dang yang du smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-33: 'dod pa la brten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas des khang blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-35: gal te grong du gsad na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-36: skye bo mang pos tshor bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-39: des de bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-42: yam bsreg shing gi phyir dgon par 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-43: de de dang lhan cig dgon par dong ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-44: de nas des ri phug tu rdos bsnun te bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:500b-47: de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis khyim bdag gi bu g-yas khyim gyi nu bo de dgon par rdos gsod pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-1: khyim gyi nu bo nor gyi phyir dgon par rdos bsnun te bsad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-3: lo brgya phrag mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-4: lo stong phrag mang po dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-6: las de kho na'i lhag mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang zhabs kyi mthe bo rdo'i dum bus rma phyung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-10: 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug par gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-15: tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-17: ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-21: ded dpon gnyis shig gnas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-22: de gnyis kyis gru bo che legs par bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-23: nor bsgrub pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-24: rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis rin po che'i gling du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-26: bag yod par rin po che rnams kyis gru bkang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-29: de gnyis chas pa las ji tsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-30: de'i gru bag med par bkang ba de bying bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501a-31: gru bying ba des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-1: des de srang la gcal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-2: rin po che las bor nas gru bo cher bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-3: de der zhugs nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-7: don med par 'di lta mi srid kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-10: des dben par dal bus dbug par brtsams pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-11: ded dpon des rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-12: ded dpon gru ma dbug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-13: thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-14: phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-15: slar bzlog kyang ma btub nas de nas des mdung thung gis bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-19: ded dpon gang gis ded dpon gsod pa de ni; nga nyid yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-20: ngas ded dpon mdung thung gis bsad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-22: lo brgya phrag mang po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-23: lo stong phrag mang po dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-25: las de'i lhag ma kho nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang zhabs la seng ldeng gi tshal pa zug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-29: 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-30: yul sa lar ji ltar lhung bzed pa bkrus pas zhugs pa'i lhung bzed bkrus pa de kho na bzhin du phyir gshegs te bsod snyoms gcig kyang ma rnyed par gyur lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:501b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-3: ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-5: sngon byung ba w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-6: bram ze'i khye'u zhig gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-7: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-8: 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-9: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-10: 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-11: de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs 'joms zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-12: w'a ra n'a si'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-13: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-16: w'a ra n'a sir bsod snyoms la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-17: bram ze'i khye'u zhig kyang zas kyi phyir bsod snyoms la khyim zhig tu zhugs pa las; des zas ma thob nas de phyir byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-18: rang sangs rgyas nyon mongs med kyis khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-19: bram ze'i khye'u des de zhugs pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-21: rab tu byung ba de ci dag byed blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-24: de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing sgo phag tu bsdad pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-25: ji tsam na khyim bdag gi chung mas rang sangs rgyas de lus mdzes shing sems dang ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-26: de nas de dad pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502a-27: de'i lhung bzed gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-0: des de thogs te phyir byung ba bram ze'i khye'u des mthong nas @502b smras pa; kye rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-1: re zhig khyod kyis bsod snyoms ci 'dra ba zhig grub blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-2: de ma bsam par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas des bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-3: de nas phrag dog la mngon par zhe na pa'i blo can des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-4: de'i lag par thal mos bsnun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-5: lhung bzed lhung bas kha zas rnams sa la bo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-6: bram ze'i khye'u des rdog pas brdzis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-7: rang sangs rgyas des de la smras pa; bzhin bzang khyod kyis ci'i phyir kha zas rnams chud gzan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-8: ci ste khyod slong bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-10: des rang sangs rgyas de la smad pa mang du byas nas slar log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-11: drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags su song nas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-16: phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blo can rang sangs rgyas kyi zas bcad pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po zhes bya ba nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-17: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-18: las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang yul sa lar zan bcad pa byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-21: 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas kun tu rgyu mo mdzes mas yang dag pa ma lags pas skur ba btab lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:502b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs @503a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-1: gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-2: tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-4: ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-7: skye rgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la spun gnyis shig rab tu byung bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-11: bha ra dhva dza zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-12: de nas gnas 'jog gis brtson pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-14: brtsal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-15: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-16: bha ra dhva dzas kyang bklags shing bstan pas sde snod gsum la byang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-17: sde snod gsum gyi chos kyi gtam la rig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-18: grol ba'i spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-19: des ji tsam na khyim bdag cig la bskul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-20: des de'i ched du gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig rtsig tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-21: de nas des phu po gnas 'jog la spring ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-25: de nas khyim bdag des spyod lam zhi ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-27: sems dang ba de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-28: mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-29: de nas dad pa skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-30: kha zas bsod pas tshim par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503a-31: chen po la 'os pa'i ras zung gcig bskon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-0: de nas bha ra dhva dza phrag @503b dog skyes nas bdag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-1: 'di'i thams cad la sngon du 'gro ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-5: 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa kho nar ras zung bskon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-7: de phu bo gnas 'jog la nyes pa'i glags tshol bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-8: des de tshor nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-10: phrag dog gi rang bzhin can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-11: gal te 'di la bdag gis ras zung 'di ma byin par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-12: lhag par yang mi dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-14: de nas de la byin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-15: 'on kyang de nyes pa'i glags tshol ba lhur len cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-16: khyim bdag de'i mngag gzhug ma bu mo zhig gtsug lag khang der song zhing byi dor gyi las byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-17: bha ra dhva dzas de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-19: kho bos ras zung 'di khyod la sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-20: khyod kyis kho bo'i tshig bzhin byos shig des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-23: khyod kho bo'i ras zung 'di gyon la khyim gyi byi dor gyi las byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-24: gal te khyim bdag gis khyod kyi ras zung 'di ga las 'ongs zhes 'dri ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-25: 'phags pa gnas 'jog gis bdag la stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-27: gal te ci'i phyir 'dri ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-29: skyes pa rnams kyis bud med rnams la ci'i slad du stsol ba de yang 'dri'am zhes smres shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-30: de nas des ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du thams cad byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-31: de nas khyim bdag des gnas 'jog la ma dad pa bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:503b-32: bdag nyid chen po de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-0: @504a *// bkur sti ma yin pas skrag pas te langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-3: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bha ra dhva dza gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-5: ngas de na dgra bcom pa la yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas lo mang po dang zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-6: sems can dmyal ba rnams su btsos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-7: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-8: da ltar nga mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na yang kun tu rgyu mo mdzes mas yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhig mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-11: 'phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-12: bram ze'i bu mo rtsva mes yang dag pa ma lags pas skur ba btab lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnams su las rnams byas shing bsags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-16: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-17: tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-19: ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin ne //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-23: w'a ra n'a si na bram ze rig byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-24: rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig ;bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig sten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504a-25: de w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis lhag par bkur sti byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-0: rjed cing mchod de dgra @504b bcom par bkur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-1: ji tsam na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba las w'a ra n'a sir phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-2: w'a ra n'a si na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis lus mdzes pa nga; sems dang ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-3: mthong nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs thams cad mngon par dad par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-6: 'jig rten pha rol gyi ched yod pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-7: de la byed de; ;de nas bram ze de'i rnyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-8: bkur sti nub par gyur nas drang srong de la phrag dog skyes nas phrag dog la mngon par zhen pa'i blos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-9: bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-10: bram ze'i khye'u dag 'di ni; drang srong ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-12: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-17: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-20: de nas de rnams kyis lam po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-23: sum mdo rnams su bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-24: khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-27: 'on kyang 'dod pa la longs spyod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-28: skye bo'i tshogs chen pos thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-29: ma dad pa bskyed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-30: de bkur sti ma yin pas skrag nas w'a ra n'a sir song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-33: de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-35: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:504b-36: dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:505a-1: dag pa ma yin pas skur pa btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas zhes bya ba nas sems can dmyal ba rnams su bcos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-002-001:505a-2: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no; ;las kyi lhag ma de kho nas da ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na yang dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs cig la bram ze'i bu mo rtsa mis yang dag pa ma yin pas skur ba btab ste /
